story:
Brina2 operations


Shipping stage. 

                               

 

Why is the Brina2 the best electric bicycle in the market today?

Simply because the Brina2 is a piece of art and engineering, unique and without equal in the current market, different and superior to what you find today.

  • Hyper-Smart in design, engineering and connectivity: a 3X Smart electric bicycle.
  • With the latest technology in all its components and own superior innovations.
  • Brings together all features and user benefits of different electric bicycles into one exceptional ebike.
  • All-purpose ebike for every kind of every kind of terrain, users, functions and speed.

 

What is a Full Hyper-Smart ebike?

A Full Hyper-Smart ebike is an electric bicycle that is designed and built Smart. It is equipped with the latest cutting-edge technology integrated in its engineering, design, system and connectivity, along with our own innovation. All these characteristics together deliver a strong value of attributes to today's society and user. This is called “3X intelligence” (triple intelligence).


Why does this ebike shape a new generation of electric bicycles?

Full and Hyper-Smart, two brilliant features, with high-quality high-tech components merge into one single bicycle, offered at a lower price than other premium high-end competitive brands. This distinguishes the Brina2 from anything known until now. It represents a step forward in the evolution of electric bicycles and technology, and it’s a notable foresight into the future of electric transportation.


Technical Support and Warranty

We know that after-sales services are as important to you as the product itself is. EMOV offers you the Technical Support and Warranty you need so that you can be free to enjoy your Brina2 with security and confidence.
EMOV is a leader in the industry for its quality of Technical Support, insuring their current products in this area. With 10 years of experience in the manufacturing and after-sales support of electric bicycles.
EMOV guarantees the timely and effective 24/7 Technical Support that you need for your Brina2, direct Chat with EMOV Customer Service, remote diagnosis. EMOV Support is at your assistance in your city to help you with arising issues, so that your Brina2 will be in perfect condition in no time. And always by your side!


What is the Brina2´s top speed?

Brina2 ’s maximum speed is 20mph (32 km/h) for the 350w model, 500w model, and 750w model and 32mph (51km/h) for the 1000w model. In compliance with local laws, European models are limited to 25 km/h (16 mph) and US to 750W and 20mph.


How is the ebike on handling uphill terrain?

Performance on hills depends on the steepness of the hill and the weight load on the ebike. In some instances, people will need to use both the pedal and motor to go uphill.


What’s the weight limit?

The ebike has been tested up to 250 lbs, we cannot make any guarantees about performance or durability above that weight.


How do I buy spare parts or service the Brina2? Can I go to any bike shop?

Thanks to a carefully engineered design, any local bike shop is equipped to service the Brina2, as most of the components are standard. The battery, motor  and electronic modules can be bought directly from us, and are easily installed in a DIY manner or by some of our representative ebike enginners.
 

What are the frame sizes?

The frame comes in 3 sizes, Small (17") Medium (19”) and Large (21”)


How much does the ebike weigh?

The ebike weighs anywhere from 35 lbs to 42 lbs depending on the model.
 

What are the battery specifications?

Brina2 battery is assembled with Samsung Li-Ion 18650 Cells with different characteristics according versión, 36v10ah, 48v13ah y 48v15ah. Always with +Life technology (Emov TM development) to care the battery an extend life to +3000 cycles.
 

How do I buy spare parts or service the Brina2? Can I go to any bike shop?

Thanks to a carefully engineered design, any local bike shop is equipped to service the Brina2, as most of the components are standard. The battery, motor and electronic modules can be bought directly from us, and are easily installed in a DIY manner or by some of our representative ebike enginners.
 

Is the frame aluminium, steel or what?

The frame is made of Ultra-light 100% Full PrePreg Carbon Fiber with 6061 Aluminium inserts.
 

Will the charger work with 120V and 220V outlets around the world?

Yes, the charger is rated 100-240V.
 

How much maintenance does the motor require?

The motor is maintenance-free. Our motor manufacturer has been making these types of motors for years so they’ve been thoroughly tested in the factory, in the field and with 1000’s of other customers.
 

Can you charge the ebike by pedaling to increase range?

No, such a system defies the laws of physics and would decrease the overall range of the bike rather than increase it. Because the efficiency of dynamos and motors is only in the 90% range, such a system could only convert ~80% of the energy you put into pedaling into motion. On the other hand, if you simply used this energy to propel the bike, you can put almost 100% of that energy into motion. Put simply, the bike is simpler and will go further without this system.
 

Can the battery be removed?

The battery can be replaced/serviced in the future but is not intended for daily swaps, this is how we keep the bike weight down and everything looking great! One battery should lat you for 5years+

Can I still bike on Brina2 if the battery runs out of power?

Of course! If you run out of power, you can cycle as you would do with a regular bicycle. Even without an engine - it still feels like a dream to ride.
 

I can't see the battery - where is it?

Batteries are not something you should be spending your time looking at. So it is well hidden within the frame.
 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

The backer is responsible for these costs. Please check your country's import duties/VAT/GST before ordering your Brina2, as the sales taxes vary internationally.

story:
On 10/18, near Bush and Kearny (San Fran), Alyssa's bike, which was u-locked AND had a cable lock going through both tires (VERY responsible..), was stolen in under 20 minutes. :(

I'm starting this campaign because bikes are expensive, cost of living in San Fran is ridiculously high, and it could be so easy for bunch of us to chip in what we can to raise what we can. It can be an early half birthday present! An early Christmas present!

While Facebook shows the glory of Alyssa's life on the California coast as oftentimes being on the beach & climbing to beautiful vistas, the city life is also hard knocks. She is freaking harrrrd working & has had to move a lot, etc. etc., but you don't really hear her complaining -- she asks about how you are doing & doesn't focus on herself. She's a good friend & I want to help her out!

If you can donate, many thanks and good luck your way comes! :)

<3mary tully

story:
Short Summary

My passion for bicycles began from an early age. I spent a lot of my childhood surrounded by bikes and regularly going on tours and using a variety of bicycles for regular commuting.

The mere thought of being able to ride a bicycle made from such an unlikely material immediately filled me with excitement and enthusiasm.

In about a week I'll finish building my first prototype and will start testing it. 

With this project I'm planning to restore production of bikes in Latvia (not only with bamboo frame) that was discontinued in the early 50's.


What We Need 

To bring my project to smaal-scale production I need at least 1,500 USD for: 

  • leasing premises
  • purchase of materials and equipment for production
  • marketing costs

story:
We're Shipping! Buy Foldylock Today on the Indiegogo Marketplace!

The What  

The Foldylock Compact is a premium folding bike lock features the perfect MIX between protection, weight, and design.   

make movie GIFs like this at MakeaGif

 

The Why

Bike locks. Too heavy, too ugly, too cumbersome, bad protection, Sh@#%y - squeaky function. With our long experience in the field, We believe it can be done better: Smoother function, better design, better protection, better operation, better size, better look & feel,better user experience, JUST BETTER! The Foldylock Compact is our best creation yet - this is a fact. Moreover, we believed it is the best Folding lock ever made. We hope you will think like we do and support this project.

 

The How

We have taken our entire experience and know-how from previous production of two exceptionally innovative products (Seatylock & Foldylock Classic). We have added the comments and experience of our amazing community of users and their experience and poured it all into this project.

 

The Specs

 The Compact is made of six hardened steel links over-molded by a reinforced-military graded-UV treated polymer. It makes it both "friendly" to your bike's paint job and protected against the elements - so it will maintain its fresh look for a very long time. It is constructed from anti drilling-hardened-rust free components, so it is built to resist the most violent abuse as well as to withstand extreme weather in the harshest environments. The Compact unfolds to an 80 cm (Approx. 31.5 Inches) and weighs only 1KG (2.2Lbs), It is easily carried in a designated case mounted onto the bike's frame and long enough to lock your bike frame and one of the wheels to an external object. The case can be mounted to a bike frame using the bottle holder fixing screws or with two specially designed straps. The case has a rattle free mechanism to prevent your lock from shaking while riding, so you will enjoy a silent ride. It is, by far, the strongest folding lock you can find if you consider its weight, looks and function. 

 

The Get

 

The Strength

The Foldylock Compact meets the highest security standards and it already has passed the "Sold Secure" test which is a respectful independent institution which checks bicycle locks quality and secuirty level.

 

The Feeling

The first time we held the Compact in our hands we knew it was different. We just felt its perfection, the quality, the right weight, the sleek design and the sense of security. Support this project and share this feeling with us. 

 

The rewards 

 

The Looks

 

The Press

 

 

The Sound 

 

The Prototypes

 

The Inside intel

 

The first samples exhibiting: Eurobike 2016

 

The Foldy-Faces  

We hope to see your foldy faces soon. So join our growing family

 

 

The When

story:
Dear readers,

tomorrow on mean-stream media all over the world someone driving an electric bike for 400KM with no fuel or charging batteries or anything else then using an invisible energy would surely spark some heavy interest in the minds of electricians. Even better they could immediately find the information on the net how to build it with of the shelve parts !
Well that is exactly my goal as I know that is the only way that free energy can beat the powers that be, by replication of this technology in mass by the small individual all over the globe ! Inspiring all the traditional electricians with an irrefutable proof that this energy is REAL !

As crazy as it may sound although not so crazy as so many have failed by trying to make $ out of it ! My my intention is not to make money, although I really could use some that's for sure LOL !

After more then 15 years of research in terms of what is out there and REAL OVER-UNITY I came to the conclusion that a few of them are REAL but their either to difficult, dangerous, missing parts or simply to expensive to build by the average DIY electrician !

Recently I came across this ''GEGENE'' project that eventfully uses the same principle as many others of this type of ''radiant energy'' producing devices although this device has a BIG difference in that the sours driver is no more than a 50$  induction cooker (HOB) !


I teamed up a few months ago with Igor Moroz (Canada) and Nicholas Skelly (UK) who were both on YouTube the same research into this phenomenon. Both, like myself are on a low budget. Talking about budget, although I know for most of you reading this it looks very small amount of $ for such a world changing device !? YES because that is all what it takes to spark the interest worldwide to many people replicating it ! Sure nobody can doubt that everybody would like there house, car, bike, boat etc. powered by clean and free energy !  This is also the only way something can change quickly and were the powers that be have no control over!

Why can this TESLA technology (device) REALLY CHANGE the world RAPIDLY !? Why is this apparatus different from most '' REAL FREE ENERGY '' devices out there !? Here's why !
# Easy to build # Solid state # Parts of the shelve #  Low cost  # Multiplication #


Basically what we still need is a few more electronic parts, testing equipment and a some better inverters to proof the concept ! Although test have shown that devices  produce more energy than is consumed from the grid ! Most important is that we must make the final step in making it a self running device totally off the grid ! This is the only way to proof the concept and people will understand or let's say people will ''believe it "

Link to the tests.

I saw this man from Oregon who recently asked 50000$ for a ''coolbox'' project and people supported him with 3 million ! A project like that doesn't even come close to ours in terms of importance so I hope our ''little''project will spark at least the amount of people that participate in that little cool-box ! LOL. I think it is only a small contribution in comparison what can be achieved with this technology and the  REAL change it can bring on the planet and the humans on it !

If we keep the donations small but frequent, nobody can loose and only a big gain of knowledge that can only inspire other researchers to pick it up and run with it ! This way we are all benefiting from it ! Surely anybody can understand the impact this will have on our daily lives !

What we offer is of course updates on the project progress and making the data available for anyone. (Twitter & YouTube ) In a finale stage after the 400km drive of course! The total information of the device will be provided in print form and video how to build it. When the goal is reached we also offer our assisting services to build the devices in whatever location they are needed !

Contributions in the form of information or hardware parts are highly appreciated ! Offers from electric bike manufacturers in the form of lending us a bike are also welcome as you can imagine if your brand name on the first bike that made a run of 400KM on only this RADIANT ENERGY !

Thank you for taking the time to read this info and of-course hoping you spend the amount of a few beers to help us proof that FREE ENERGY really is out there for everyone !

PS.''THE PERSON WHO SAYS IT CANNOT BE DONE SHOULD NOT INTERRUPT THE PERSON DOING IT !'' LOL

TESLETIC.COM
TWITTER

Igor @ YouTube

Nicholas @ YouTube

The original video if YouTube does not work !

An explanation why ELECTRICITY=WATER=FREEDOM

We all know Tom F'n Brady didn't cheat! 


His balls are PERFECT!

And we're not gonna sit back and watch NY fly their little banner that says "Cheaters Look Up!" over the RAZOR without us getting back at them right?

If we raise enough we are going to fly a our 4 Championship banners ALONG with a "Losers Look Up! #FREEBRADY" banner flying behind to let them know who the F we are! All this is going to happen on OPENING DAY for the NEW YORK JETS!

Let's make this happen!

story:
Introducing the award-winning Ninebot KickScooter Air T15 powered by Segway, the KickScooter with seamless folding design in the most compact, lightweight, and energy-efficient style.

 

 

Press kit is available for download here

 

 

Ninebot KickScooter Air T15 is an electric scooter with robust functions and an exquisite craftsmanship. The Air T15 team spent over SIX years (nearly 12,500 hours) working on an integrated design with the lightest yet the most durable material for a sleek and futuristic style that elevates your urban commute. With the small details designed to perfection, the Air T15 will be your reliable and stylish companion.

 

 The KickScooter that Folds Flat Seamlessly 

 

The Air T15 can be folded in half with just one click. Once folded, the 6-axis sensor embedded in the dashboard will detect the operation mode and help to turn the power off automatically.

 

When folded you can easily move the KickScooter around. The Air T15 is designed to be drag-able like a suitcase once folded. The compact size and lightweight make it even more convenient for you to store the KickScooter in the car trunk or carry it with you on public transportation.

 Ergonomically Designed For Your Comfort 

 

 We believe in using premium materials and delivering a superior product. The body of the Air T15 is made with aluminum-magnesium alloy to bring a lighter yet stronger and more reliable performance. This also ensures that the body of the vehicle is splash-proof, corrosion-resistant and eco-friendly.

 

Ingrained with a necessary precision and attention to detail, our designers and engineers bring the simple yet sophisticated style to life, presenting to you the elongated L-shape when Air T15 is in use and a simple flat line when the scooter is completely folded.

 

When you first grip on the ergonomically designed handlebar, you will be surprised by the level of comfort the silica material delivers. The bezel-less monitoring dashboard is intuitive to use and also part of the integrated look that elevates your commute experience.

 

Every detail of the Air T15’s design exudes quality. To further enhance the user experience, we designed the DIP switches on the rear fender for users to power on/off, control the light, and change the riding modes.

 

The bar and tail lights of Air T15 are designed to light up your way ahead in style. Riders can choose from three colors under different scenarios: Monochromatic, Full Color, or Emergency Light.

 

When the KickScooter is folded, the handlebar will self-retract, leaving you with a hassle-free user experience like no other.

The bezel-less dashboard of Air T15 is embedded with LED nixie tubes and provides you the extra convenience to monitor the speed, battery life, riding modes, Bluetooth connection, cruise control status, and error messages of the scooter all in one click.

 

The regenerative braking system turns your e-scooter into an electric vehicle powered by electricity and recycled energy from riding. The wheels are able to transform the energy that is captured during braking into power and to store it in the integrated lithium battery pack.

 

The four riding modes allow riders to switch easily based on riding occasions. Such modes include Pedestrian Mode, Energy-saving Mode, Standard Mode and Sport Mode with a preset speed limit of 3.7 mph (6 km/h), 6.2 mph (10 km/h), 9.3 mph (15 km/h), and 12.4 mph (20 km/h) respectively.

The Segway-Ninebot App is available on iOS and Android with integration of Bluetooth connectivity, customize LED ambient light colors, live riding stats dashboard, and more.

 

 

Segway-Ninebot is a global leader in the field of intelligent short-distance transportation and service robots. The company’s businesses are international, selling products in more than 80 countries and regions. With world-renowned intellectual property, Segway-Ninebot aims to lead the users and the entire industry into the future.

 

As one of the first crowdfunding marketing agencies, Enventys Partners has brought more than 750 crowdfunding projects to life through lead generation, campaign page creation, public relations, email marketing, Facebook Advertising, campaign management and more.
story_txt:
Introducing the award-winning Ninebot KickScooter Air T15 powered by Segway, the KickScooter with seamless folding design in the most compact, lightweight, and energy-efficient style.  
 
  Press kit is available for download here  

  
 Ninebot KickScooter Air T15 is an electric scooter with robust functions and an exquisite craftsmanship. The Air T15 team spent over SIX years (nearly 12,500 hours) working on an integrated design with the lightest yet the most durable material for a sleek and futuristic style that elevates your urban commute. With the small details designed to perfection, the Air T15 will be your reliable and stylish companion.  The KickScooter that Folds Flat Seamlessly   
 The Air T15 can be folded in half with just one click. Once folded, the 6-axis sensor embedded in the dashboard will detect the operation mode and help to turn the power off automatically.  
 When folded you can easily move the KickScooter around. The Air T15 is designed to be drag-able like a suitcase once folded. The compact size and lightweight make it even more convenient for you to store the KickScooter in the car trunk or carry it with you on public transportation. 
 
  Ergonomically Designed For Your Comfort  
  We believe in using premium materials and delivering a superior product. The body of the Air T15 is made with aluminum-magnesium alloy to bring a lighter yet stronger and more reliable performance. This also ensures that the body of the vehicle is splash-proof, corrosion-resistant and eco-friendly. 
 Ingrained with a necessary precision and attention to detail, our designers and engineers bring the simple yet sophisticated style to life, presenting to you the elongated L-shape when Air T15 is in use and a simple flat line when the scooter is completely folded.  
 When you first grip on the ergonomically designed handlebar, you will be surprised by the level of comfort the silica material delivers. The bezel-less monitoring dashboard is intuitive to use and also part of the integrated look that elevates your commute experience.  
 Every detail of the Air T15’s design exudes quality. To further enhance the user experience, we designed the DIP switches on the rear fender for users to power on/off, control the light, and change the riding modes.  The bar and tail lights of Air T15 are designed to light up your way ahead in style. Riders can choose from three colors under different scenarios: Monochromatic, Full Color, or Emergency Light. 
 
 When the KickScooter is folded, the handlebar will self-retract, leaving you with a hassle-free user experience like no other. 

 The bezel-less dashboard of Air T15 is embedded with LED nixie tubes and provides you the extra convenience to monitor the speed, battery life, riding modes, Bluetooth connection, cruise control status, and error messages of the scooter all in one click.

 The Segway-Ninebot App is available on iOS and Android with integration of Bluetooth connectivity, customize LED ambient light colors, live riding stats dashboard, and more. 
 
You can stand your scooters either vertically or horizontally. The stands that come with the product packaging can be used as a KickScooter stand for storage and ease of charging. Both stands included are made with Expanded Polypropylene (EPP) materials that are recyclable. 
   

 
  

  

 
 
  

 Segway-Ninebot is a global leader in the field of intelligent short-distance transportation and service robots. The company’s businesses are international, selling products in more than 80 countries and regions. With world-renowned intellectual property, Segway-Ninebot aims to lead the users and the entire industry into the future.

story:
Press & Reviews

Sparking a Revolution

We took the concept of the electric bicycle and kicked it up ten notches, all while keeping the price low.

Shocke Spark is the vision of a contemporary bicycle with futuristic abilities. It is a sleek, powerful, high-quality electric bicycle that will gladly obey your commands, even if it means hopping from the smoothest road to the roughest mountain terrain. You’ll never feel so comfortable embarking on any journey.

What Spark can do for You:

Get ready for an adventure on your next ride with Spark! Elegant and versatile, weighing only 22 kg, you can take Spark out anywhere and have a blast!

Go further than you ever have, and faster, too. With a 70 km range, Spark is equipped with pedal assist to help you get from point A to Z. The 350W brushless motor carries the bike at up to 32 km/h, powered by a 36V 12Ah high energy-density lithium-ion battery. Long distances and challenging landscapes never seemed like a piece of cake.

Spark is equipped with a control throttle and a 7-speed gear changer at your fingertips so that you can unleash and regulate power on demand. This is complemented with premium disc brakes on the front and back wheels.

The choice is yours, be in total control of your ride. Where will your next exciting adventure be?

Safety issues have always deterred people from riding. To ensure visibility at night, Spark comes equipped with turn signal lights. The wireless controller is at your fingertips so that you can keep your hands on the handlebar instead of in the air. The tail light also comes equipped with a laser illuminated bike path function to increase night ride visibility.

Smart, too

Spark comes equipped with a LCD backlit display that indicates speed, distance traveled, motor assistance level, battery status, and much more. Challenge yourself every time you ride and beat your old record!

Just So Convenient

Not a mechanic? No worries! The in-frame battery is easy to take out and swap with a new one. You can also plug it into any outlet while you rest and it will fully charge in no time. After the battery charges, throw it back into the frame and you’re good to go!

Best of both Worlds

Spark has the feel of a traditional bicycle, with the capabilities to handle the toughest conditions, from hills to off-road shenanigans. Take it anywhere you want. Zoom past the people with the tights on and never bat an eye. You’ll have so much fun you’ll forget that it’s exercise.

Spark is not the next toy or gadget, it is a revolution in motion. Spark is not the $500 electric bicycle with an exposed motor and cheap parts, waiting to be replaced in a few years; it is not the $5000 electric bicycle with a built in computer that boasts gimmicks you might never use. Spark is a response to the needs of the modern commuter, at a price lower than any other quality electric bicycle. 


Spark's Specs

Shocke Bikes

In 2012, a group of young professionals got together with the aspiration of creating positive sustainable change in the world. With a few projects in mind, revolutionizing the way people went about their daily transport was the priority.

Shocke Bikes was founded in 2014 with the goal of bringing affordable high quality electric bicycles to North America. Shocke Bikes imagines communities where people of all abilities feel comfortable traveling around and exploring their city by bicycle. We want cycling to be a fun activity to a wide range of people, regardless of age, ability, or gender.

We aspire to increase cycling in order to improve health and quality of life, reduce the environmental impact of carbon emissions, and make our communities vibrant places to live, work and play.


Guiding Principles

Shocke Bikes has a passion for increasing the number of safe, knowledgeable and confident cyclists. We look to partner with a variety of organizations to create sustainable change. We are ethically and environmentally responsible with our resources and in our work. 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Visit our website to see a list of FAQ (https://www.shockebikes.com/faq)

story:
ELECTRIC BICYCLE

CLASS 2

CLASS 3/OPTIONAL OFF-ROAD

 

 

 

 

Consciously Designed with the Details in Mind:

Our zippy rear-hub motor and complimenting shocks provide responsive throttle control and acceleration without sacrificing comfort.  Able to reach speeds up to 28 MPH on the Gateway and 35 MPH with the Gateway Booster it's an amazing ride experience.

Speaking of comfort...  We are here to support your rear end with our sleek extended seat design.  Want to scoot close to the handles for a more upright ride position or farther away for a more sporty ride?  Doesn't matter - we're thinking about your butt.  Let's ride!

Let's be serious for a second. Safety has to be a key factor in design - that includes seeing where you are going and being seen during your ride.  Whether it is day or night the Monday Motorbikes signature LED headlight and rear tail light have a tremendous amount of illumination.  Whether you are on-road, off-road, day, or night you can rest assured you will be seen just as easily as you can see where you are going.  Just remember to keep the rubber side down!

Need to know the time?  Got it.  How about how far you have gone on your ride?  Yep.  Range, amps, miles per hour, battery, power assist, and odometer?  …  You already know the answer.

No more ugly batteries.  Our lightweight lithium-ion battery weighs in around 13 lbs.  It's easily removed or swapped with a lock built right into the Gateway for added security.  The design allows for a sleek and near-seamless integration into the frame.  Set it in.  Take a spin. 

Both the Gateway and Gateway Booster come standard with pedals and pedal-assist technology.  If you want to pedal, you can.  Just set the pedal assistance you want on the dash and burn some of those carbs.

Our burly hydraulic front forks will give you extra support when it comes to bumps in the street or the off-road beat.  The stabilizer (colorized to match the frame) assists you in keeping that front suspension in line.

 

Now let's talk specs:

 

 

Both the Gateway and Gateway Booster are the same size!  Surprised?  Probably not.  But you will be pleasantly surprised when you twist the throttle on these beautifully designed machines.

 

Okay, I'm sold - Can I customize my bike? 

You bet! Both the Gateway and Gateway Booster have unparalleled options for customization. Take a look at some of the colors and other options we have below!

Royal Blue

"Your Highness?"

Monday Red

"Christmas is right around the corner"

Light Teal

"Tiffany says hi!"

Monday White

"These are not the droids you're looking for."

Traditional Camo

"Send us a joke about not seeing the bike here"

Midnight Black 

"You can have any color you want as long as it's black" - Henry Ford

Urban Camo (Limited Edition)

"Seriously, we can only make 40 of these"

 

Are there Wheels and Tire Options?

We said you have unparalleled options for customization right?!  Feel free to choose from 

  1.  Spoked wheels with knobby off-road tires
  2. Aluminum alloy mag wheels with street tires

All in all we have over 14 different ways you can customize your Gateway and Gateway Booster.  Just click the perk for the bike you want and we'll find out how you want to have it customized.  We're excited to see what you choose!

 

Our Story:

Like many great companies before, we launched Monday Motorbikes out of a garage in San Francisco on a Monday afternoon over four years ago.  We can't thank fans and supporters like you enough.  We are so excited to share our newest motorbike with you!

Over the last year we began designing and prototyping our latest motorbike, the Gateway.  We engineered the Gateway and Gateway Booster to be lightweight, aesthetically pleasing, and FUN to ride.  The perfect gateway to high-power electric mobility.  Participating in this campaign helps us maintain our leadership position in the design and engineering of electric motorbikes for people like you.

 

By contributing we can start placing orders from our suppliers now and ensure we can deliver as fast as possible!  We’d love your support - without it, we would still be in the garage. :) 

As a group of engineers, entrepreneurs, and passionate motorcycle riders, we aimed to design a lightweight electric motorbike with a cafe racer style that was easy and fun to ride.  In 2015, we launched and successfully funded our first campaign for our Bolt M-1 out of our garage!  Because of contributors like you we won GQ Magazine's Best Stuff of the Year, moved out of our tiny garage, and into a large scale production facility.  Our vision to make fun and innovative motorbikes is far from over and we want you to join our ride.

 

Why Us?

For over 5 years we have built innovative electric motorbikes.  Our team has been nominated and won multiple international awards including GQ Magazine's Best Stuff of the Year.  On top of the awards, we have also received several patents on the technology and design of our unique motorbikes.  We are PASSIONATE about motorbikes.

Whether it's developing our battery technology and design from our garage to major factories, we have the knowledge to make it happen.  Our experience bringing the GEN7 to mass production has given us insight into the best way to bring our customers a quality bike in the quickest fashion. 

Now we’re taking those lessons and applying them to the Gateway.

 

Risks & Challenges

With the launch of the Bolt M-1 and GEN7 a few years ago we had numerous challenges that rose from developing a supply chain for a one of a kind 72V 2.4-kilowatt-hour battery and RFID enabled technology.  The complexity in sourcing and allocating buildout times for those motorbikes was a challenge.  The support from our customers and fans really helped us out.  This experience taught us to ensure we are prepared to launch before we announce the next product.  Before we launched on Indiegogo, we have sourced all components, engineered the custom aluminum alloy frame design, developed the battery technology, and much more to overcome the challenges we had in the past.  We are more prepared to execute today than ever before in the history of Monday Motorbikes.  With a nice stream of GEN7 motorbikes we are excited to start the flow of the Gateway and Gateway Booster from the same facility that we create our GEN7s from.

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Want to win a free motorbike for you and a friend?  Sign up for our newsletter HERE

If you are into uniquely designed electric motorbikes we need your help!  Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community.  Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who needs the Gateway around town or out in the countryside!  We want YOU on our bikes!

story:
Solidity, longevity, affordability, coolness, attractive fat tires for this all terrain eBike.

Our philosophy has been to create a legacy of a good looking all terrain eBike that will stand the test of time, while featuring all modern technology components at an affordable price. Well constructed at this price point, customizable, this eBike will get anyone to enjoy cycling more often, putting less efforts on uphill roads, savor the outdoors, stay healthier and have fun.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Designed as a go-anywhere eBike, the Hippo handles pavement as well as it does dirt. The wide handlebars make it easy to maneuver, just as easy as a regular bicycle.

 

 

 

 

This is certainly one of the safest system: it allows you to control your level of assist without moving your hand from the handlebar, and without having to look at the buttons (that means, with buttons that are easy to reach). The +/- control buttons are separated from the display, well-positioned on the left side of the handlebar: changing the level of pedal assistance require no special skills. It can support up to 9 levels of PAS.   

Monitor your riding habits at a glance: speed readings, distance, time and battery life are highly visible.

We opted-in for internal cable routing, for a cleaner aesthetic, while protecting against dirt and tangled cables.

 

 

Model 350W featured in this video

Encountering staircases? No need to turn around, the Hippo is just doing fine riding down. With a strong frame, a front suspension fork, and 4” fat tires, it is outfitted to handle some rough terrain.

 

Hydraulic Disc Brakes: 500W Model - When riding an electric bike with its higher speed, stopping power is a high priority. These hydraulic disc brakes provide superior braking control, especially in poor weather.

 

 

 

Together Let’s Make It Happen

The final modifications and adjustments on this prototype were finalized last December. Since then, we have been showing it and offering test rides in our area. We received so much positive feedback that we are now eager to see the Hippo on the market this summer.

We are all ready to move to the production stage and need your support. To those who believe in us, we want to offer the Hippo eBike at a fraction of the retail price as a thank you.

Trust and transparency being part of our business ethics, be assured that we will post regular updates and answer to any of your questions. Any suggestions are also very welcome.

Together let’s turn this campaign into a successful adventure!

 

As we would like to introduce our Hippo eBike brand to many more enthusiast riders, we have prepared a great Thank You Gift for those helping us spreading the word. This reward is limited to our backers who will be sharing and/or recommending us the most: please share with your family, yours friends, and share on your social media!

Please read this section to find out how to participate in this Referral Program: Click Here Refer as many friends as you can and when their contributions total at least $2,000 you will get the Chester pedals from RaceFace.

 

 

 

 

Contributions

We  will donate $10.00 to the California State Parks Fondation for every 300 and 500 W models backed.

 

 


If you could not find what you're looking for here, please check our website and leave us a comment: HippoEbike.com


What kind of warranty do you offer?

We control with a strict protocol, in our workshop every HIPPO e-bike before delivering it to our customers and offering you an extensive warranty: one-year warranty for electric parts including the HIPPO Bafang motor, and lifetime warranty on the frame.

How does the HIPPO battery work?

You can either charge the battery while it is on the bike or remove the battery from the bike and charge it using any 110 V (or 220V in Europe) outlet. Like a heart muscle your battery loses health if you do not use it enough. To help you PRESERVE BATTERY LIFE, you should recharge it completely, between 2 and 4 hours, at least once a month if not used for a little while. If you omit this MANDATORY MAINTENANCE alone, its chemical integrity (and consequently its capacity and autonomy) will suddenly drop.
In case of a return, we will run a diagnosis and if it appears the failure is due to a lack of proper maintenance, the warranty will not apply.

How long does the battery of our HIPPO e-Bike last?

Battery life is calculated in charge cycles. This means it depends on the number of full charges (from 0 to 100%) that they can undergo before their effectiveness gradually diminishes, until they no longer function. Our HIPPO battery can undergo 800 charge cycles. The way you take care of your battery will also affect its life. For example, if you store your battery somewhere dry and protected from temperature fluctuations, you will keep it longer. In general, with regular use, an electric bike battery becomes less efficient after 3 to 5 years.

What is the charge time for HIPPO battery?
3-4 hours

What is the interest of fat tires used on each HIPPO e-Bike (3 or 4 inch)?

* The adhesion +++ (stability, much less gaps, traction +++)
* ++ comfort, smoother ride (especially the elimination of vibrations)
* Hardiness
* Relaxation (Feel invincible, no need to have technique!)
* The ability to carry weight on the most improbable terrain (Bike packing)
* Good descender

Why choose a rear engine?
The engine on the rear wheel helps avoiding the feeling of heaviness. This engine is the most responsive and reactive because it is directly connected to the rear transmission, which is highly appreciated by those who love driving dynamics.
It is advisable to opt for a bike with the engine on the rear wheel if you like dynamic driving. Many models, even high-end ones from well-known brands, are featuring a rear engine with a battery built into the frame (and those models usually run anywhere from $3,990 to $8,990!)

What about the HIPPO frame?
We use a double skin premium aluminum, reassuring behavior and maximum performance, all with maximum speed. The frame also semi incorporates our HIPPO battery holder in the diagonal tube for easy and quick removal of the battery. This solution has the advantage of being more aesthetic with the purity of the lines while ensuring an ideal distribution of weight. Finally, it protects the cables from water and dirt.

The HIPPO price is very low for an e-bike. Why is that?

Our dream is to make e-bike riding accessible to everyone. We have worked long and hard to negotiate and create an e-bike that is not only affordable, but is also an outstanding one packed with quality components featuring modern technology. All assembled on a durable aluminum frame. Affordable does not mean cheaply made.

Can I test ride a HIPPO e-Bike?

At this stage test rides are only available in Orange County and Los Angeles.
Contact us by email to schedule a test ride and be part of our many happy fans who have been test riding it since last February!

Can I get a refund?
Please read Indiegogo's policy here

Who is responsible for any import fees, additional taxes, duties or VAT?
Our international shipping fees are based on a door-to-door delivery but do not include import fees, duties, VAT or any other fees or charges that may be associated with importing our products. Our carriers will contact you to collect those additional fees once the Hippo has cleared customs.
Refer to our “How much are the shipping fees” section below for more details.

How much are the shipping fees?
Shipping cost is different for each product and country of residence and will be reflected in the perk.

Shipping Cost for 1 Hippo e-Bike – Indiegogo Campaign Period only

* 48 contiguous states: Flat rate ground shipping on the Hippo e-bike: $68.00

* Alaska and Hawaii: Contact us for pricing inquiry

* Canada: $185.00

* European Community: $299.00

Message to our Backers located in the European ECONOMIC Community (EEC): The Hippo e-bike price is VAT-free in accordance with VAT legislation. Please note it is subject to a 21% Value Added Tax (Calculated on Merchandise value + shipping cost + customs). As this VAT cannot be included in our shipping costs, please note the carrier will collect the proper amount due from you directly.

What are your shipping methods?
HIPPO e-Bikes are shipped via Dhl, UPS, FEDEX or other Global Shipping Companies.

When will I receive my HIPPO?
We will be shipping our HIPPO between late June or beginning of July 2018.

Do I need to have any type of license to ride it since there is a motor?
No, you do not. It is classified as a normal bicycle.
Our models meet the Federal regulations requiring that the electric bike must produce less than 750 watts of power and have a speed limit of 20MPH on the motor alone.
Each state having its own rules and regulations regarding electric bicycles, we encourage you to search what is applicable to your specific state.
For example, in California electric bikes are considered “motorized bicycles” and for the most part, are subject to the same laws as bicycles. Note there is an important distinction between e-bikes used on roads and the issue of trail access for e-bikes or e-mountain bikes (You’ll need to check with the local land management agency in charge of the trails you want to ride to see if it’s possible)

Can I charge my phone with my HIPPO?
Yes! The HIPPO battery has a USB port on it that acts as a portable charger!

Will my HIPPO come assembled, ready to ride?
Please note the e-bikes are shipped in our HIPPO box for environmental reasons. Most bikes will require the front wheel, handlebars, pedals and seat post assembling. But do not worry as the assembly is really very simple (about 20 minutes). Plus, our video tutorial will guide you step by step.

Can I buy extra HIPPO batteries?
Yes! Absolutely! As run times obviously vary depending on terrain and how much assist you’re asking for we strongly recommend you do so: you could travel up to 75+ miles (120km) * with two battery packs and they are so compact you can fit 2 more in your back pack!
Pro-Tip: the size of the battery is directly analogous to the size of a car’s gas tank (While the motor power impacts how fast you can pull off, and how well you can get up hills, it does not necessarily impact how far you can go)
*Calculation data comprises estimates, approximations that may vary from the actual result. Many factors could make a significant difference in range: level of assistance chosen, tire pressure, flat terrain or hilly rides, speed, wind, external temperatures and even the weight of the rider.

Do you have a support email?
Yes! Email us at: support@hippoebike.com

Will I be able to buy replacement parts?
The answer is of course Yes. You can buy replacement parts in every bicycle store out there. As we assemble our e-bikes ourselves, we stock every element of your HIPPO for fast shipping.

Can I customize my HIPPO?
Of course. In the coming weeks we will be offering more accessories to customize your HIPPO.
All our bikes have been designed according to industry standard and commonly used geometries so that you can find the accessory of your dreams (tires, forks, suspensions, saddle, brakes, bags ...) right at your bicycle shop.

What is your return policy?
We take pleasure and pride in creating an efficient bike. So, it is normal to guarantee your satisfaction.
Adopting a HIPPO is ensuring you a real pleasure for many years to come.
We offer a 14 days money back guarantee after you have received it, if you are not satisfied.
However, if you decide to do so, your HIPPO e-Bike must be in new and resalelable condition.
story_txt: Solidity, longevity, affordability, coolness, attractive fat tires for this all terrain eBike.Our philosophy has been to create a legacy of a good looking all terrain eBike that will stand the test of time, while featuring all modern technology components at an affordable price. Well constructed at this price point, customizable, this eBike will get anyone to enjoy cycling more often, putting less efforts on uphill roads, savor the outdoors, stay healthier and have fun.      Designed as a go-anywhere eBike, the Hippo handles pavement as well as it does dirt. The wide handlebars make it easy to maneuver, just as easy as a regular bicycle.    This is certainly one of the safest system: it allows you to control your level of assist without moving your hand from the handlebar, and without having to look at the buttons (that means, with buttons that are easy to reach). The +/- control buttons are separated from the display, well-positioned on the left side of the handlebar: changing the level of pedal assistance require no special skills. It can support up to 9 levels of PAS.   Monitor your riding habits at a glance: speed readings, distance, time and battery life are highly visible.We opted-in for internal cable routing, for a cleaner aesthetic, while protecting against dirt and tangled cables.  Model 350W featured in this videoEncountering staircases? No need to turn around, the Hippo is just doing fine riding down. With a strong frame, a front suspension fork, and 4” fat tires, it is outfitted to handle some rough terrain. Hydraulic Disc Brakes: 500W Model - When riding an electric bike with its higher speed, stopping power is a high priority. These hydraulic disc brakes provide superior braking control, especially in poor weather.   Together Let’s Make It HappenThe final modifications and adjustments on this prototype were finalized last December. Since then, we have been showing it and offering test rides in our area. We received so much positive feedback that we are now eager to see the Hippo on the market this summer.We are all ready to move to the production stage and need your support. To those who believe in us, we want to offer the Hippo eBike at a fraction of the retail price as a thank you.Trust and transparency being part of our business ethics, be assured that we will post regular updates and answer to any of your questions. Any suggestions are also very welcome.Together let’s turn this campaign into a successful adventure! As we would like to introduce our Hippo eBike brand to many more enthusiast riders, we have prepared a great Thank You Gift for those helping us spreading the word. story:
Have you ever traveled to the wilderness, away from the road? But the roar of engines was still been heard just a few steps away from you? This is group of ATV-fans drove past …

We wondered how to save the situation, because such mode of transport is becoming more prevalent. Even yesterday, where it was possible to enjoy the tranquility and fresh air, are now rumbling machines, air polluting by exhaust gases.

     Smart and high-power eATV from Velectrico will help prevent the environmental disaster and the annoying noise!


    Our eATV will also be useful for the groups exploring wild nature. With the function "road train" leading machine can get the way for the 3 slave machines.

Extra battery packs and charging from the solar panels allow to plan real autonomous expedition.

The eATV io20 is capable for a long time charge and supply the various special equipment, such as smart phones, cameras, lighting equipment.

Fans of thrills will enjoy dynamic acceleration and good speed.

Specially designed the four motors control technology does not leave any chance to get stuck in the middle of a huge mud puddle.

The sealed frame will help overcome a ford even if the whole eATV will disappear under water.

Automatic notification system will send to smartphone information about the battery charge, the power reserve, the temperature of motor windings and other useful information.

What if you need to overcome the river not to wet the feet? You can walk on a pedestrian bridge, and eATV with a remote control software installed on your smartphone independently will overcome all obstacles.

    Our team specializes in the development of different gadgets and power electronics. We promptly conducted R&D and started prototyping phase

    Currently for project Velectrico eATV io20 has already been developed:
  • Motor-wheel construct with an unique motor BLDC by own design
                               

  • Battery managment system 


  • Frame

  • Four motors control technology


  • Instrument cluster

   

    The project is realized on the personal funds of our team, so any financial support will significantly speed up the development.

     We need funds to produce a prototype and funds for pre-production.

    We hope that the success of our project on Indiegogo will push many people to think about the environmental problem and to begin actively invest to the development of eco transport.


  • Technology - BEV (Battery Electric vehicle)
  • Maximum speed – 120 km/h
  • Power – 20 kW/27 hp
  • Battery capacity – 200 Ah
  • Battery type – Li-ion
  • Quantity of charge cycles – 500
  • Engine – 4 x BLDC
  • Power reserve – 200 km
  • Weight – 300 kg



                       What differences between Velectrico eATV io20  and those eATV that already exist in the market?

                       At the present time in the market there are eATV models built on one electric motor,the torque of this motor is transferred to the continuous rear axle. Disadvantages of this design are obvious - it is bad control, the rigidity of the suspension, the torque is distributed only between the two rear wheels. 

                  In our eATV four-wheel motor and multi-link independent suspension at each wheel. This solution allows to realize any movement pattern.

                       How to charge the battery and how long will it take?

                       We have developed a special charger that operates in a voltage range of 90-264 VAC. The duration depends on power capacity, on average 4 hour.

Have you ever traveled to the wilderness, away from the road? But the roar of engines was still been heard just a few steps away from you? This is group of ATV-fans drove past …
We wondered how to save the situation, because such mode of transport is becoming more prevalent. Even yesterday, where it was possible to enjoy the tranquility and fresh air, are now rumbling machines, air polluting by exhaust gases.
     Smart and high-power eATV from Velectrico will help prevent the environmental disaster and the annoying noise!





    Our eATV will also be useful for the groups exploring wild nature. With the function "road train" leading machine can get the way for the 3 slave machines.
Extra battery packs and charging from the solar panels allow to plan real autonomous expedition.
The eATV io20 is capable for a long time charge and supply the various special equipment, such as smart phones, cameras, lighting equipment.
Fans of thrills will enjoy dynamic acceleration and good speed.
Specially designed the four motors control technology does not leave any chance to get stuck in the middle of a huge mud puddle.
The sealed frame will help overcome a ford even if the whole eATV will disappear under water.
Automatic notification system will send to smartphone information about the battery charge, the power reserve, the temperature of motor windings and other useful information.What if you need to overcome the river not to wet the feet? You can walk on a pedestrian bridge, and eATV with a remote control software installed on your smartphone independently will overcome all obstacles.


    Our team specializes in the development of different gadgets and power electronics. We promptly conducted R&D and started prototyping phase
    Currently for project Velectrico eATV io20 has already been developed:

Motor-wheel construct with an unique motor BLDC by own design                               


Battery managment system 





Frame


Four motors control technology





Instrument cluster



   

    The project is realized on the personal funds of our team, so any financial support will significantly speed up the development.
     We need funds to produce a prototype and funds for pre-production.
    We hope that the success of our project on Indiegogo will push many people to think about the environmental problem and to begin actively invest to the development of eco transport.








Technology - BEV
     (Battery Electric vehicle)


Maximum
     speed – 120 km/h


Power
     – 20 kW/27 hp


Battery
     capacity – 200 Ah


Battery
     type – Li-ion


Quantity
     of charge cycles – 500


Engine
     – 4 x BLDC


Power
     reserve – 200 km

Weight
     – 300 kg












     What differences between Velectrico eATV io20  and those eATV that already exist in the market?
     At the present time in the market there are eATV models built on one electric motor,the torque of this motor is transferred to the continuous rear axle. Disadvantages of this design are obvious - it is bad control, the rigidity of the suspension, the torque is distributed only between the two rear wheels. 
In our eATV four-wheel motor and multi-link independent suspension at each wheel. This solution allows to realize any movement pattern.
     How to charge the battery and how long will it take?
     We have developed a special charger that operates in a voltage range of 90-264 VAC. The duration depends on power capacity, on average 4 hour.

story:
UPDATE: OUR CAMPAIGN HAS ENDED! THX FOR ALL SUPPORT & CONTRIBUTIONS!

 YOU CAN STILL PRE-ORDER ANY OF OUR PRODUCTS HERE!


Can you spot the difference?

               

Real Short

  1. FlipCrown is a stylish and affordable bike accessory that allows you to flip the handlebars 90°, this is convenient to store/mount /get through crowds...
    It can be installed on most bicycles.
  2. We're a two headed design team (Patrick and Rob), passionate about bikes!
  3. Our first project that we're Crowd-sourcing;  the funds will cover start-up costs of the first production run.
Please help us by sharing this page with your friends or by pre-ordering your own FlipCrown ! 


A little less short

Who Are We?

Up close and personal, we are Patrick Jacquet and Rob De Schutter, both fathers and both bike-aficionados. We run a small design & development firm called DeltaReference based in the city of Ghent, Belgium. The last 7 years we have been working and cooperating on several ideas and products in the toy industry. We've also built prototypes for other companies including medical appliances, automated payment kiosks & consumer electronics.

Venturing into the bike industry with FlipCrown was a logical next step for the bike-o-philiacs* we are. Besides FlipCrown we are working on other exciting bike-related products.  (* not to be taken all too literally)


Why we came up with FlipCrown

One can call us naive, but we believe bikes are an important answer to some of the world's most pressing problems. Bikes (including E-bikes) provide sustainable transport for an increasingly urbanizing world population, reduce traffic congestion, don't pollute our city's , they help fight the growing obesity pandemic, and are even effective in combating depression!

With FlipCrown we want to be a part of this movement, helping to make a bike just that little extra touch more convenient in crowded cities, small hallways and tight apartments. 


Why we need your help?

FlipCrown is a product for bike-lovers and perfectionists, but also for people who are radically practical and want their bikes when they need them and out of the way when they don't. The major bicycle manufacturers won't take on such a niche product, so with this campaign we want to rally the people that do see the point of slimming down their bike. By supporting our campaign we can cover the cost of a minimum order to start manufacturing and get a FlipCrown into your hands!



How far along are we?


 OUR PROTOTYPES...

We've gone through all stages of turning an idea into a reality. Sketching, CAD modeling, prototyping, testing, the molds have been produced and the first samples have been made... we have selected final manufacturers to produce the FlipCrown. We have a quality control manager available to check the quality of the manufactured products. And last but not least we've looked into the best options for delivering the FlipCrown to your doorstep and made arrangements so everything runs smoothly.
So in short all we have to do in terms of producing our item once the campaign is successful is tell the factory to go and follow up!


What we need, and what you get!

FlipCrown logistics explained in three info graphics :

What the funds will go to:


Here's an overview of our perks (aka what you get):

more Slim Bike pictures below!

And Finally:


FAQ

How do I Use FlipCrown?

1.Loosen Stem-bolt    2.Push FlipCrown Button   3.Flip Handlebars 


Will it fit my bike?

FlipCrown was designed for so called 'threaded headsets' which are easily recognizable. Just take a look at how the quill (this is the part that holds the handlebars) attaches to the fork (this is the part that holds the front wheel). 
If you are not sure, you can send us a picture and we will help you out. Send to info@deltareference.com

Note; sometimes the top bolt of a threaded headset is hidden under a cap.

Left: Threaded                           Right:non-threaded
(BTW: we are also working on a solution for non-threaded stems, drop us a line if you can use one!)

What size FlipCrown do I need?

We offer two sizes, 1" and 1 1/8". You do not need to determine this before ordering. Once you order we will contact you and give you guidelines to determine which size FlipCrown is for you.


Is it hard to install?

Nope. Follow along with the provided instructions and you should be ready within 15 minutes. Once we have our production samples we will create an online tutorial, and a manual will be provided with your FlipCrown.


Is it safe?

Yes, it is perfectly safe and will not influence your bike’s steering, handling nor driving.


What tools do I need?

We will supply you with 2 custom wrenches that can be used to install both the FlipCrown and the Quick Release pedals. In most cases you can use this wrench to unscrew the original headset crown nut, but in some cases you might need some extra leverage or a different tool. You can either use a pipe to extend the provided wrenches grip or use your own tools instead. The FlipCrown is fastened onto the quill stem and steerer tube with 3 setscrews, an Allen key is provided for this purpose.

Do you have a girl's/women's model bike?

Slim bike is fun for boys and girls, but we do encourage to wear pants, keep a watch on us tough, we are looking at releasing a great-looking women's model soon!

What framesize is for me?

FRAMESIZE 54cm=  1.68m - 1.79m
FRAMESIZE 59cm= 1.77m - 1.90m
FRAMESIZE 21.2"= 5ft 6" - 5ft 10"
FRAMESIZE 23.2"= 5ft 9" - 6ft 2"


Our exclusive SlimBike!


Flipcrown Slimbike Specs:
  • 1" Chrome Flipcrown + Flipcrown Pocket Tool
  • hi-ten steel lugged frame and fork, powdercoated olive green, varnished
  • 1” Chrome Neco headset
  • Zoom quill stem 100mm, -13 degree drop
  • Kenda 700Cx23C cream tires
  • double wall alloy 700C rims, chrome
  • Quando flip-flop hub, freewheel 16t, fixed gear 16t
  • 14G spokes
  • Lasco 46t 165mm alloy crank
  • KMC chain
  • VP sealed bottom bracket
  • Chrome quick release pedals, with reflectors
  • Promax brakes, with quick release
  • alloy inverted riser handlebar, 520mm wide
  • vegan leather bar tape
  • vegan leather studded seat
  • stainless nuts and bolts all-round
  • BONUS: FlipCrown designer shelf to show off your bike at home!

Exclusive Deal:FlipCrown Slimbike by ACHIELLE! only 15 available!

We are very proud to offer you a very exclusive deal, in co-operation with Achielle Bicycles we are offering a deluxe FlipCrown SlimBike.
Achielle is a Belgian Bicycle Manufacturer that build gorgeous retro bicycles to order. Achielle Bicycles represent the cream of the crop in bicycles, the frames are hand-built and assembled in the factory in Belgium, all components are of the highest grade available.




CUSTOMIZE THIS BIKE FROM A RANGE OF OPTIONS
FlipCrown Slimbike by Achielle Specs:

  • Models: Sam Deluxe(Male) & Saar Deluxe(Female)  
  • Size: Male 57cm/61cm, Female 51cm/57cm
  • Colors:

  • 1" Chrome Flipcrown + Flipcrown Pocket Tool (not depicted)
  • Sturmey 3-speed torpedo  (depicted above)
  • Sturmey Gear shifter mounted on quill (depicted above)
  • Crane Japan Golden (look) bell (depicted above)
  • Headbadge: metal Achielle headbadge (depicted above)
  • Frontbrake: pivot brake (depicted above)
  • Rims: alloy chrome (depicted above)
  • Handlebar: pathracer (depicted above)
  • Stem: Eagle (depicted on creme and red bike above) or drop stem (depicted on black bike above)
  • Grips:
    BROOKS Bartape Honey(depicted above on red and creme bike)/Black or
    BROOKS Slender grips Honey/mustard or (not depicted)
    BROOKS plump grips or (not depicted)
    BROOKS Slender grips Cambium Naturel (depicted above on black bike)
  • Stand: Antran sidestand (depicted above)
  • Fenders in bicycle colour (depicted above)
  • Chainguard: Chainglider in bicycle color (depicted above)
  • Tires: Delta Cruisers color: Black/Brown/Creme  (depicted above)
  • Saddle:
    BROOKS Team Pro Honey (depicted on creme and red bike above) /Black or
    BROOKS Colt Mustard (not depicted) or
    BROOKS Cambium Naturel C17 (depicted on black bike above)
  • Pedals, quick release, Chrome. (not depicted)
  • BONUS: FlipCrown designer shelf to show off your bike at home! (not depicted)


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if the FlipCrown is not for you (right now :)  ) you can still help! If you share this page with some of your bike-loving friends, they might decide they can put a FlipCrown to good use:

We realize FlipCrown is not for everyone, but we're sure you know some people who could use one! A hipster friend that keeps his fixie-bike in his bedroom perhaps?

Share our page with the buttons beneath the campaign video! Remember: sharing is caring!


The Risks & Challenges

Let us be honest, we're not big risk takers over here, we like to take well thought out and planned decisions. Before we even considered launching a crowd funding campaign we looked into everything that went wrong in other campaigns.

We paid extra attention to the logistics side, which tends to falter in some crowd-sourcing campaigns. We calculated the costs every step of the way, right up to your doorstep. We've set up a realistic deadline, based on our manufacturers estimates + we calculated in a reasonable margin of error on their side.

This is indeed our first crowd-sourcing campaign, but we hope to reach out with more complex projects in the future. We chose to start with FlipCrown precisely because it is a relatively modest project. We are absolutely confident that with your help we can make the FlipCrown a reality!

thank you so much for your support!

The FlipCrown Team,

Patrick & Rob.


FLIPCROWN IS  PATENT PENDING 

© 2015 Rob De Schutter for Deltareference. All Rights Reserved.
story_txt:
UPDATE: OUR CAMPAIGN HAS ENDED! THX FOR ALL SUPPORT & CONTRIBUTIONS!
 YOU CAN STILL PRE-ORDER ANY OF OUR PRODUCTS HERE!
Can you spot the difference?
               

Real
Short


FlipCrown
is a stylish and affordable bike accessory that allows you to flip the
handlebars 90°, this is convenient to store/mount /get through
crowds... It can be installed on most bicycles.
We're a
two headed design team (Patrick and Rob), passionate about bikes!
Our
first project that we're Crowd-sourcing;  the funds will cover
start-up costs of the first production run.

Please help us by sharing
this page with your friends or by pre-ordering your own FlipCrown ! 









A
little less short


Who
Are We?

Up close and personal, we are Patrick Jacquet and
Rob De Schutter,
both fathers and both bike-aficionados. We run a small design
& development firm called DeltaReference based in the city of
Ghent, Belgium.
The last 7 years we have been working and cooperating on several ideas
and products in the toy industry. We've also built prototypes for other
companies including medical appliances, automated payment kiosks
&
consumer electronics. 

Venturing into the bike
industry with FlipCrown was a logical next step for the
bike-o-philiacs* we are. Besides FlipCrown we are working
on other exciting bike-related products.  (* not to be taken all too literally)


Why
we came up with FlipCrown

One can call us naive, but
we believe bikes are
an important answer
to some of the world's most pressing problems. Bikes (including
E-bikes) provide sustainable transport for an increasingly urbanizing
world population, reduce traffic congestion, don't pollute our city's ,
they help fight the growing obesity pandemic, and are even effective in
combating depression!

With FlipCrown we
want to be a part of this movement, helping to make a bike just
that little extra touch more convenient in crowded cities,
small hallways and tight apartments.  



Why
we need your help?

FlipCrown
is a product for bike-lovers and perfectionists, but also for people
who are radically practical and want their bikes when they need them
and out of the way when they don't. The major bicycle
manufacturers won't take on such a niche product, so with this campaign
we want to rally the people that do see the point of slimming down
their bike. By supporting our campaign we can cover the cost of a
minimum order to start manufacturing and get a FlipCrown into your
hands! 




How
far along are we?



 OUR PROTOTYPES...

We've
gone through all stages of turning an idea into a reality. Sketching,
CAD modeling, prototyping, testing, the molds have been produced and the first samples have
been made...
we have selected final manufacturers to produce the FlipCrown. We have
a quality control manager available to check the quality of the
manufactured products. And last but not least we've looked into the
best options for delivering the FlipCrown to your doorstep and made
arrangements so everything runs smoothly. 
So
in short all we have to do in terms of producing our item once the
campaign is successful is tell the factory to go and follow up!



What
we need, and what you get!

FlipCrown logistics
explained in three info graphics :



What the
funds will go to:


Here's
an overview of our perks (aka what you get):











more
Slim Bike pictures below! 




And
Finally:



FAQ
How do I Use FlipCrown?

1.Loosen Stem-bolt    2.Push FlipCrown Button   3.Flip Handlebars 

Will
it fit my bike? 

FlipCrown
was designed for so called 'threaded headsets' which are easily
recognizable. Just take a look at how the quill (this is the part that holds the handlebars) attaches to the fork (this is the part that holds the front wheel). If you are not sure, you can send us a picture and we will help you out. Send to info@deltareference.com

Note; sometimes the top bolt of a threaded headset is
hidden under a cap.


Left: Threaded                           Right:non-threaded

(BTW: we are also
working on a solution for non-threaded stems, drop us a line if you can use one!)




What size FlipCrown do I need?
We
offer two sizes, 1" and 1 1/8". You do not need to determine this
before ordering. Once you order we will contact you and give you
guidelines to determine which size FlipCrown is for you.


Is it hard to install?

Nope.
Follow along with the provided instructions and you should be ready
within 15 minutes. Once we have our production samples we will create
an online tutorial, and a manual will be provided with your FlipCrown.




Is it safe?
Yes, it is perfectly safe and will not influence your bike’s steering, handling nor driving.


What
tools do I need?


We
will supply you with 2 custom wrenches that can be used to install both
the FlipCrown and the Quick Release pedals. In most cases you can use
this wrench to unscrew the original headset crown nut, but in some
cases you might need some extra leverage or a different
tool. You
can either use a pipe to extend the provided wrenches grip or use your
own tools instead. The FlipCrown is fastened onto the quill stem and
steerer tube with 3 setscrews, an Allen key is provided for this
purpose.


Do
you have a girl's/women's model bike?

Slim
bike is fun for boys and girls, but we do encourage to wear pants, keep
a watch on us tough, we are looking at releasing a great-looking
women's model soon!


What
framesize is for me?

FRAMESIZE 54cm= 
1.68m - 1.79m
FRAMESIZE 59cm=
1.77m - 1.90m
FRAMESIZE 21.2"= 5ft
6" - 5ft 10"
FRAMESIZE 23.2"= 5ft
9" - 6ft 2"



Our exclusive SlimBike!







Flipcrown
Slimbike Specs:

1" Chrome Flipcrown + Flipcrown Pocket Tool
hi-ten steel lugged frame and fork, powdercoated olive
green, varnished
1” Chrome Neco headset
Zoom quill stem 100mm, -13 degree drop
Kenda 700Cx23C cream tires
double wall alloy 700C rims, chrome
Quando flip-flop hub, freewheel 16t, fixed gear 16t
14G spokes
Lasco 46t 165mm alloy crank
KMC chain
VP sealed bottom bracket
Chrome quick release pedals, with reflectors
Promax brakes, with quick release
alloy inverted riser handlebar, 520mm wide
vegan leather bar tape
vegan leather studded seat
stainless nuts and bolts all-round
BONUS: FlipCrown
designer shelf to show off your bike at home!

story:
The Skyber Association Project. 

What's better than convenient travel? Options for upgrading and receiving even more conveniences. Hey I'm Dave, I've been doing guest services at the OIA for nearly 20 years. A couple of my comrades and I are working on an idea that will make air travelers, and customers in general feel even more at ease when they travel. Anybody that contributes will qualify for travel discount prizes once this idea gradually surfaces, and becomes an available product. The monies contributed here on our first campaign, will go into the production phases of the project. I'm delivering intentional vagueness here because of the cut-throat business culture of airports. I can only give a small amount of information in the idea phase. But if anyone residing in Orlando wants to know a little bit more on this idea, just drop by and see us at the Lee Vista Chik Filet, 2 miles north of OIA (Orlando International Airport). Home base for this project is in Orlando, and we do our pow-wows usually on Friday nights from 8:30pm til 11. If you decide to come through, just ask for Glenna (our waitress, and she'll introduce you to us) Thank you to everyone that contributes, and God bless.

story:
Backstory

Bikes Del Pueblo works to empower local communities through bicycle education for mechanical and transportation self-sufficiency. BDP is a worker-owned, not for profit organization that practices consensus decision making . We provide open workshops that make available tools and assistance for building, maintaining, and repairing bikes in safe spaces. The driving principles of these workshops are inclusivity and accessibility, recycling and do-it-yourself/do-it-together ethics. We seek an awareness of the diversity of the needs of our visitors. We strive to maintain and prioritize working relationships with residents and organizations within City Heights as we grow.

Founded in 2007 we have been operating out of the City Heights Farmers Market since 2009 and are eager to move to a more permanent location where we can provide more consistent and reliable service.

What We Need & What You Get

  • By getting a space we will be able to have more accessible bike repairs, longer hours, and more educational workshops open to the public. This will allow us to get many more bikes fixed and on the road! This will also provide our volunteers ample space to evolve the organization with many possible opportunities.
  • Currently, we operate each Saturday at a local farmer's market. Although we love the market we find that it is difficult to grow and provide for the needs of our community with the current one day a week model.
  • We would like to raise $10,000. This will give BdP the freedom to have 6 months rent as well as created a reserve, giving us time to stabilize a regular income to continue to sustain our space.
  • This campaign will grant BdP the ability to provide donations based services. BdP believes in providing services to any and all in need. Our services should and will continue to be available everyone no matter their socio-economic status.  We achieve this by operating with sliding scale pricing for parts, and free access to tools.

The Impact

  • BdP has been working in the City Heights community since 2007. We are now ready to take the natural next steps in acquiring and sustaining a permanent place in our neighborhood. This progression is necessary in spreading the accessibility and sustainability we have been providing to the farmer's market community for the last 7 years.
  • In addition to the Saturday market, we have worked alongside many valuable partners. One organization we would like to highlight our work with is the International Rescue Committee (IRC). This international non-profit works in refugee resettlement. Over 1,000 refugees are brought to San Diego every year and rely on public transportation to get to and from their job until they are able to purchase a car. BdP has been working with the IRC to provide refugees with working bicycles to get them around their new city. BdP has also hosted workshops for refugees to learn simple bike repairs and maintenance. This is especially important because many refugees, when they first arrive in this country, are on some sort of government assistance program and unable to pay for extra costs like bike repairs. Acquiring a full time space would allow for BdP to take on other projects similar to the one with the IRC.
  • BdP also hosts bi-weekly build nights that are open and available to the public. BdP will offer guidance to anyone in need of simple to moderate repairs for their bicycle. We provide tools and any parts that are available.

Risks & Challenges

By obtaining a space, BdP will be better equipped to meet our mission. If we are unable to raise the necessary monies to get our space, we will set aside a reserve fund to continue to add to until we are able to meet our ultimate goal of $10,000. We want our potential funders to feel confident they understand where their much appreciated donations will be going towards. BdP strives for complete transparency with our volunteers, community, board members and supporters.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you are unable to donate, we still need support and help spreading the word about our fundraiser. Your assistance distributing and advertising our month long campaign is showing your solidarity with BdP and that's all we could ask of you. 
  • Please share this via Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, email, text and/or any other sort of distribution or social media you feel would help us reach more people. We want to meet our fundraising goal but we also want to share our mission with people who are unfamiliar with BdP and our services.  We would love it, if at the end of the day, maybe we didn't meet our goal yet we reached many more people who didn't yet know about us or the work we do. 
  • To our current supporters in the bike community, thank you for your dedication and love you have shown us since our beginning in 2007. To those who have not heard of us before this campaign, we hope you come visit us at the Saturday market and talk to us about our mission and hopefully feel drawn to help support a grassroots organization trying to advocate for bicycle education and transportation self-sufficiency. 
  • We are hosting a series of fundraising events to act in conjunction with this Indiegogo campaign.

Please share this via Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, email, text and/or any other sort of distribution or social media you feel would help us reach more people. To our current supporters in the bike community, thank you for your dedication and love you have shown us since our beginning in 2007.
