We are hosting a series of fundraising events to act in conjunction with this Indiegogo campaign.

story:
For the last 2 years the XStrada Group has been developing a very special mountain bike,  we created this amazing machine with the goal of setting the bar for fun, performance and durability all bundled into one very unique riding experience!

The XStrada compliments any persons need for adventure with four distinct yet interchangeable models.

The XStrada is an outstanding value and can be ordered as a single speed cruiser or as an 11 speed. Amp up the power and further your range with our high torque 52v/35ah (3kw) electric mid-drive which can propel you to speeds in excess of 40mph with a 35+ mile range. Available for either model!

After extensive prototyping and testing we've lined up our suppliers, manufacturing partners and shipping logistics to ensure fast fulfillment.

With your help we can mass produce the XStrada, with volume orders reduce our per unit cost and introduce it to the World!

The XStrada was built to transcend the limits of traditional mountain bikes with its bold 7.5" wide tires. The aggressive footprint is wrapped around a lightweight alloy wheel set and allows it to float over difficult terrain that would otherwise stop conventional bikes. These distinct features offer maximum traction off road yet are comfortable on roads as well.

The XStrada's versatility allows you to go farther with more confidence and have a lot more fun while doing it!

 

 

The heart of any great bicycle is its frame and the XStrada is no exception. After  testing various geometry, building materials and components we finally dialed in what we feel is the perfect balance of performance and comfort.

Each XStrada is hand fabricated to our exacting specifications from 7000 series double butted alloy tubing.  This tube set is common in the cycling and aerospace industry and offers an ideal blend of impressive strength to weight ratio with high fatigue and corrosion resistance.

We proudly stand behind every frame with a Life Time Warranty against manufacturer defects we are also offering a 15 Day Satisfaction Guarantee - We are so convinced that you will love this bike that we will give you a full refund minus return shipping if you don't!

Because of our specific frame design we have created a bike with excellent riding characteristics in a variety of environments.

;

Either in tight, twisty single track, deep snow or just cruising at the beach you will experience excellent, steering stability and control. 

If you decide to increase the pace or steepen the decent we've got you covered, adjust the XStrada/TG inverted suspension on the fly and effortlessly soak up the bumps big and small with 7.5" of adjustable suspension travel!

XStrada TG inverted suspension fork details.

  One of the highlights of the XStrada is its inverted suspension fork.  Our Nitrogen charged fork contains a titanium spring/MCU polymer stack, CNC machined crowns, fully adjustable pre-load/dampening and rebound, through axle, and 7.5" travel.

Hands Down, we have created one of the most enjoyable riding experiences ever! Not too mention an outstanding value and the perfect four season, all-terrain adventure bike! 

  

XStrada has hosted Demo Days at various venues across the USA and Canada, most events in cooperation with local bike shops. These are an ongoing effort for grassroots promotion and have been an excellent experience! 

The positive feedback on our prototype models have been very valuable and allowed us to make some great friends and future customers along the way.

The XStrada is available in three frame sizes specifically designed to fit a wide spectrum of riders, each frame sports our massive 23x7.5" wheels and that outer diameter is factored into our size suggestions.  Our guide below is a very accurate reference but if you have any questions please don't hesitate to ask!

 

Placing your XStrada Pre-Order is very easy!

Be sure to take advantage of our early adoption discounts!

We are offering deals which are hundreds $$$ lower than our projected retail prices.

 

  • 1st STEP - Determine if you want a single speed (perfect for casual riding, beaches or light trails) or our best value, the 11 speed wide range geared model (complete versatility for all terrain..A trail crusher!)​

 

  • 2nd STEP - If selecting an 11 speed model choose the component group you would like installed  (Shimano or SRAM groups include rear derailleurs, rear shifter, brand/model free hub body, cassette, cable/housing, chain) 

​

  • 3rd STEP - Massive Electric Boost?   The 52V/35ah (3KW) electric mid drive upgrade is compatible with both the single speed and any of the 11 speed groups we offer, it features 5 level pedal assist or full throttle control and can be ordered at the same time as the XStrada (installed/tuned) or anytime in the future and will fit our frame sets seamlessly.​

​

​

(Inquire about volume discounts or fleet sales)

 

 

XStrada XS1 - Single Speed Detail

XStrada XS11 - 11 Speed CNC Machined Alloy Hub and Cassette Detail 

 

 

Available Component Groups for the XStrada XS11

 

Complete SHIMANO SLX Equipped Bike Starts at - $1295.00 (first 25 sold)

 

Complete SHIMANO XT Equipped Bike Starts at - $1495.00 (first 25 sold)

 

Complete SHIMANO XTR Equipped Bike Starts at - $1795.00 (first 25 sold)

 

Complete SRAM XX1 Equipped Bike Starts at - $1895.00 (first 25 sold)

(Trigger Shift or Grip Shift Option - Please Indicate)

The single speed or 11 speed can be coupled with our high torque electric mid-drive option to drastically extend the power and range of your ride.

Speeds of up to 40 mph and a 35 mile range are attainable depending on rider weight and road/trail conditions!

Much greater distance is achieved in pedal assist mode, where you receive supplemental  effortless power in tune with your pedal strokes through crank mounted sensors (5 preset levels or full throttle)

Each Mid-Drive Option is installed and tested prior to shipment and is offered at a remarkable promotional crowdfund price of only $1249.00!

(Eventual Retail Pricing for this package will exceed $1695.00)

This includes a removable 52v/35ah Samsung lithium cell pack, waterproof housing and a mounted brushless middrive producing a massive 3000 watts (3kw).

The controller and battery pack are contained in the weather proof case and are interfaced via our handlebar mounted throttle (available in full or half grip)   The XStrada throttle unit features a color LCD computer which uses GPS/Accelerometer technology for wireless speed/trip/odometer tracking and also controls master power switch, 5 level pedal assistance or pure throttle mode mode.

Each XStrada GPS Throttle includes a master key for security and safety

A 110/220v smart charger is included in every XStrada EBike Upgrade to ensure prolonged battery life by automating a balanced cell bank charge, it can be switched from 3 amp (trickle @ 3hr full) to 5 amp (rapid @ 1.5hr full charge)

As a sincere thank you to the early adopters we are offering a FREE XStrada Athletic TShirt to the first 25 units sold of each model! (also available in Womens)

Be sure to select which size you would prefer at checkout (S-M-L-XL)

Our R&D is complete, jigs and tooling designed, manufacturing relationships in place, component partners ready to fulfill any volume, final samples received and fully tested.   With these preliminary steps already taken our lead time to shipment will be drastically reduced!

Our team is comprised of a talented and dedicated crew, based in both Canada and the USA, we are all cycling fanatics as well as industrial designers, marketing and logistics specialists!  Needless to say we all share the same vision, insight and attention to detail which will bring this project to light and on schedule for the world to enjoy.  If you have any questions at all please don't hesitate to reach out!

We are raising funds to pay for an initial volume production of XStrada Fat Bikes to ensure a low per unit pricing. Over the past 24 months we have worked tirelessly to locate and solidify relationships with leading manufacturers. We are confident in our ability to deliver top quality product on time. Should there be any unexpected setbacks we will be sure to keep our backers updated. We look forward to sharing our journey with all the new members of the XStrada family.
story_txt:
For the last 2 years the XStrada Group has been developing a very special mountain bike,  we created this amazing machine with the goal of setting the bar for fun, performance and durability all bundled into one very unique riding experience!The XStrada compliments any persons need for adventure with four distinct yet interchangeable models.The XStrada is an outstanding value and can be ordered as a single speed cruiser or as an 11 speed. Amp up the power and further your range with our high torque 52v/35ah (3kw) electric mid-drive which can propel you to speeds in excess of 40mph with a 35+ mile range. Available for either model!After extensive prototyping and testing we've lined up our suppliers, manufacturing partners and shipping logistics to ensure fast fulfillment.With your help we can mass produce the XStrada, with volume orders reduce our per unit cost and introduce it to the World!The XStrada was built to transcend the limits of traditional mountain bikes with its bold 7.5" wide tires. The aggressive footprint is wrapped around a lightweight alloy wheel set and allows it to float over difficult terrain that would otherwise stop conventional bikes. These distinct features offer maximum traction off road yet are comfortable on roads as well.The XStrada's versatility allows you to go farther with more confidence and have a lot more fun while doing it!  The heart of any great bicycle is its frame and the XStrada is no exception. After  testing various geometry, building materials and components we finally dialed in what we feel is the perfect balance of performance and comfort.Each XStrada is hand fabricated to our exacting specifications from 7000 series double butted alloy tubing.  This tube set is common in the cycling and aerospace industry and offers an ideal blend of impressive strength to weight ratio with high fatigue and corrosion resistance.We proudly stand behind every frame with a Life Time Warranty against manufacturer defects we are also offering a 15 Day Satisfaction Guarantee - We are so convinced that you will love this bike that we will give you a full refund minus return shipping if you don't!Because of our specific frame design we have created a bike with excellent riding characteristics in a variety of environments.;Either in tight, twisty single track, deep snow or just cruising at the beach you will experience excellent, steering stability and control.  If you decide to increase the pace or steepen the decent we've got you covered, adjust the XStrada/TG inverted suspension on the fly and effortlessly soak up the bumps big and small with 7.5" of adjustable suspension travel!XStrada TG inverted suspension fork details.  One of the highlights of the XStrada is its inverted suspension fork.  Our Nitrogen charged fork contains a titanium spring/MCU polymer stack, CNC machined crowns, fully adjustable pre-load/dampening and rebound, through axle, and 7.5" travel.Hands Down, we have created one of the most enjoyable riding experiences ever! Not too mention an outstanding value and the perfect four season, all-terrain adventure bike!   XStrada has hosted Demo Days at various venues across the USA and Canada, most events in cooperation with local bike shops. These are an ongoing effort for grassroots promotion and have been an excellent experience! The positive feedback on our prototype models have been very valuable and allowed us to make some great friends and future customers along the way.The XStrada is available in three frame sizes specifically designed to fit a wide spectrum of riders, each frame sports our massive 23x7.5" wheels and that outer diameter is factored into our size suggestions.  Our guide below is a very accurate reference but if you have any questions please don't hesitate to ask!  Placing your XStrada Pre-Order is very easy!Be sure to take advantage of our early adoption discounts! We are offering deals which are hundreds $$$ lower than our projected retail prices. 1st STEP - Determine if you want a single speed (perfect for casual riding, beaches or light trails) or our best value, the 11 speed wide range geared model (complete versatility for all terrain..A trail crusher!)​ 2nd STEP - If selecting an 11 speed model choose the component group you would like installed  (Shimano or SRAM groups include rear derailleurs, rear shifter, brand/model free hub body, cassette, cable/housing, chain) ​
3rd STEP - Massive Electric Boost?   The 52V/35ah (3KW) electric mid drive upgrade is compatible with both the single speed and any of the 11 speed groups we offer, it features 5 level pedal assist or full throttle control and can be ordered at the same time as the XStrada (installed/tuned) or anytime in the future and will fit our frame sets seamlessly.​
​​(Inquire about volume discounts or fleet sales)  XStrada XS1 - Single Speed DetailXStrada XS11 - 11 Speed CNC Machined Alloy Hub and Cassette Detail   Available Component Groups for the XStrada XS11 Complete SHIMANO SLX Equipped Bike Starts at - $1295.00 (first 25 sold) Complete SHIMANO XT Equipped Bike Starts at - $1495.00 (first 25 sold) Complete SHIMANO XTR Equipped Bike Starts at - $1795.00 (first 25 sold) Complete SRAM XX1 Equipped Bike Starts at - $1895.00 (first 25 sold)(Trigger Shift or Grip Shift Option - Please Indicate)The single speed or 11 speed can be coupled with our high torque electric mid-drive option to drastically extend the power and range of your ride.Speeds of up to 40 mph and a 35 mile range are attainable depending on rider weight and road/trail conditions!Much greater distance is achieved in pedal assist mode, where you receive supplemental  effortless power in tune with your pedal strokes through crank mounted sensors (5 preset levels or full throttle)Each Mid-Drive Option is installed and tested prior to shipment and is offered at a remarkable promotional crowdfund price of only $1249.00! (Eventual Retail Pricing for this package will exceed $1695.00)This includes a removable 52v/35ah Samsung lithium cell pack, waterproof housing and a mounted brushless middrive producing a massive 3000 watts (3kw).The controller and battery pack are contained in the weather proof case and are interfaced via our handlebar mounted throttle (available in full or half grip)   The XStrada throttle unit features a color LCD computer which uses GPS/Accelerometer technology for wireless speed/trip/odometer tracking and also controls master power switch, 5 level pedal assistance or pure throttle mode mode.Each XStrada GPS Throttle includes a master key for security and safetyA 110/220v smart charger is included in every XStrada EBike Upgrade to ensure prolonged battery life by automating a balanced cell bank charge, it can be switched from 3 amp (trickle @ 3hr full) to 5 amp (rapid @ 1.5hr full charge) As a sincere thank you to the early adopters we are offering a FREE XStrada Athletic TShirt to the first 25 units sold of each model! (also available in Womens)Be sure to select which size you would prefer at checkout (S-M-L-XL)Our R&D is complete, jigs and tooling designed, manufacturing relationships in place, component partners ready to fulfill any volume, final samples received and fully tested.   With these preliminary steps already taken our lead time to shipment will be drastically reduced!Our team is comprised of a talented and dedicated crew, based in both Canada and the USA, we are all cycling fanatics as well as industrial designers, marketing and logistics specialists!  Needless to say we all share the same vision, insight and attention to detail which will bring this project to light and on schedule for the world to enjoy.  If you have any questions at all please don't hesitate to reach out!We are raising funds to pay for an initial volume production of XStrada Fat Bikes to ensure a low per unit pricing. Should there be any unexpected setbacks we will be sure to keep our backers updated. We look forward to sharing our journey with all the new members of the XStrada family.

story:
Bisecu is attachable on normal spoke styles as shown on the image on the left. It cannot be mounted on special spoke types of wheels as shown on the image on the right.

 

 

 

The diameter of the bicycle's front wheel hub should be less than 72mm (= 2.83 Inches).

* Although the length is shorter than 72mm, it cannot be mounted on dynamo hubs.

 

 

 

Bisecu cannot be mounted on L-shaped forks as shown on the image on the right.
* It cannot be mounted on Thru Axle types.

 

 

 

The thickness of the fork should be 20mm (0.8 Inches) or less, and the width of the fork should be 40mm (1.6 Inches) or less for installation.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Q. Is Bisecu compatible with all types of bikes?

A. Bisecu can be mounted on most bikes except mountain bikes and specially designed bikes.

Q. How long does the battery last?

A. Battery last for 6 month with a single charge. With Bisecu's low-power technology, it can be used up to 6 months with a single charge. Charging uses the micro-usb port and it takes about 2 hours for full charge.

Q. Is Bisecu water resistant?

A. Bisecu has a high level of damp resistance and dust resistance performance for outdoor operations. It can be used in all weather. But we recommend you to not put Bisecu inside water.

Q. What happens if Bisecu battery dies and my bike is locked?

A. You can use portable charger to recharge Bisecu. Please charge Bisecu for about 3 minutes for immediate usage. 

Q. How do I know if I need to charge Bisecu

A. When battery life reaches less than 20%, the app will send you a notification as a reminder.

Q. Will Bisecu lock while I am riding?

A. Bisecu has 4 built-in precision motion sensors. If any of them senses a small motion, Bisecu will recognize that you are riding and never lock. In order to lock, all sensors must sense a stop for at least 5 seconds.

Q. How strong is the lock?

A. Bisecu is made of aluminium alloy with an un-cuttable cylinder design, which makes it as durable as vehicle outer cast.

Q. What if I lose my phone? 

A. You can use your preset password to unlock Bisecu manually using its exterior button. Login to Bisecu's App on a different phone to use Bisecu again.

Q. What phone does Bisecu App support?

A. Bisecu is compatible with iOS 8+ and Android 4.4+, and devices supporting Bluetooth 4.0.

Q. Do you ship internationally?

A. We do ship internationally, but shipping cost will vary depending on countries.

Q. How do I upgrade my perk?

A. https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526766-How-do-I-claim-a-Perk-

Q. I’m having trouble claiming a perk. Who should I reach out to?

A. Email support@indiegogo.com

Q. I would like a refund. How do I do this?

A. Bisecu team is not responsible for any kind of refund purchased through Indiegogo, thus you will have to communicate with Indiegogo. You could use following as a reference https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

Q. Where do I have to contact to offer business with Bisecu? (Sales, Distribution, Collaboration and more)

A. Please send us an e-mail at contact@bisecu.com
story_txt:
Everyone who uses a bike also needs a lock.But everyone dislikes the lock.
 
 

We always thought traditional bike locks have lots of problems. So we thought innovating the lock would make bike riding experience more pleasurable.
 
 
 

 

 
Bisecu is a fully automatic smart bike lock
 

Bisecu has a completely different form factor from traditional bike locks and with its unique design, it is integrated with IOT technology.  Bisecu is a worlds first smart bike lock that is fully automatic.
 
 

 

 
 
  
 
  
 
In addition Bisecu is designed to create a natural harmony with the bike while becoming part of the bike.
 
 

 

 
One of the key points of Bisecu is that your phone is the key to the lock. You can remotely lock and unlock Bisecu with your smartphone.
 
 
On automatic mode, Bisecu recognizes the distance of your phone and will lock automatically as you walk away and unlock as you approach. You do not need to carry your keys, locks anymore. This means that you can save your time by parking and just leave.
 
 

 

 
Bisecu’s locking mechanism is hidden from the outside covered with durable aluminum alloy. Therefore, cutting is arduous. The front wheels can not be rotated in the locked state.
 
 

 


 
Bisecu also has a built in alarm system so that when it is locked and senses a motion, 100db alarm will trigger while sending push notifications to your smart phone.
 
 
 
  
 


 
If you need long parking use additional connecting cables for double security. The cables are also linked with motion sensors within Bisecu so your smartphone is still the key to the lock.(Additional connecting cables are under development. Coming soon.)
 
 

      


 
The convenience of Bisecu comes from multiple safety devices with state of the art technology. Numerous tests have been conducted to verify reliability. Bisecu is never locked on the ride. Bisecu’s integrated 4 sensors sense even the smallest motion on the ride.
If any of these sensors sense your bike’s motion, auto-lock, lock does not operate. Thanks to these sensitive sensors, Bisecu will only be locked when your bike is at stop for at least 5 seconds. It does not matter whether your smartphone is turned off or the battery dies.
 

 

 


 
You can charge Bisecu through its micro USB cable. One Full charge takes only 2 hours and you can use it for up to 6 months. If the battery dies 1 minute charge will enable you to use bisecu for at least an hour so you can go home safely.
 
 

  

 
Traditional bike locks need to be bigger and heavier to have a better performance. Bisecu has a unique cylinder design so it is uncuttable and only ways 0.35kg. 
Once Bisecu is mounted on your bike you don’t need to worry about anything, just enjoy your ride.
 
 
 


 
 

 
Bisecu is not just a good looking lock but it is also a smart cycling device.
 

Providing you with accurate real time riding data such as time, distance, speed and even calories burnt through multiple motion sensors inside Bisecu.
The data is automatically saved and you can grasp your own driving information and set your goals to enjoy a smarter ride.
 
 

 

 
Try setting up a more precise goals by analyzing your daily saved riding data. Bisecu can be a good motivation for your cycling.
 
 

 

 

 
On the App you can easily share your bike and use it with many people.
 
 

 

 
Download now in the app store and google play store.
 
 

 

 
 
            Bisecu is attachable on normal spoke styles as shown on the image on the left. We do ship internationally, but shipping cost will vary depending on countries.Q. How do I upgrade my perk?A. https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526766-How-do-I-claim-a-Perk-Q. Bisecu team is not responsible for any kind of refund purchased through Indiegogo, thus you will have to communicate with Indiegogo. story:
At MIMO, we are riders and engineers.

Any folding bike user would know that the conventional hinge can often be stiff, making folding difficult and causing the bike to wobble over time. As a result, many don’t even fold their foldable bikes anymore.

Working with engineers and factories with more than 20 years of experience, MIMO brings you a revolutionary hinge with patented technology. 

The result is a high quality compact folding electric bike that folds smoothly. It is durable and safe, making it perfect for your day to day needs.

 

Your safety is our top priority. It is EN15194 certified, comes with one removable battery, and front and rear disc brakes.

 

Specification and comparisons

 

Risks & Challenges

We are on INDIEGOGO as we need your support to help bring this product to you. We ship world-wide, but do check with your local authorities on related regulations and possible taxation.

 

 

We want to hear from you on social media!

Reach out to us! Also check out latest update from our Facebook www.facebook.com/mimomotor

story:
Logic Research 2 Development LLC.

Lr2d.com

We are a product design company that needs your help in bring the Smart Trailer Kit to market. 

We know that this system will make the roads safer,  protect your equipment and maybe even save lives. 

Isn't it about time that vehicle trailers where smarter?

Do you wish you could see what was going on back there when you are pulling your trailer?

Detect problems, like a flat tire, before it becomes a lot worse.

Your funding will help us create a new standard for vehicle trailers that connects it to your smart phone and our Logic Gauge System(LGS) display. Gone would be the days of not knowing how you trailer is doing while you are pulling it. If it has a bad wheel bearing and is heating up. Or your trailer has a flat tire or is about to hit something or someone. Can I move over in traffic? Now you can know with your smart phone or our Logic Gauge System(LGS) which has some advanced feature like (gauges, advanced code reading, advanced data logging and more).

We have over 10 years experience in designing and marketing products and understand what it takes to get them to market and support.

Your Funding will be used to get the Smart Trailer System to market.

We will have different Smart Trailer Kits available and more options coming soon.

story:
A perfect package of design, engineering and art in a revolutionary way of transportation with a strong personality.


Help me to reach my goal contributing to the style of everyday transportation by riding. Don’t miss the chance to receive this masterpiece of Italian design in reward for your donation.


A "Sport Utility Vehicle / SUV" is defined as "a large vehicle that is designed to be used on rough surfaces but that is often used on city roads or highways”. The Carbon ebike is perhaps the most advanced concept of e-bike available today. It could be interpreted as a hybrid bicycle/motorcycle: a lightweight device which releases large amounts of power. Still a true bicycle that you can enjoy in every sense of the word, it offers you much more in terms of usability, performance and freedom: the SUV ebike®.

The Carbon SUV ebike is a superior e-bike in terms of performance, comfort, technology, and brand image.



"Crowdfunding edition"

Specifications 250w and 500w version (all components are from our trusted international suppliers)


  • COLOR - SPECIAL COLOR SET AS IN ABOVE PHOTO (CROWDFUNDING EDITION)
  • FRAME - CARBON/ALUMINUM ALLOY 
  • FRONT FORK - CARBON/CNC ALUMINIUM GIRDER FORK 
  • FRONT BRAKE - HYDRAULIC DISK BRAKE (400mm DISK) 
  • REAR BRAKE - HYDRAULIC DISK BRAKE (210 mm DISK) 
  • GEAR - GEAR 8 SPEED
  • SUSPENSION - GAS SHOCK ADSORBER 
  • DRIVE - CHAIN 
  • WHEELS - ALLOY RIM WITH STAINLESS SPOKES 
  • TIRES - 26X4,80 BALLON SIZE 
  • WEIGHT - WITHOUT BATTERY 62 lb (28,5 Kg)
  • MOTOR DRIVE SYSTEM - BRUSHLESS MOTOR. PEDAL ASSISTED DRIVE WITH TORQUE SENSOR INSIDE PEDAL AXLE 
  • BATTERY PACK - 36V 12Ah LITHIUM ION INSIDE
  • BATTERY CHARGE TIME - 6-8 HOURS
  • BATTERY AVERAGE LIFE - 1000 CHARGE CYCLE
  • AUTONOMY - 49 mi (80 Km)
  • MAX SPEED - 15.5 mph (25 Km/h) 250w VERSION,  18.0 mph (30 Km/h) 500w VERSION


Powered component in TOP version

  • FRONT BRAKE - HYDRAULIC DISK BRAKE MAGURA MT2 (400mm DISK) 
  • REAR BRAKE - HYDRAULIC DISK BRAKE MAGURA MT2 (210 mm) 
  • GEAR - SHIMANO NEXUS HUB GEAR 8 SPEED 
  • FRONT SUSPENSION - MARZOCCHI ROCO LIGHT GAS SHOCK ADSORBER 
  • REAR SUSPENSION - MARZOCCHI ROCO AIR TST 
  • MOTOR DRIVE SYSTEM - MOTO PARILLA MID BRUSHLESS MOTOR. PEDAL ASSISTED DRIVE WITH TORQUE SENSOR INSIDE PEDAL AXLE (TORQUE 54 Nm) + THROTTLE FUNCTION
  • MAX SPEED - 21.7 mph (35 Km/h)

Carbon TOP is equipped with Bikee Bike BEST 500W/749W. Click here to visit Bikee Bike crowdfunding campaign.





Engineering has to approve the basic proportions of an e-bike, and those basic proportions determine 60% of the design but an essential part of a successful styling process is to create a reaction from consumers ... and, hopefully, a compelling vision of the future direction of e-bikes development. Top e-bikes like Carbon are more than just simple transportation. They strangle attention. A combination of weapon-grade speed, sex, beauty and freedom found between two tires. Carbon is the icon of that.










Carbon SUV ebike is a durable choice for off-road riding in the country near home and in such remote regions as the open spaces of the Australian outback, Africa, the Middle East, Alaska, Canada, Iceland, South America, Russia; as well as in regions with limited paved roads, such as parts of Asia, that require vehicles capable of handling all kinds of terrains. The superb riding capabilities of Carbon SUV ebike provide a major safety advantage to people in areas with gravel roads in summer and snow and ice in winter, desert zones, dirty, rough roads outside cities, and in any extreme conditions such as riding through high water. 


TIMELINE






The Carbon SUV ebike features a carbon frame and an aluminium fork, leading-edge components and is designed around the latest bicycle technology. It will be manufactured in Asia and we can guarantee a world-class production cost-to-quality ratio. 

Manufacturing carbon e-bikes at top quality standards is significantly more difficult than manufacturing conventional e-bikes. There are only a handful of manufacturers that have the skill set and experience to do it properly. And I know them very well. 

The unique Carbon SUV ebike is quite different from the other e-bikes, even carbon e-bikes. Carbon SUV ebike needs closest attention to details to be manufactured to perfection. This is why I am overseeing the process in person, every single day: this is my full time job, my commitment and my passion. 

We will ship from Asia to anywhere around the world. All Carbon eBikes will come pre-tuned and ready to ride. However, we ask that you take it to your local bicycle shop for final, personalized tuning prior to your first ride. 

All units will be carefully packed for shipping. All orders will include online parcel tracking and insurance. Additional duties/taxes may apply depending on your destination country.




Some of my jobs





The impressively powerful carbon-fiber frame, with its mighty tubes, is engineered at a supplier where carbon-made products of other major brands are also produced. 


Perfect for every-day regular riding as well as fun riding, off-road trips and Uphill or Hill Climbing. Carbon SUV ebike, the Electric Bike with its powerful motor, climbs hills effortlessly and maintains great speed all the way to the top!








In 2014, the former Formula One team Caterham explored the possibility to include the Carbon SUV ebike project in a new two-wheeled family of its products. Unfortunately, the agreement was not eventually signed due to financial viability of the initiative at that time, though the product innovative concept, its design and technology were widely appreciated by Caterham funs. The official review on YouTube with over 3 million of visualizations has currently thousands of visits every day.








eMTB ... Fat Tire ... Carbon SUV ebike is a combination of stability, lightness and strength in a very different riding taste.


The Carbon SUV ebike 500 Watt TOP is equipped with revolutionary systems that make you move in a way you have never experienced before. With its 70 Nm peak, it kicks you forward. It gets from 0 to 35 km/h in few seconds.



Available Carbon Sizes







Risks and challenges


MANUFACTURING: Risks exist in mass production that can potentially slow the process, but my team is experienced about this kind of issues. This will minimize the risk of delays.

FULFILLMENT: There is no guarantee that no unexpected difficulty will arise, such as issues with supplies, production delays, missing schedules, etc. However, for the reasons above, we are confident that we can ensure a smooth operating process.

Every pledged amount brings us one step closer to my goal. Contribute to enhance the beauty and the capabilities of moving people around the world. Please share my page and thank you for your support!







How high can the seat extend?

The seat can extend a full 1,9” (5 cm).

What is the difference between torque sensor and speed sensor systems?

Torque sensor drive system is suitable for offroad uses. Carbon e-bike is equipped with torque sensor system.

Where the battery is placed?

With an effortless push of a button, you’ll access to the battery inside the frame lifting the cover.

Is the battery replaceable?

It is replaceable.

How can I repair the bike by myself?

We will launch details maintenance instruction videos on our website. And we will work together with some bike shops to let you easily send and repair your bike in the future.

Can it be picked up locally ?

No. At this point in time we are not offering local pick up.

When will I receive my Carbon SUV eBike?

Please refer to the Timeline graphic above.

How can I contact Zeno?

If you have questions including tech questions, business co-operation, media interview and more, please send to info@motoparilla.it

Can we have more technical details about Carbon?

I am awarded of the importance to provide more and more evidences to prove the technical feasibility of the Carbon but actually these technical factors are banal issues manageable by almost any graduate engineer while only a handful of men on the earth can design the aesthetic of the Carbon.

So, in my head, this is the gold of the project. The emotion, what makes feel us live …. the shape of the beauty.

However, Carbon is not a toy nor just a dream. Since I managed the entire design and industrialization of several ebikes and electric/gasoline scooters I am confident to do a professional job.

Actually we want to produce a NOT-extreme eMTB bike. In our interpretation the sense of a SUV vehicle is to be huge and fabulous, stable and comfortable to ride on all kind of terrain.

We believe to be very honest offering a such innovative e-bike very close to the production cost.

Nevertheless, with your feedback, you are giving us an important chance to better communicate our technological and industrial choices.
story_txt:
A perfect package of design, engineering and art in a revolutionary way of transportation with a strong personality.



Help me to reach my goal contributing to the style of everyday transportation by riding. Don’t miss the chance to receive this masterpiece of Italian design in reward for your donation.





A "Sport Utility Vehicle / SUV" is defined as "a large vehicle that is designed to be used on rough surfaces but that is often used on city roads or highways”. The Carbon ebike is perhaps the most advanced concept of e-bike available today. It could be interpreted as a hybrid bicycle/motorcycle: a lightweight device which releases large amounts of power. Still a true bicycle that you can enjoy in every sense of the word, it offers you much more in terms of usability, performance and freedom: the SUV ebike®.

The Carbon SUV ebike is a superior e-bike in terms of performance, comfort, technology, and brand image.






"Crowdfunding edition"Specifications 250w and 500w version (all components are from our trusted international suppliers)



COLOR - SPECIAL COLOR SET AS IN ABOVE PHOTO (CROWDFUNDING EDITION)
FRAME - CARBON/ALUMINUM ALLOY 
FRONT FORK - CARBON/CNC ALUMINIUM GIRDER FORK 
FRONT BRAKE - HYDRAULIC DISK BRAKE (400mm DISK) 
REAR BRAKE - HYDRAULIC DISK BRAKE (210 mm DISK) 
GEAR - GEAR 8 SPEED
SUSPENSION - GAS SHOCK ADSORBER 
DRIVE - CHAIN 
WHEELS - ALLOY RIM WITH STAINLESS SPOKES 
TIRES - 26X4,80 BALLON SIZE 
WEIGHT - WITHOUT BATTERY 62 lb (28,5 Kg)
MOTOR DRIVE SYSTEM - BRUSHLESS MOTOR. PEDAL ASSISTED DRIVE WITH TORQUE SENSOR INSIDE PEDAL AXLE 
BATTERY PACK - 36V 12Ah LITHIUM ION INSIDE
BATTERY CHARGE TIME - 6-8 HOURS
BATTERY AVERAGE LIFE - 1000 CHARGE CYCLE
AUTONOMY - 49 mi (80 Km)
MAX SPEED - 15.5 mph (25 Km/h) 250w VERSION,  18.0 mph (30 Km/h) 500w VERSION




Powered component in TOP version

FRONT BRAKE - HYDRAULIC DISK BRAKE MAGURA MT2 (400mm DISK) 
REAR BRAKE - HYDRAULIC DISK BRAKE MAGURA MT2 (210 mm) 
GEAR - SHIMANO NEXUS HUB GEAR 8 SPEED 
FRONT SUSPENSION - MARZOCCHI ROCO LIGHT GAS SHOCK ADSORBER 
REAR SUSPENSION - MARZOCCHI ROCO AIR TST 
MOTOR DRIVE SYSTEM - MOTO PARILLA MID BRUSHLESS MOTOR. PEDAL ASSISTED DRIVE WITH TORQUE SENSOR INSIDE PEDAL AXLE (TORQUE 54 Nm) + THROTTLE FUNCTION
MAX SPEED - 21.7 mph (35 Km/h)




Carbon TOP is equipped with Bikee Bike BEST 500W/749W. Click here to visit Bikee Bike crowdfunding campaign.





Engineering has to approve the basic proportions of an e-bike, and those basic proportions determine 60% of the design but an essential part of a successful styling process is to create a reaction from consumers ... and, hopefully, a compelling vision of the future direction of e-bikes development. Top e-bikes like Carbon are more than just simple transportation. They strangle attention. A combination of weapon-grade speed, sex, beauty and freedom found between two tires. Carbon is the icon of that.


















Carbon SUV ebike is a durable choice for off-road riding in the country near home and in such remote regions as the open spaces of the Australian outback, Africa, the Middle East, Alaska, Canada, Iceland, South America, Russia; as well as in regions with limited paved roads, such as parts of Asia, that require vehicles capable of handling all kinds of terrains. The superb riding capabilities of Carbon SUV ebike provide a major safety advantage to people in areas with gravel roads in summer and snow and ice in winter, desert zones, dirty, rough roads outside cities, and in any extreme conditions such as riding through high water. 



TIMELINE









The Carbon SUV ebike features a carbon frame and an aluminium fork, leading-edge components and is designed around the latest bicycle technology. It will be manufactured in Asia and we can guarantee a world-class production cost-to-quality ratio. 

Manufacturing carbon e-bikes at top quality standards is significantly more difficult than manufacturing conventional e-bikes. There are only a handful of manufacturers that have the skill set and experience to do it properly. And I know them very well. 
The unique Carbon SUV ebike is quite different from the other e-bikes, even carbon e-bikes. Carbon SUV ebike needs closest attention to details to be manufactured to perfection. This is why I am overseeing the process in person, every single day: this is my full time job, my commitment and my passion. 
We will ship from Asia to anywhere around the world. All Carbon eBikes will come pre-tuned and ready to ride. However, we ask that you take it to your local bicycle shop for final, personalized tuning prior to your first ride. 
All units will be carefully packed for shipping. All orders will include online parcel tracking and insurance. Additional duties/taxes may apply depending on your destination country.








Some of my jobs







The impressively powerful carbon-fiber frame, with its mighty tubes, is engineered at a supplier where carbon-made products of other major brands are also produced. 



Perfect for every-day regular riding as well as fun riding, off-road trips and Uphill or Hill Climbing. Carbon SUV ebike, the Electric Bike with its powerful motor, climbs hills effortlessly and maintains great speed all the way to the top!











In 2014, the former Formula One team Caterham explored the possibility to include the Carbon SUV ebike project in a new two-wheeled family of its products. Unfortunately, the agreement was not eventually signed due to financial viability of the initiative at that time, though the product innovative concept, its design and technology were widely appreciated by Caterham funs. The official review on YouTube with over 3 million of visualizations has currently thousands of visits every day.











eMTB ... Fat Tire ... Carbon SUV ebike is a combination of stability, lightness and strength in a very different riding taste.



The Carbon SUV ebike 500 Watt TOP is equipped with revolutionary systems that make you move in a way you have never experienced before. With its 70 Nm peak, it kicks you forward. It gets from 0 to 35 km/h in few seconds.





Available Carbon Sizes












Risks and challenges

MANUFACTURING: Risks exist in mass production that can potentially slow the process, but my team is experienced about this kind of issues. This will minimize the risk of delays.
FULFILLMENT: There is no guarantee that no unexpected difficulty will arise, such as issues with supplies, production delays, missing schedules, etc. However, for the reasons above, we are confident that we can ensure a smooth operating process.
Every pledged amount brings us one step closer to my goal. Contribute to enhance the beauty and the capabilities of moving people around the world. Please share my page and thank you for your support!

The seat can extend a full 1,9” (5 cm).

Torque sensor drive system is suitable for offroad uses. Carbon e-bike is equipped with torque sensor system.
Where the battery is placed?
With an effortless push of a button, you’ll access to the battery inside the frame lifting the cover.
Is the battery replaceable?
It is replaceable.
How can I repair the bike by myself?
We will launch details maintenance instruction videos on our website. And we will work together with some bike shops to let you easily send and repair your bike in the future.
Can it be picked up locally ?
No. At this point in time we are not offering local pick up.
When will I receive my Carbon SUV eBike?
Please refer to the Timeline graphic above.
How can I contact Zeno?
If you have questions including tech questions, business co-operation, media interview and more, please send to info@motoparilla.it
Can we have more technical details about Carbon?
I am awarded of the importance to provide more and more evidences to prove the technical feasibility of the Carbon but actually these technical factors are banal issues manageable by almost any graduate engineer while only a handful of men on the earth can design the aesthetic of the Carbon. 
So, in my head, this is the gold of the project. The emotion, what makes feel us live …. the shape of the beauty. 
However, Carbon is not a toy nor just a dream. Since I managed the entire design and industrialization of several ebikes and electric/gasoline scooters I am confident to do a professional job. 
Actually we want to produce a NOT-extreme eMTB bike. In our interpretation the sense of a SUV vehicle is to be huge and fabulous, stable and comfortable to ride on all kind of terrain.
We believe to be very honest offering a such innovative e-bike very close to the production cost. 
Nevertheless, with your feedback, you are giving us an important chance to better communicate our technological and industrial choices.

story:
*Features listed are based on G-Bike Pro model. For additional details, please check our spec sheet below.

 

Our team began developing e-bike conversion kits since 2011, with a dream to create greener, cleaner, and more affordable transportation. Since then we have received numerous awards and patents with our e-Bike kits.


In 2015, we decided to develop and build full fledged electric bikes, in addition to our kits. With successful delivery of our first generation G-Bike in 2016, we began development for G-Bike's 2nd generation using valuable feedback from G-Bike users.

We are coming to Indiegogo for our 2nd generation G-Bikes because we believe that with Indiegogo we’ll be able to scale up production and deliver G-Bike at its most affordable price ever.

 

Here are some of pictures of our first generation G-Bikes that were produced in small scale last year. This has been a deep learning experience in terms of development, manufacturing for us. This year, we plan to QA each bike ourselves when they are manufactured to ensure the quality of each bike before we start shipping.

With Our previous production experience, we do not over promise on delivery date but a delivery date that we can keep. With E-bikes delivered just in time for spring, you can take full advantage of the riding season.

 

 

Do I need a license to ride the G-Bike?

We made G-Bike, so it can be used without a license in most parts of the world.

Maximum speed: 15.5 mph/25 kph

Maximum motor output: 250 W

Maximum bike weight: 43 lbs/20 kg

Please check with your own local law requirements to make sure G-Bike is able to be ridden without a license.

How Long does Battery last?
The Longevity of the battery would largely depend on the use of the battery. Our Battery will retain approximately 80% of its full capacity after 1000 cycles of charging/discharging. 

Can I order G-Bike although I don’t live in the US?

Yes, G-Bike is available for delivery anywhere in the world!

How much does shipping cost?

Shipping will depend on your region! Once you’ve selected a perk and delivery address, shipping costs will be calculated.

When does it ship?

We promise to ship your G-Bike in April 2018. Just in time for riding season!

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

As we cannot estimated these for every country, our shipping fee only covers actual cost of the shipping. However, we'll make sure that the shipments are marked as gift as it is a thank you gift for your contribution to our campaign.

Are test rides available?

Test rides are available in California. Please email us at info@greenwheelbike.com to set up a test drive!

Can I get a refund?

Please refer to Indiegogo refund policy. https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/213172367-How-to-Process-a-Refund

What colors are available?

Matte White and Black are available!

What is the top speed for the bike?

G-Bike’s maximum speed is 15.5 mph/25 kph. With pedaling you can reach up to 22 mph/35 kph.

Do I need to wear a helmet?

Helmet is not required in the US if you are 18+. However, please check with your local laws to be sure as they are required in some places.

How much does G-Bike weigh?

G-bike is 37 lbs and the battery is 6 lbs.

Is the G-Bike easy to assemble?

The G-Bike comes fully assembled!

How long does it take to charge?

4 to 5 hours for your battery to be fully charged.

Can I still ride the bike when the battery runs out?

Yes you can! G-Bike has mechanical gears in addition to the electric motor.

Does G-Bike come in different sizes?

Nope, both models of G-Bike are the same size.

What about any replacement parts I may need?

Any replacement parts that are needed, can be found and ordered through our website here (greenwheelbike.com).

story:
The Event

The annual Power Racing competition at MakerFaire Bay Area is a contest where grown men and women race against each other using hot-rodded Power Wheels toy cars. It is glorious and hilarious, and this year I'm building a car to race in the competition and I could use your support. 

The event takes place on the weekend of May 20th-21st at the Bay Area Maker Faire in San Mateo, CA. It is open to the public and it is an incredible amount of fun. 

Who I Am

I'm Donald Bell and I run a site and YouTube channel called Maker Project Lab. I'm a former Project Editor with Make: magazine. I produce a weekly DIY roundup video called Maker Update. I love taking on challenges like this and I'm excited to finally race in a Power Racing Series competition. This is my debut as a Power Racer, and I want go big.
 

Why I Could Use Your Money

This is my first truly ambitious DIY project. To make a competition worthy vehicle capable of sustaining speeds of up to 20 mph without falling apart, I'll need the help of my team and the financial help of my extended team of supporters -- you guys!

The racing rules require certain aspects of the car to fall within a $500 budget. Items such as batteries, safety equipment, brakes, helmets, and all necessary tools fall outside of this budget, however. I have already invested over $1,000 on this endeavor and it would mean a lot to me and our team if your support could offset the cost of this ambitious and adorable electric car.

To show our appreciation, we've worked with local illustrator Josh Ellingson (whom we'd also like to give some money for his effort) to create a sticker and pin design that fans of my mine or fans of Power Racing will be excited to get their hands on.

Also, don't you just kinda want to tell people that you're sponsoring a mini race car called "Kitty Grabs Back"? Don't you want to be a part of making that exist in the world? Of course you do!

The Car

Some people choose their cars, Sometimes, the car chooses you. When you're searching through Craigslist for used, cheap Power Wheels, you have to jump on the first good offer you find. In my case, a dad in El Cerrito was offloading a non-functional Hello Kitty branded ride-on car he'd bought at Target for his daughter. $25 later, the car was mine. 

Maybe it was the Audi-style chrome bow on the grille, or maybe it was just the thought of a grown man driving in a Hello Kitty car -- but it was love at first sight.

The stock specs on this thing are about as bad as it gets. It's much smaller than most name brand Power Wheels (this one's made by Dynacraft) and aside from the shell it's a total gut job. 

We're rebuilding every functional part of this car from steel -- the frame, the axles, steering, gearing, wheel hubs -- all custom. The end result is going to be a dual-motor, 24v speed demon based on the excellent design work of Volpin Props' Marriott Chariot.

For power, we're going a little extreme. The 24v supplied to the motors will be provided from a stack of rechargeable Lithium Ion battery packs salvaged from a Nissan Leaf. These are known as Leaf cells, they're not cheap (and hard to come by the real thing), and take some knowhow to wire up without creating some impromptu fireworks. Fortunately, I'm not doing this alone.

The Team

I've got a great team helping me make this car a reality. Jordan Bunker is a former Technical Editor with Make: magazine (where we worked together), currently working as an evangelist for Hackaday. He has an amazing knowledge of fabrication techniques. He's already built and raced a car for Power Racing Series, and he's also worked to setup and referee several races over the years. Jordan is my secret weapon.

What We Need

  • We're asking for $2,000 to cover the cost of making the car, buying additional tools, paying our illustrator, paying Indiegogo, and paying for making the stickers and enamel pins.
  • A complete breakdown of car component expenses can be viewed here.

What You Get

We're offering four tiers of rewards with this campaign. Both the sticker and the enamel label pin will be based on Josh Ellingson's final illustration based on this initial sketch.

$5 - Tip Jar donation. Every dollar helps!

$25 - Kitty Grabs Back Sticker

$40 - Kitty Grabs Back Enamel Pin & Sticker

$50 - Autographed Team Photo, Enamel Pin & Sticker

The Impact

First let me just say that this project has already been extraordinary fun and educational for me as a Maker. But ultimately, you're helping to manifest some silliness (and a bit of political cheekiness) into the world, proudly on display at one of the world's biggest Show & Tell events -- Maker Faire.

Risks & Challenges

At the time of writing this, we are already halfway through the build of the car. All the parts have been purchased. Most of the welding has been completed. Things are on track for the team to complete the build with weeks to spare for giving the car some good practice runs.

The biggest challenge in front of us is figuring out how to reliably charge and work with the Leaf cell batteries. These batteries can't be charged from a standard R/C battery system, but instead need a repurposed high-watt server rack power supply to provide enough juice. It's new territory for everyone on the team, but we have a handful of experienced advisors in the Power Racing community eager to help us through it.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even a small donation is a big help with this tiny race car. But if you just can't swing it, please consider using the share buttons here to help us get the word out.

Also, this is my first time using crowdfunding to help tackle a fun, ambitious build, but I plan on doing more projects like this in the future. To keep an eye on what I've got cooking next, subscribe to my YouTube channel.

story:
Pentru limba română apasă aici.

The Idea

ecoVelo will offer a simple, enjoyable and eco-friendly transportation solution to locals and tourists near Orheiul Vechi historical site in Moldova.

ecoVelo will be open to everyone to explore the beautiful surrounding of Orheiul Vechi and nearby villages! We will provide tourists with brochures that include suggested routes and tips for safety. Unique landscapes all around provide numerous challenging rides for both the enthusiastic cyclist and casual rider.

Location

The Impact

Currently, more than 20,000 people visit Orheiul Vechi and Trebujeni every summer. Orheiul Vechi historical site, being considered for inclusion on the World Heritage List by UNESCO, is the top touristic destination in Moldova.

In partnership with local inns, we want to attract more tourists to the area and help them explore the picturesque hills and valleys around the village of Trebujeni. At the moment, there is no transportation alternative in the area. The only option is walking and hiking, however this limits sightseeing.

ecoVelo will target tourists passing through Trebujeni or Butuceni villages, who are either cycling enthusiasts without bikes or visitors who would like to try cycling. They can rent the bicycles for a nominal fee (to cover maintenance costs) and explore the surroundings by themselves or follow marked trails.

“The historic-cultural and natural complex Orheiul Vechi consists from a genuine blast of natural citadels, which were used to hide people for centuries beginning from the Palaeolithic time till our days. The complex occupies seven headlands with significant amplitude, fascinating from the landscape point of view.” unesco.org

What We Need

Our goal is to raise $3,800 to jump-start ecoVelo in June, 2013.

Estimated Project Costs

 

Marketing

We will market the service by creating a simple informational website in English and Romanian & create a Facebook page. We will place listings on relevant travel websites like tripadvisor.com and on partner websites. We are also partnering with Vila Roz, who will donate space and employee time to the project.

The Team

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word and share us on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, with friends, family and like-minded supporters.  

  • Comment, Like & Retweet this page!
  • Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ecovelomoldova
  • Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ecoVeloMoldova
  • Contact us by EMAIL ecovelomd[at]gmail.com replace [at] with @.

The project will be caried out in June, 2013. Please contribute! Thank you!

In the Media

Radio

  • Radio Chișinău,  "Familia Diminescu cu Liviu și Victoria" show, 13/05/2013, 9:30am

Web Publications

  • Timpul.md online, targets the Romanian speaking readership in Romania and the Republic of Moldova: 

    Serviciu nou pentru turiștii care vizitează Orheiul Vechi

  • Unimedia.md

    ecoVelo - Serviciu nou de bike-sharing la Orheiul Vechi finanțat prin crowdfunding

  • Ecology.md: EcoVelo serviciu de bike-sharing la Orheiul Vechi
story_txt:
Pentru limba română apasă aici.
The Idea
ecoVelo will offer a simple, enjoyable and eco-friendly transportation solution to locals and tourists near Orheiul Vechi historical site in Moldova.
ecoVelo will be open to everyone to explore the beautiful surrounding of Orheiul Vechi and nearby villages! We will provide tourists with brochures that include suggested routes and tips for safety. Unique landscapes all around provide numerous challenging rides for both the enthusiastic cyclist and casual rider.
Location

The Impact
Currently, more than 20,000 people visit Orheiul Vechi and Trebujeni every summer. Orheiul Vechi historical site, being considered for inclusion on the World Heritage List by UNESCO, is the top touristic destination in Moldova.
In partnership with local inns, we want to attract more tourists to the area and help them explore the picturesque hills and valleys around the village of Trebujeni. At the moment, there is no transportation alternative in the area. The only option is walking and hiking, however this limits sightseeing.

ecoVelo will target tourists passing through Trebujeni or Butuceni villages, who are either cycling enthusiasts without bikes or visitors who would like to try cycling. They can rent the bicycles for a nominal fee (to cover maintenance costs) and explore the surroundings by themselves or follow marked trails.
“The historic-cultural and natural complex Orheiul Vechi consists from a genuine blast of natural citadels, which were used to hide people for centuries beginning from the Palaeolithic time till our days. The complex occupies seven headlands with significant amplitude, fascinating from the landscape point of view.” unesco.org


What We Need
Our goal is to raise $3,800 to jump-start ecoVelo in June, 2013.
Estimated Project Costs


 

Marketing
We will market the service by creating a simple informational website in English and Romanian & create a Facebook page. We will place listings on relevant travel websites like tripadvisor.com and on partner websites. We are also partnering with Vila Roz, who will donate space and employee time to the project.

The Team

 
Other Ways You Can Help
Please spread the word and share us on Facebook, Twitter, Google+, with friends, family and like-minded supporters.  

Comment, Like & Retweet this page!
Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ecovelomoldova

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ecoVeloMoldova

Contact us by EMAIL ecovelomd[at]gmail.com replace [at] with @.

The project will be caried out in June, 2013. Please contribute! Thank you!

Radio

Serviciu nou pentru turiștii care vizitează Orheiul Vechi

story:
Proceeds from the ride support the Friends of the Somerville Public Library and the installation of a public bike pump at Central Branch.

********** 

The Friends of the Somerville Public Library and the Somerville Bicycle Committee are organizing a 6-mile bike ride round the three Somerville library branches on May 3rd starting at 9am. This involves a stop at each for kids activities / refreshments / tours etc. 

Our Beacon Street neighbors Whole Foods are providing refreshments midway, and you can look forward to a bite courtesy of Union Square Donuts and coffee at the starting line. This is an early May event so check the weather and perhaps dress warm. Thick tweed might be an idea... Prizes will be given to best dressed man, woman and child (and bicycle!) thanks to Archival Clothing, Tretorn, and Redbones. 

There is room for 80 riders ($5 adults, kids free) and a variety of support levels on the right. With the strong local crowd of Library Friends, Somerville Bike Committee folk, residents and patrons, and bike builder/embrocation nerds (in a good way!) - we hope these tickets will go fast. 9am check-in at West Branch (40 College Avenue near Davis Square) for 9:30am start. Proposed route map here (subject to tweaks). We are very fortunate to have 4 bike mounted Somerville Police officers escorting us.

Why are we doing this?

The aim of this event is to introduce Somerville residents to our three historic branch libraries, and use it as a teachable moment in regards to the online Minuteman library system that allows all Boston/Cambridge/Somerville area residents to borrow from each other's library holdings. 

And with the outdoor component it will be a celebration of mind and body. On that note we are raising funds to install a permanent bike pump outside the Central Library on Highland Ave. Working in conjunction with the City of Somerville on the installation, we are currently considering this Dero model as above. We will add a stretch goal of loaner bike tools and 2 more bike pumps for the other branches if we can reach over $800 raised. 

Support the Library Ride at $50 and get a 24oz-canvas ice/coal/book/market/tote like this - made in Charlestown, MA by Textile Buff & Wheel Co. Hand stamped in Somerville.


We also have a smaller reward of these hand-tooled leather bookmarks emblazoned with SPL (for Somerville Public Library) - incase you just can't finish Moby Dick in one sitting... Undyed leather, fabricated here in Somerville.


Volunteer

Would you like to fore-run the course? Can you fix-a-flat? We need 10 tech types to lead and follow the pack, ride ahead and be available to assist with breakdowns. Sound like you?? Leave a comment as you checkout. Or email at friendssomervillepubliclibrary@gmail.com


Friends of the Somerville Public Library 
The Friends of the Somerville Public Library is a not-for-profit organization that helps the library and its branches to provide programs, services and materials not covered by the library's normal operating budget. It is 100% staffed by volunteers.

The Friends provide funds for the popular Museum Passes program, license fees for movie screenings, co-sponsor Somerville Reads and more, so the Library can offer a variety of children's, young adult, and adult programs which range from puppet shows to poetry readings. More info at facebook.com/FriendsOfTheSomervillePublicLibrary, on twitter @Friends_SPL, or via email at friendssomervillepubliclibrary@gmail.com. 

The Somerville Bicycle Committee
The Somerville Bicycle Committee was established by a Board of Aldermen ordinance in 2001. The committee works to improve conditions for bicyclists in the City of Somerville, promote bicycling as a means of transportation, improve safety conditions for bicyclists, and to help implement policy, programs, and bike routes for all ages. More info at http://www.somervillebikes.org/about.html.

story:
Matt is the Love of my Life.

  • He's the best person I've ever met. And he really needs our help.
  • Not only do I believe funds can be raised to replace his wheel, but I believe his heart will mend.

He needs a need front wheel. And it's not cheap...

  • Matt put in over a grand on the entire bike because it is his only way to get around town, without my camry of course. So that front wheel was pricey! I honestly don't know how much. But more than the average prom dress?

His Heart needs healing.

In the five+ years we've been together. I have never seen him cry. And today. Was almost that day. But I believe in people! We can turn that FROWN UPSIDE DOWN!

If you can't slip him a few bills...

Then please, please tell him you love him. It would mean a lot to me.

-Marsha, his partner/ love of his life/ gf/ fiance/ wifey/ whatever

story: Miguel and his family live in Circle C. Every morning, Miguel takes his younger brother to Kiker, then returns home to catch the bus to Bowie. On the morning of April 1st, Miguel was hit by a car after dropping his brother at Kiker. The wife had waved him through the intersection, and the husband (who was driving) didn't notice. The couple stopped to help, but Miguel waved them off, since he didn't want to miss the bus to Bowie. Luckily Miguel wasn't hurt seriously, but his bike is now unrideable. Please help by donating to the cost of repair/replacement. Any additional monies raised will be donated to Kiker and Clayton Elementaries to use for bike safety education. Thank you!

story:
" 6.5 " is a beautifully designed smart e-boat with a lot of features at an affordable price !

We are proud to receive hundreds of messages and congratulations from all over the world !

It's now time to share our pleasure with you, and give you the opportunity to enjoy this little "jewel" with your kids!

 

 

THE MOST BEAUTIFUL MINI E-BOAT EVER

Sleek and Functional DESIGN !

What you’re looking at here is the world’s first electric and eco-friendly mini eBoat, now on the market – " the Jimboats 6.5".

 

 

That’s remarkable. How big is it?

It’s just 6.5ft long – that’s exactly 2m. That’s a full half meter less than the beam of a Sea Ray 190 sportsboat, for example.

Width is : 3.3 ft / 100 cm and it needs only 1 foot of water to go !

 

Astonishing. So it would fit in the back of my pick-up?

Absolutely! In fact, here is a shot of it in the bed of a double cab.

 

What makes it go?

A "standard" 500W - 12 Volts electric motor providing 55lb of thrust spins a 3 blades propeller that is concealed within a tunnel, safe from dangling legs or swimmers.

 

How fast is it?

With the 500W "standard" motor, the speed is 6.5 Mph ( 5.5 knots ), controlled by a five-step throttle (limitable). It provides complete control for a smooth ride.

It also offers a single-speed reverse.

Good sensations and nice acceleration, all pleasure !

 

And how long will it run for?

About four hours on a full charge. 4 hours of pure pleasure !

 

Is it just for kids, or can grownups have a play?

It’s aimed predominantly at children, but small adults (up to 5ft 6in and 155lbs) can have a go.

 

 

 

Overall dimensions and weight :

  • Length:    6.5 ft / 200 cm   –   Can be carried in a pickup or a van !
  • Width:   3.3 ft / 100 cm
  • Draft:   1 ft / 30 cm
  • Weight capacity :   155 lbs / 70 kg
  • Total vessel weight ( battery included ):   55 kg / 121 lbs

Propulsion specs:

  • Compatibility with saltwater/freshwater
  • 100% electric - no engine noise
  • Zero CO2 emission ( eco-friendly )
  • "Standard" 500W - 12Volts electric motor providing 55 lbs of thrust to spin a 3 blades propeller
  • Five-step throttle (limitable) and a single-speed reverse provides complete control for a smooth ride
  • General circuit breaker with a removable key

Security :

You can stop the boat anytime with the motor remote kill switch !

The transmission distance of the remote control is up to 300 feet !

 

- Unsinkable thanks to 4 watertight compartments

Safeness: all the corners and the keel are "crash boxes"

- Protected propeller

This "standard" 500W - 55lb of thrust electric motor spins a 3 blades propeller that is concealed within a tunnel, safe from dangling legs or swimmers. You can upgrade the power and top speed of your JimBoats 6.5 by getting the "Upgrade to 750 W motor" perk ! (see below)

 

Security, security and SECURITY !

- Non-skid floor , seat and backrest in non-absorbent foam by Seadeck®

Get your name engraved on the backrest in place of "JimBoats" !

Choose the " Custom Name " Perk !

- Waterproof Marine Stereo and Speakers:

Power :   2 x 40 watts - FM / AM radio – MP3 - USB input - AUX input - Bluetooth

Enjoy your favorite songs everywhere !

5 Led - Battery gauge

You can know, at any time, the level of your battery !

- 2 stainless steel folding cleats

- 1 cup holder +  2 fishing rod holders

Going fishing anywhere will become a great adventure !

It can turn around in a small space.

6.5 is very maneuverable !

 

 

And also, 2 kids can fit !

 

 

Kids can have fun towing !

 

TESTED TO THE BOUNDARIES ( Overloaded )

 

 

Upgrade your 6.5 to 750W motor !

 

You can upgrade the power and top speed of your JimBoats 6.5 by getting

the "Upgrade to 750 W motor" perk.

With the "standard" 500W motor, the speed is 6.5 Mph ( 5.5 knots )

Upgrade to 750W motor and access to a top speed of 8 Mph ( 7 knots )

More powerful motor for more performance !

 

Unlimited Colors

Make your 6.5 unique by choosing your color with the Perk "Unlimited Color / Vinyl perk"!

Any color/Any Vinyl you want !

 After pledging for "Jimboats 6.5" on Indiegogo, you can send us by eMail any color or custom vinyl you like at: kmaboats@gmail.com , and we print it on the boat!

Attention: In order to get a custom color, you have to buy the "Unlimited Color / Vinyl perk".

 

Custom Name

 

Get your Name engraved on the backrest ! 

 After pledging for "Jimboats 6.5" on Indiegogo,send us by eMail your Name at: kmaboats@gmail.com , and we engrave it on the backrest !

 

 

Please share the love and spread the word about our campaign to help us reach the stretch goals listed below and “UNLOCK” all the extra goodies to come with your eBoat JimBoats 6.5 for FREE.

 

When you refer your friends and help spread the word about our campaign, we reward you with special bonuses. Please read this section carefully to find out how to participate in this contest. Click Here

 

 

1. Do you ship JimBoats 6.5 worldwide ?

Yes, JimBoats 6.5 is shipped worldwide (United States, Canada, Europe and Australia, etc...).  On the payment menu, you can check if the shipping is available to your country.

2. Does the price of a perk include the shipping charge ? 

The price does not include the shipping charge. If you select your country on the payment menu, you can check the shipping charge based on your country. 

For example, the shipping charge to United States for "Early Bird" is $199  USD. 

3. Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT for international orders?

Import duty tax or VAT may need to be paid if your country requires it.

4. Is there a warranty on my JimBoats 6.5 ?

Yes. We will offer one year limited warranty on all JimBoats 6.5.

Note: this does not cover damages incurred by rider usage. Any alteration, tampering or modification of the electronics, battery, controller, motor or related electrical wiring will not be serviced or supported by JimBoats and will void the warranty.

5. How long will JimBoats 6.5 run for?

4 hours depending on the weight of the crew and the wind. It could be more than 6 hours at medium speed !

6. Does the price of my JimBoats 6.5 include the battery ?

It depends on your perk choice. There are some perks without battery: " Light Bird", "Sound Bird" and "Rental Bird". We offer this option to reduce the shipping cost and the selling price.

7. What about the battery?

Our goal is not to earn money by selling batteries or to force you to buy our batteries. We decided to use "Marine grade Bluetop" batteries from Optima. You can always buy other brands of deep cycle batteries.

    You can buy these batteries everywhere in the world !

8. How long does it take to fully charge the battery ?

For a JimBoats 6.5  with standard "D34M"- 55Ah battery, approximately 5 hours with the specific "Optima battery charger" or 7~9 hours and with a "classic" battery charger for cars, trucks etc...

9. What is the maximum size to ride a JimBoats 6.5 mini boat ?

We recommend under 170cm (5'6") for the best riding experience.

10. What is the maximum weight to ride a JimBoats 6.5 mini boat ?

We recommend under 70kgs (155lbs) for the best riding experience.

11. Where can JimBoats 6.5 mini boat be serviced?

JimBoats 6.5 mini boat is designed to be simple enough for anyone to replace parts on their own. We will provide written and video documentation of possible replacement processes.

 

Other Ways You Can Help :


If you like the 6.5 Jimboats, turn that into action ! Even if you aren’t able to get a 6.5 Jimboats right now, spread the word and promote our project.  Join the community, tell a friend, come have fun with us.

Use your favorite social networks and Indiegogo's sharing tools !
 
- You can find them on the top right of this page :
 

Visit our website : jimboats.com

Our Facebook page : JimBoats 6.5 by KMA 

Many thanks again for your warm support !

SAFETY RULES :

6.5 isn’t a toy like any other, its use must be made under adult supervision and responsibility. Like any other nautical activity, a life jacket is strongly advised. Some countries even require it. Inquire about it. There are smartphone or walkie-talkie holders, to communicate with the driver.

It depends on your perk choice. There are some perks without battery: " Light Bird", "Sound Bird" and "Rental Bird". We offer this option to reduce the shipping cost and the selling price.

Our goal is not to earn money by selling batteries or to force you to buy our batteries. We decided to use "Marine grade Bluetop" batteries from Optima. You can always buy other brands of deep cycle batteries.
    You can buy these batteries everywhere in the world !
8. How long does it take to fully charge the battery ?
For a JimBoats 6.5  with standard "D34M"- 55Ah battery, approximately 5 hours with the specific "Optima battery charger" or 7~9 hours and with a "classic" battery charger for cars, trucks etc...
9. What is the maximum size to ride a JimBoats 6.5 mini boat ?
We recommend under 170cm (5'6") for the best riding experience.
10. What is the maximum weight to ride a JimBoats 6.5 mini boat ?
We recommend under 70kgs (155lbs) for the best riding experience.
11. Where can JimBoats 6.5 mini boat be serviced?
JimBoats 6.5 mini boat is designed to be simple enough for anyone to replace parts on their own. We will provide written and video documentation of possible replacement processes.
 

Other Ways You Can Help :


If you like the 6.5 Jimboats, turn that into action ! Even if you aren’t able to get a 6.5 Jimboats right now, spread the word and promote our project.  Join the community, tell a friend, come have fun with us.
Use your favorite social networks and Indiegogo's sharing tools !
 
- You can find them on the top right of this page :

 
Visit our website : jimboats.com
Our Facebook page : JimBoats 6.5 by KMA 
Many thanks again for your warm support !

SAFETY RULES :
6.5 isn’t a toy like any other, its use must be made under adult supervision and responsibility. Like any other nautical activity, a life jacket is strongly advised. Some countries even require it. Inquire about it. There are smartphone or walkie-talkie holders, to communicate with the driver.

story:
Background

I already fly my body. I've done over 300 skydives. It started as a small annual achievement. But I never leave a passion half way done. Now I have 3 Licenses and jumped in competitions. I don't know how far this love will take me, It's been very lovely so far.

 

Flying Airplanes

The project you are supporting me with is not an idea. I'm already taking flying classes.

If I have a real dream, I plan for it, I budget for it, and I will make it happen. It just takes a lot longer when I chase them on my own. If I have supporters I will probably achieve it sooner. Well if the weather permits.

 

Flying so far

My instructor is very happy with my progress. After one of the classes she told me that I'm way above average.

I'm comfortable with being in the sky. Perhaps my brief exprience of skydiving helps too.

Since I have passion for flying, I've been studying the books and manual very seriously. My collegues sometimes see me late at work studying the flying exercises.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

By helping me to learn to fly, you are not participating in putting me at a risk. I'm more at risk staying still. Also flying is so pleasant and beautiful, the exprience is far from being at risk or feeling at risk.

 

Rewards

When I'm around you, I fill the room with energy and my wonderful stories of floating in the sky.

I'll make you fly even if you are affraid of heights. Having someone like me around makes everyone believe their dreams are achievable.

Unlike skydiving that feels a bit crazy, when I get my Pilot license, we can go fly together for real.

story:
Using GPS, smart phone technology and robotics, the Towter Transport will revolutionize the transporting of wheelchairs and scooters.
We need help getting it to production. $500,000 will help us complete the patents, finalize the seat transfer system and get production rolling.
The Towter Transporter is automated, robotic and doesn't require you to do any lifting. You can use your own vehicle with a standard hitch system. It is lightweight and compact for easy parking. In fact it can self hitch, self park and lowers to the ground - no ramps are needed.


* The Towter Transporter has a self hitching system using standard hitching systems. 

* It is easily towed behind most small and mid-sized vehicles

* Roll your wheelchair or scooter up to the door.
* Use the Patent Pending seat transfer system to move from the chair to the vehicle
* Use your Smart Phone to send a signal to the Towter, it will lower to the ground and the GPS technology and sensors will guide your wheelchair into place

* The robotic arm will come out and securely move your wheelchair into the Towter and lock in place for transport

* The cover will lower protecting your mobility device from the weather

* The Towter Transporter will rise back up and be ready for travel

* Just reverse the process when you reach your destination

The Towter Transporter will be about 1/4 the cost of a van conversion. It allows for family members to travel together in one vehicle. It eliminates the need for ramps, lifting and carrying of mobility devises. 

How can you help us get this product to all who need it?
1.  Fund our campaign
2. Share this site with all you know
3. Let us know who else we might share this information with

PERKS

The Towter Team really appreciates your support to help us get a Towter Transporter to everyone who needs one. We do have a Perks Program that you are welcome to take part in. We kindly ask that if you don't require a perk, please let us know. This helps keep more dollars available for development and production. Perks will begin to be sent out towards the end of the September, thank you for your patience.

The Towter will revolutionize the mobility industry.
Let’s do this together!


TOWTER ANNOUNCEMENT

The Towter Transporter is not only meant to transport mobility devices, other styles of the Towter Transporter are designed for sports, work or domestic uses.

The Worker Towter is designed as a service trailer, a towable toolbox which can be automatically uncoupled from the town vehicle and robotically driven to location as needed, close to the service workers. The Worker Towter Transporter shares the features of the Mobility Towter.

The Sports Towter is designed for many applications for the sports minded person, including a tailgater model for those pre-game events or transporting sporting equipment. The Sports Towter Transporter shares the features of the Mobility Towter.

The Domestic Towter Transporter is designed to help with household duties, offering extra cargo space to transport building materials, household goods, children’s strollers/prams or whatever you can dream up. The Domestic Towter Transporter shares the features of the Mobility Towter.


TOWTER STYLES
 Mobility
Sports
 Worker
 Domestic

 Service personnel

 Sales agent
 Mini work station
 Vending machine service
 Service toolbox
 Property maintenance
 Caterer

 Fast food sales (climate controlled)
 House cleaning

 Driveway/parking sander
 Sign/billboard advertising
 Service vending machines
 Small landscape Business
 Small business inventory pick up
 Mobile professionals, i.e. veterinarian
 Musician instrument transport
 Limo extra luggage
 Vendors @ shows/flea markets
 Car detailers
