 Ferrier
 Roadside service trailer
 Small landscaper business
 Vending machine service

 Sports
 Pop-up camper
 Bicycle transporter
 Sports equipment transporter
 Hobbyist equipment transporter
 Backyard party transporter
 Pop up tailgater
 Horse equipment
 Golf Towter
 Fishing equipment transporter

Domestic
  Property maintenance
 Extra vehicle cargo space
  Baby carriage carrier
 Household goods pick up
 Shopping cart carrier
 Pet carrier

story:
Pre order add-e NEXT
spring 2019






 


 


 

 

 

e-motion your bike with add-e

from bike to e-bike within seconds

add-e NEXT
introduction

You love cycling but because it can be exhausting you are thinking about an e-bike? Even more, you love your own bike and don´t want to replace it for a heavy and bulky e-bike?
add-e is the answer !



New technologies, high quality materials and Austrian engineering make it possible to convert your own bike into an e-bike with style, in no time! With add-e you can choose to use your bike as a normal bicycle or as an e-bike. You can have 2 in 1.



No additional space needed, eco-friendly and most of all with add-e you save money. Just pimp your own beloved bike and do some easygoing cycling, but with style.



 

add-e NEXT
What's new?

The new generation of add-e, add-e NEXT does no longer struggle with screeching noise nor do we use hall sensors with magnets that are limited in accuracy.
This is a totally new generation of the smallest and lightest add-on kit, once again leading the way for the future in cycling.

In the previous generations of add-e we were limited by some basic conditions, like the computing power of the microcontroller and discontinuous sensor values for speed and cadence. Now we are doing a complete redesign, reinventing ourselves. The add-e NEXT will not only calculate the motor movement 1000 times faster but also power the motor in a consistent way that reduces the noise level nearly to zero.
The new electronics using latest FET technology makes the whole drive much more efficient, especially when going up a hill with low speed but high motor power.
Therefore add-e NEXT can assist much better when using the motor on a gradient.

The new wireless sensors allow us to calculate the speed of the wheel continuously.
Compared to the previous version where the magnet had to pass the sensor twice to calculate the wheel movement, this is much more accurate.
Enabling us to overcome the delay when starting from standstill situations.



You can adjust the values for minimum speed and cadence via the add-e app (will be available for iOS and Android). Now you can decide how long the motor should stay active, even if you pedal very relaxed. Also new functions like free programmed max.
Speed and Power will be implemented (only for Sport Edition). The installation will be so simple and you no longer have to struggle with different mounting possibilities.
 


 

add-e
first installation

add-e NEXT can be fitted to almost any bicycle without trouble, by using the mounting brackets included in every set. You can mount add-e by yourself without having to make modifications to your bike. There are two perfect solutions for nearly every bike.

  • Type 1 (bottom bracket shell): is the ideal solution for racing bikes, mountain bikes and various types of trekking bikes. The frame around the pedal bearing is standard which simplifies the fitting. In this case the add-e mounting plate fits between the bottom bracket shell and the frame. To fasten securely the bottom bracket has to be screwed tigh
     

  • Type 2 (Kickstand fitting): is the ideal solution for city bikes and older bicycles with a classical kickstand bracket. With this type the mounting plate is fitted onto the kickstand bracket. An add-e kickstand bracket is included in every set.

However, if you are not quite sure which version you need send us an email and
we will be pleased to assist you. (indiegogo@add-e.at)



Additional mounting kits enable the use of add-e NEXT on numerous bikes. The drive unit and the battery can be switched easily between two (or more) bikes. Therefore you can upgrade multiple bicycles for little money. (Perk: add-e NEXT mounting kit)
 


 

How does
add-e NEXT work?

add-e NEXT is a friction roller drive. This means that the wheel of the bicycle is directly driven without the need of a gearbox. The most efficient performance is achieved by tires that have a smooth surface.

Once you put in the battery, the drive-unit is ready. Now you can choose the level of assistance by turning the power regulator on top of the battery. If it is turned totally to the left (counter clockwise) the drive-unit is in standby mode. In this mode the roller does not touch the tire.



There is no friction or additional moment of inertia. You can ride your bike like you are used to. When there is a gradient you simply turn the power regulator and the motor engages. There are 5 levels of assistance pushing you up the mountain. When the hill is overcome you simply turn back into standby mode and the motor disengages again.

add-e is built according to the European-Pedelec-Standards. Therefore the motor only assists when pedaling at the same time. When you stop pedaling, add-e stops as well.
The wireless sensors transmit the calculation of pedal movement and current speed ten times per second. Therefore a precise motor control is possible. 
This simple control system makes additional handlebar components completely unnecessary.



After the initial fitting, the drive unit can be removed from the bicycle and re-fitted within seconds.

add-e is a true lightweight champion with an outstanding performance. The inconspicuous design and modular set-up allow it not only to be mounted on almost every bike, but can be easily self-mounted without the need for any modifications.

Besides its unique design, add-e makes it possible to use your bike as an e-bike as
well as a normal bike. You´ll have 2 options in 1.
It is up to you to choose when you need the extra power while riding. 

Smaller, lighter, faster … add-e NEXT!
 


 

Whats next?


 



We are still producing the second add-e generation but want to get ready for add-e NEXT at the beginning of 2019. Even though we have already been testing add-e NEXT for months we still have to improve different parts. We will have to finalize the PCB design, mechanic components, optimize the software and a lot more. You will frequently receive updates about our progress not only in respect of manufacturing but also tests, certificates, the app and shipping.

Over the last years we already learned a lot and we are sure that we already overcame most of the typical starting problems. Anyway please keep in mind that a certain time is necessary for production in series and that orders will be completed chronologically. First come first serve.

We would like to thank you for the support and trust. Therefore you can preorder add-e NEXT, be the first to get the best add-e generation of all and save a lot of money.
Help us to accelerate the production, by purchasing one of these perks.
 

Perks
what you get
















You like add-e and want to support us? Help us by telling your friends and acquaintances about add-e. Make your friends aware of this campaign and become a fan on facebook.

The more people we reach the better. And being quick pays off.

“The early bird”- offers are limited, and only for a short time so don’t hesitate too long.



 

add-e team

Fore more than three years the add-e team has been growing, working close together to ensure high quality and outstanding support for you. Assisted by renowned mentors and a broadly diversified network, this team is the dynamic spirit behind every add-e.

If you have any question write us an e-mail (indiegogo@add-e.at) or give us a call
(+43 4242 59003) or maybe find the answer already in the FAQ section.

story:
Distinguiti con il monopattino Sicuro, Tecnologico ed Italiano

Basta con gli incidenti, le forature o i noiosi scricchiolii di monopattini di bassa qualità: LYNX, premiato con il Muse Design Award, nasce per rivoluzionare il settore della micromobilità, proponendo una soluzione in grado di risolvere i reali bisogni di chi si sposta.

LYNX: agile, facilmente trasportabile e leggero

3 ruote per la stabilità ma agilità e divertimento allo stesso tempo. Lo porti come un trolley e lo sollevi come una valigia, puoi estrarre la batteria ed è leggero.

Progettato interamente a Torino dalla Startup TO.TEM, verrà prodotto in Italia.

 

Dalle auto autonome il “Collision alert”: un innovativo sistema che usa l’intelligenza artificiale per avvisarti in caso di pericolo o che può funzionare da semplice specchietto.
 

 

Agile a 3 ruote: facile da usare, con pneumatici anti-foratura a nido d’ape da 10” e 8” sufficientemente grandi per superare agevolmente ogni ostacolo.
 

 


Frecce e luci ben visibili: fatti notare! Per la tua sicurezza e per quella di chi ti sta intorno.

Portalo come trolley o sollevalo come una valigia: grazie alle due maniglie.

Materiali riciclabili: a partire dalla pedana in legno, realizzata in collaborazione con un produttore di surf italiano, per arrivare al telaio in alluminio di derivazione ciclistica.


Dov'è la batteria? La batteria è modulare estraibile: scegli tu di cosa hai bisogno, minor peso o massima autonomia? Estraibile e ricaricabile come un telefono, puoi scegliere quella da 5.2 o da 10 Ah

 


Non dovrai imparare nulla: nessun display aggiuntivo se non il tuo smartphone, che potrai comodamente alloggiare sul porta-telefono integrato.
Un’APP rivoluzionaria che contiene:

  • uno Shop per comprare facilmente i tuoi ricambi
  • un Navigatore sviluppato con un partner tecnologico, che ti consiglierà il percorso migliore
  • il Display di gestione del tuo fantastico monopattino LYNX

Scegli tra LYNX e-Motion e LYNX e-Vision

Tempi di consegna e prossimi passi

Partecipando al crowdfunding sosterrai TO.TEM nello sviluppo di LYNX. Il monopattino verrà consegnato a partire dalla fine di Settembre 2021.

Parlano di noi:

Noi siamo TO.TEM: Una startup fatta di persone con esperienza nel lancio di prodotti automotive

Siamo una Startup di Torino, che nella capitale dell’auto ha scelto di creare un monopattino Italiano, valorizzando la capacità di sviluppare prodotti di carattere e di qualità.

Un team forte, coeso, con un’esperienza decennale nello sviluppo delle automobili, e che porta l’esperienza di saper mettere in produzione milioni di pezzi dentro il settore della micromobilità.

Una Startup che ha deciso di credere nell’Italia, che utilizzerà fornitori il più possibile Italiani e che lancerà il suo prodotto in Italia come primo mercato. Una scommessa, forse un rischio, ma crediamo in noi e puntiamo sul nostro territorio, che ha bisogno di un rilancio, in un periodo travagliato come questo.

 

I nostri partners

Ogni grande prodotto nasce grazie dall'impegno delle persone che lo sviluppano e dalla collaborazione con aziende che credono nel progetto, ecco alcuni dei nostri partner strategici che ci stanno aiutando a realizzare il nostro sogno per una mobilità più sostenibile.

Cosa dicono i partecipanti della VIP List

 

Sbloccate i livelli

Al raggiungimento di determinate soglie di vendita del monopattino, attiveremo la possibilità di acquistare singoli prodotti a marchio LYNX.

Goal 1 - Il casco LYNX by Limar

Una volta raggiunto il traguardo di 100 monopattini venduti verrà sbloccata la possibilità di acquistare da solo il nostro casco! La sicurezza prima di tutto.

Goal 2 ...lo scoprirete... sopra i 150 monopattini

 

DOMANDE FREQUENTI

GENERALI

Questa è una campagna di donazione o di pre-acquisto?

La campagna di LYNX è reward-based, ovvero l’utente effettua un pagamento anticipato con l’intenzione di ottenere in cambio il monopattino LYNX, eventualmente in combinata con uno o più optional. Ma non vi preoccupate! La campagna come vedete ha un fixed goal, quindi nel caso non si raggiunga l'obiettivo avrete indietro il pagamento effettuato.

Chi è TO.TEM?

LYNX è prodotto da TO.TEM S.r.l., la start-up innovativa di Torino, già premiata con il prestigioso Muse International Design Award 2020 come Gold Winner. Inoltre l’intero team di TO.TEM è costituito da ingegneri con più di 10 anni di esperienza nel lanciare prodotti in ambito automotive, anche per alcune delle aziende automobilistiche più conosciute e prestigiose al mondo.

 Perché si chiama LYNX?

La lince si difende dai pericoli ambientali tramite la sua conformazione fisica, e questo ci ha ricordato fin da subito il nostro monopattino.
Inoltre ha alcuni sensi super-sviluppati, tra cui la vista. Proprio come LYNX nella versione E-Vision!! E poi…LYNX ci è sempre piaciuto per il suo suono, è facile da ricordare e si distingue da tutte le sigle sul mercato.

 Quando cominceranno le spedizioni?

Stimiamo che le consegne inizieranno a Fine Settembre 2021. L’ordine di spedizione seguirà l’ordine di pre-acquisto, quindi chi prima pre-ordina LYNX su Indiegogo prima lo riceverà!

 C’è la possibilità che il COVID influisca sui tempi di produzione e consegna?

Il nostro team sta cercando di mantenere il più possibile produzione e fornitura di componenti a livello locale, in modo da ridurre i rischi legati alla logistica internazionale.

 Il monopattino di produzione sarà esattamente uguale a quello qui presentato?

No. Sarà anche migliore! Il nostro team sta lavorando quotidianamente per apportare migliorie e accorgimenti al fine di fornire un’esperienza di utilizzo ottimale, basandosi sui test che vengono effettuati di continuo.

 LYNX può sostenere il mio peso?

Il nostro monopattino può sostenere in tutta sicurezza un peso di 110Kg.

 C’è una garanzia?

Certamente, tutti i componenti di LYNX sono progettati per durare a lungo in varie condizioni ambientali. Inoltre tutti i monopattini LYNX sono coperti da due anni di garanzia.

 Come potrò ordinare i componenti di ricambio?

Tramite l’APP LYNX per il tuo smartphone potrai effettuare comodamente l’ordine e ricevere il componente o l’accessorio direttamente a casa.

CARATTERISTICHE TECNICHE

 Posso sostituire la batteria?

Grazie al design di LYNX è possibile sfilare comodamente la batteria dal tubo frontale. In questo modo potrai sostituirla quando vorrai con la batteria da 20Km o quella da 40Km di autonomia, indipendentemente dalla batteria che monti inizialmente.

 Come posso caricare la batteria?

È possibile caricarla sia direttamente dal mezzo con un caricabatterie esterno oppure, ancora più comodamente e utilizzando lo stesso caricabatterie in dotazione, caricarla dopo averla estratta dal tubo centrale. Esattamente come stessi caricando il tuo smartphone o il tuo portatile. Comodo no?!

 Quanto dura la ricarica della batteria?

Tra le 3 e 4 ore in funzione della batteria scelta

 Cosa succede se buco un pneumatico?

Questo è impossibile!! Grazie ai pneumatici pieni, anti-foratura e a nido d’ape potrai finalmente dimenticarti di questo fastidioso inconveniente!!

 Qual è la velocità massima?

LYNX nasce con l’intento di fornire un’alternativa più sicura agli attuali monopattini. In quest’ottica la velocità massima è anche la massima consentita per legge, ovvero 25Km/h.

 E’ obbligatorio indossare il casco?

In Italia l’uso del casco è obbligatorio per guidare un monopattino elettrico solo fino ai 18 anni, tuttavia noi di TO.TEM, in linea con la filosofia di incentivare una mobilità urbana sicura, consigliamo l’utilizzo del casco sempre e comunque. Per questo motivo proponiamo anche il casco personalizzato LYNX come optional in collaborazione con LIMAR, il prestigioso brand di caschi italiano già fornitore di alcuni team del ciclismo professionistico.

Avete altre domande? Contattateci:

Mail generale: info@totemev.com
CTO: massimiliano.melis@totemev.com
story_txt:
Distinguiti con il monopattino Sicuro, Tecnologico ed ItalianoBasta con gli incidenti, le forature o i noiosi scricchiolii di monopattini di bassa qualità: LYNX, premiato con il Muse Design Award, nasce per rivoluzionare il settore della micromobilità, proponendo una soluzione in grado di risolvere i reali bisogni di chi si sposta.LYNX: agile, facilmente trasportabile e leggero3 ruote per la stabilità ma agilità e divertimento allo stesso tempo. Lo porti come un trolley e lo sollevi come una valigia, puoi estrarre la batteria ed è leggero.Progettato interamente a Torino dalla Startup TO.TEM, verrà prodotto in Italia. Dalle auto autonome il “Collision alert”: un innovativo sistema che usa l’intelligenza artificiale per avvisarti in caso di pericolo o che può funzionare da semplice specchietto.  Agile a 3 ruote: facile da usare, con pneumatici anti-foratura a nido d’ape da 10” e 8” sufficientemente grandi per superare agevolmente ogni ostacolo.  Frecce e luci ben visibili: fatti notare! Per la tua sicurezza e per quella di chi ti sta intorno.Portalo come trolley o sollevalo come una valigia: grazie alle due maniglie.Materiali riciclabili: a partire dalla pedana in legno, realizzata in collaborazione con un produttore di surf italiano, per arrivare al telaio in alluminio di derivazione ciclistica.Dov'è la batteria? La batteria è modulare estraibile: scegli tu di cosa hai bisogno, minor peso o massima autonomia? Estraibile e ricaricabile come un telefono, puoi scegliere quella da 5.2 o da 10 Ah Non dovrai imparare nulla: nessun display aggiuntivo se non il tuo smartphone, che potrai comodamente alloggiare sul porta-telefono integrato.Un’APP rivoluzionaria che contiene:
uno Shop per comprare facilmente i tuoi ricambi
un Navigatore sviluppato con un partner tecnologico, che ti consiglierà il percorso migliore
il Display di gestione del tuo fantastico monopattino LYNX
Scegli tra LYNX e-Motion e LYNX e-VisionTempi di consegna e prossimi passiPartecipando al crowdfunding sosterrai TO.TEM nello sviluppo di LYNX. Il monopattino verrà consegnato a partire dalla fine di Settembre 2021.Parlano di noi:Noi siamo TO.TEM: Una startup fatta di persone con esperienza nel lancio di prodotti automotiveSiamo una Startup di Torino, che nella capitale dell’auto ha scelto di creare un monopattino Italiano, valorizzando la capacità di sviluppare prodotti di carattere e di qualità.Un team forte, coeso, con un’esperienza decennale nello sviluppo delle automobili, e che porta l’esperienza di saper mettere in produzione milioni di pezzi dentro il settore della micromobilità.Una Startup che ha deciso di credere nell’Italia, che utilizzerà fornitori il più possibile Italiani e che lancerà il suo prodotto in Italia come primo mercato. Una scommessa, forse un rischio, ma crediamo in noi e puntiamo sul nostro territorio, che ha bisogno di un rilancio, in un periodo travagliato come questo. I nostri partnersOgni grande prodotto nasce grazie dall'impegno delle persone che lo sviluppano e dalla collaborazione con aziende che credono nel progetto, ecco alcuni dei nostri partner strategici che ci stanno aiutando a realizzare il nostro sogno per una mobilità più sostenibile.Cosa dicono i partecipanti della VIP List Sbloccate i livelliAl raggiungimento di determinate soglie di vendita del monopattino, attiveremo la possibilità di acquistare singoli prodotti a marchio LYNX.Goal 1 - Il casco LYNX by LimarUna volta raggiunto il traguardo di 100 monopattini venduti verrà sbloccata la possibilità di acquistare da solo il nostro casco! La sicurezza prima di tutto.Goal 2 ...lo scoprirete... sopra i 150 monopattini DOMANDE FREQUENTI
GENERALI

story:
IMPORTANT: THIS IS A SURPRISE FOR STEVEN! He doesn't know yet, and we want to keep it that way. Please avoid clicking the "share" buttons above, and see below for other ways to share the project without spilling the beans! Thank you! :) 

Steven LaCroix is a massage therapist offering Bodywork for Life Balance in Bellingham, WA. A mindful man with a kind heart, his presence and skilled technique have helped hundreds of people experience physical, mental, and emotional relief and healing both on and off the massage table. Alongside offering massage and healing touch to the community, Steven co-facilitates a contact-improv jam twice/month, participates in a variety of workshops and events around town, and is a welcome, friendly face throughout the community. He's also a delightful dork :) 

What you may not know about Steven is that he rides his bicycle, Sprocket, everywhere. He's had his driver's license for 17 years, but has NEVER owned a car. How many people do you know who can say that? Sprocket, Steven's current bicycle, has been Steven's trusty steed for over five years. While's he a loyal hunk of metal and serves his purpose well, Sprocket is too small for Steven. He's also a mountain bike which is much more challenging to commute on than, say, a commuter bike. We'd like to give Steven the gift of swift, easy, practical, and fun transportation around town, as well as the possibility of joining friends on longer tours. That's why we're asking for your help! 

Oh yeah, Steven lives in Bellingham where it rains A LOT, all the time (it's raining right now). Unfortunately, Steven doesn't have any waterproof bags. Sometimes he carries his laundry from his massage practice back and forth from work to home in a backpack that looks like it should make him fall over backwards. He's a trooper, but it can be easier. If this project is funded, we will get Steven a set of waterproof panniers (bike bags) that will protect his belongings from the weather as well as his back from the weight. 

With the help of friends, family, and our larger community, a little here and a little there will go a long way towards improving his daily commute. To receive a gift like this from someone's community is an amazing statement of love and support. Please consider donating to help Steven continue helping others in a way that supports his body as well as his ability to move around town with more joy and ease! 

IMPORTANT: THIS IS A SURPISE FOR STEVEN. Please keep it off of Facebook and any other publice forum. Build community by spreading it through word of mouth or via email :) 

 

What We Need 

Bicycle Expenses $1,505.86:

  • 1 Surly Long Haul Trucker Touring Bicycle: $1149.00 + $74.69 tax = $1,223.69
  • 1 pair of Ortlieb Backroller Classic Pannier (waterproof saddle bags): $180.00 + 11.70 tax = $191.70
  • 1 Topeak Explorer MTX Rack (for panniers): $44.95 + $2.92 tax = $47.87
  • 1 set of Planet Bike Hardcore Hybrid/Touring Bike Fenders (again, waterproofing!): $40.00 + $2.60 tax = $42.60

Campaign Costs (4-9% Indiegogo campaign fee + 3% Paypal fee , shipping costs, production expenses, prizes, etc): $490.00

Total Cost: $1,995.00

 

What You Get

Picture perfect postcards, handy healing salves, chocolate bars with bicycles on them, custom-designed t-shirts, and massage sessions  all shout: We love you Steven!  

Simply by donating $10.00, your name will be listed on one of the coolest birthday cards ever!

If you donate $25.00, you will receive a memorable postcard photo of Steven with his new bicycle as well as a custom-designed bumper sticker featuring the last stick figure drawing from the video with the phrase "Thanks for the ride!" 

By donating $40.00, you will also recieve a handmade healing salve courtesy of our own aspiring herbalist Alyson Simeone. The salve will be accompanied by two loose leaf tea blends from Living Earth Herbs, a local treat in Bellingham. 

By donating $50.00, you will receive three decadent chocolate bicycle bars accompanied by a warming hot cocoa mix. (Made for the chocolate lover! What's better than a little chocolate on the road?) 

By donating $100.00, you will receive a custom-designed t-shirt from Innate, a local, sustainbly-minded print shop, featuring the last stick figure drawing from the video with the phrase "Thanks for the ride!"

By donating $120.00, you will receive a skillful, rejuvenative 90-minute bodywork session with one of the following local practioners:

Jeanell Innerarity, LMP, Foot Reflexologist, Maya-Abdominal Therapy, Founder of SomaGaia (www.somagaia.com)

Christina Greene, LMP

Timothy Oaks, LMP

Christopher O'Dell, LMP

Deb Zucker, ND, LMP, Naturopathic Physician and Transformative Educator at Vital Medicine (www.vitalmedicine.com) 

Want something extra special? Pitch in an extra $100.00-$150.00 and Steven and the crew will not only deliver your reward to you by bicycle, we'll also cook you a dinner fit for royalty. How sweet is that?! 

 

The Impact

Many of you thinking about donating to this campaign know Steven in some form or fashion, but did you know that:

  • By riding his bike 6+ miles roundtrip to work for the past 7 years (10,920+ miles!!!), Steven has prevented about 8,000 lbs of CO2 from entering our atmosphere.
  • 1 year of carbon emissions from 2,000 miles driven in a 1996 Subaru Legacy would be 1,612 lbs CO2:
    • 2,000 miles is the minimun amount available on the carbon footprint calculator
    • 1996 because that's the year he got his license
    • Subaru because he'd look good in one
    • Mutiply that by 17 years, and Steven has prevented at least 27,506 lbs CO2 from entering the atmosphere!
  • By riding his bicycle instead of driving a car, not only does Steven prevent polution from entering our atmosphere, he lowers the amount of car traffic on the road and encourages a healthy lifestyle. Go Steven! 

  • All extra funds will be donated to the Hub, our local community bike shop! 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have the funds to contribute, that's okay! You can still help by telling your friends about this campaign. Spread the word with us!  

IMPORTANT: THIS IS A SURPISE FOR STEVEN. As convenient as it is, please DO NOT use Facebook or other public forums to spread the word about this campaign. Instead, send emails or private messages, text your friends and family, call each other, or maybe even get together and talk about other unique ways to spread the word. Have fun with it, but please don't let it squeak out until we give word that we've met our goal and everyone can congratulate Steven on his new bike! How awkard would it be for him to find out beforehand? :) 

Thank you for conspiring with us!

story:
VOMO is Here!

VOMO is the ultimate light electric vehicle! This high performance electric scooter is packed with features, including a powerful 350-Watt motor with a 20 MPH top speed! 

Whether it is commuting to work, getting to the subway or bus stop, running errands, short trips are now super easy and fun with VOMO. In a car we have to deal with traffic, and parking. On a bicycle, we work up a sweat and then have to find a safe place to lock it up.

We felt there had to be a better way to handle these short trips. Our goal at VEETRON was to build the best light electric vehicle in the world so VOMO was created!


 

VOMO is Speedy

VOMO comes standard with a 350 Watt hub motor that propels you up to 20 mph! 
Many electric scooters on the market just do not have the power and speed needed to really get going and zoom up hills but not with VOMO, we wanted to build a scooter that offered high performance and the ability to take you anywhere!

 

VOMO Goes Everywhere With You

With a size of 29cmx89cmx16cm when folded it is compact enough to be taken anywhere.
We designed VOMO so you can take it everywhere you want to go with a very quick and simple folding action and the ability to roll it when needed just like a suitcase. 

VOMO Gives a Smooth Ride

Many electric scooters we tried offer non inflatable hard plastic wheels but we were disappointed at the handling and safety of the ride.
After extensive testing we decided to go with durable (8x2 Inch) tubeless inflatable tires offering the very best handling and the ability to smooth out those nasty bumps in the road. 

VOMO Has a Digital Display

We wanted to make sure that VOMO offered the very latest LCD display technology.
Our LCD display offers many functions to the rider:
  • 5 Power assist levels

  • Total odometer

  • Trip odometer

  • RPM reading 

  • Voltage reading

  • Display readings in KPH or MPH

  • Battery level reading 


VOMO In The Media



VOMO Goes the Distance

VOMO comes in two battery configurations, 8.8A battery model or 11.6A battery model. Both models using the very latest Samsung Lithium Ion 18650 Battery technology to offer the best range possible. 
Our tests have reached ranges of over 20 miles on a single charge!

VOMO Stops When You Need To

Safety is super important so we have equipped VOMO with a "safe-start" function meaning that if you twist the throttle when standing still it will not accelerate avoiding any non-intentional acceleration in a crowded area. 
We also fitted VOMO with a 120mm disc brake to give the very best stopping power when needed. 
Some electric scooters only offer regenerative braking but we found this simply wasn't safe enough for us as this gives no braking power if electric supply is cut off.
The 120mm disc brake was by far the best performing and safest option to go with.
VOMO also comes as standard with a built in motor cut off switch. Simply apply the brake as normal and the power supply to the motor will automatically cut off while the brake is applied. 

VOMO is Strong and Light

VOMO is made from high grade aluminium offering not only the strength and rigidity needed but also lightness. 
Keeping the body design ultralight and yet strong we were able to design the VOMO to weigh in from just 14kg. 

VOMO is Affordable

There was no point in us designing a scooter that the vast majority of people couldn't afford, it is our mission to make light electric vehicles available for everyone. 
We are offering our INDIEGOGO supporters the ability to get a VOMO at a very special price of $599 with free shipping! (Shipping normally extra)
We encourage you to shop around for other electric scooters just to see how low our pricing is. You will have a hard time finding anything else priced this low and definitely not with the top speed and range that VOMO offers.

VOMO Colors

VOMO is available in two colors, either MATTE BLACK or ALUMINIUM SILVER.
Please make sure you select the perk that matches the color you would like. 

VOMO Specifications


VOMO Perks

To kick off our campaign we are offering a number of perks to our supporters!

VOMO (BLACK OR SILVER) 8.8A = $599

For a very limited time we are offering our 8.8A Model VOMO with free worldwide shipping. Please make sure you select the correct color that you would like.  

VOMO (BLACK OR SILVER) 11.6A = $699

For a very limited time we are offering our 11.6A Model VOMO with free worldwide shipping. Please make sure you select the correct color you would like. 

EXTRA CHARGER = $39

Want to leave a battery charger at home and another at work or someplace else? There's nothing like having multiple options for charging locations, which is why we're offering the option to purchase an additional battery charger. 

EXTRA 8.8A BATTERY = $239

We understand that some people may want to buy an additional battery now for additional use. Please note batteries are interchangeable between models. 

EXTRA 11.6A BATTERY = $279

We understand that some people may want to buy an additional battery now for additional use. Please note batteries are interchangeable between models. 

EXTRA SINGLE TIRE = $29

The VOMO tubeless inflatable tire is very strong and durable though we know that sometimes in life nasty large punctures do happen. We are also offering our tire now to VOMO buyers that want to have shipped with their scooter. 

EXTRA TWO TIRES = $49

The VOMO tubeless inflatable tire is very strong and durable though we know that sometimes in life nasty large punctures do happen. We are also offering our tires now to VOMO buyers that want to have shipped with their scooter. 

CARRY CASE = $89

For those times when you take your scooter long haul why not zip it up nice and snug in its own custom made wheeled carry case. 

VOMO ZIP UP HOODIE = $79

Show your support for your VOMO with a limited edition Zip up hoodie.

VOMO HOODIE = $75

Show your support for your VOMO with a limited edition Pull over hoodie.


VOMO T-SHIRT = $49

Show your support for your VOMO with a limited edition T-Shirt.


SHIPPING USA MAINLAND = $99

Use this perk to pay for shipping if you have NOT paid already to USA for your VOMO ordered before 19th August 2015. Please note this perk is not required for new VOMO orders after 19th August 2015. (Not including Alaska or Hawaii, for Alaska and Hawaii please use $149 shipping option.) 

SHIPPING EUROPE, AUSTRALIA, CANADA, SINGAPORE = $149

Use this perk to pay for shipping if you have NOT paid already for your VOMO ordered before 19th August 2015, to Australia, Canada, Alaska, Hawaii, Singapore and Europe. Please note this perk is not required for new VOMO orders after 19th August 2015. 

SHIPPING REST OF THE WORLD = $199

Use this perk to pay for shipping if you have NOT paid already for your VOMO ordered before 19th August 2015, to any other countries not listed above. Please note this perk is not required for new VOMO orders after 19th August 2015. If you have any questions regarding your country for delivery or cost please email us at hello@veetron.com


VOMO Comes with a Warranty!

At VEETRON we are so confident with the quality of our scooters so they always come with a 12 month limited warranty giving you peace of mind. 

Why VOMO Needs Your Support?

To help bring VOMO to market, we’re seeking to raise funds that will help us launch into full-scale production.

Indiegogo is the only place in the world that you can buy a VOMO scooter right now. Ordering today helps us kickstart our production and in return, you'll be one of the first to get your VOMO scooter.  

Most importantly, we need your help to spread the word. If we can get more people to know about our scooter we can continue to develop and improve upon it given the feedback we receive from you!


FAQ

Is it legal to ride VOMO? US State laws vary. Some state laws approve the use of electric scooters in bike lanes of general road traffic and some do not. To the best of our knowledge  e-scooters are street legal in California, Connecticut, Kentucky, Missouri, Nevada, Texas, Virginia and Washington, with many other states expected to follow suit. All countries have their own rules on light electric vehicles so it’s best to consult with your local transportation authority.

What is the range? This depends on many factors such as riding style. rider weight, terrain and conditions. As a general guide our 8.8A model is capable of a range of 15miles plus and our 11.6A model can do 20miles plus. 

Does it come with a warranty? We are offering a one (1) year warranty on all parts for "non normal wear". This means any defective parts we will replace within the 1st year. 

How does shipping work? We send all deliveries out from either Hong Kong or directly from our factory in China. We use various carriers depending on what country you are based in and we will contact you by email before final delivery with tracking number details so you can track the progress.  

Do I have to pay import duty? Import duty or VAT may need to be paid if your country requires it. VAT or import duty will need to be paid before final delivery, in most cases if there is duty to be paid the delivery company will contact you and they will have the ability to accept payment either online, by phone or with the delivery driver directly. 

Can it go uphill? For sure! Because of the power that VOMO has it can go up a 15 degree incline which should be adequate for most roads. The steepest hill we have gone up is over 20 degrees.  

What is the load capacity? Maximum recommended load capacity is 120kg.

Can I change the speed limit from 20mph? Yes, you can change the speed limit and have it 'unlimited'. You also can change the display from MPH to KPH.

Do you offer a local pick up service? Unfortunately we are not offering a local pickup option at this time. In future we hope to have a base in USA and Europe that allows local pick up. 

Can I buy from any dealers? We do not have any dealers at present though we are looking to take on local dealers as soon as we can. If you are a dealership that would like to stock our products we would love to hear from you.

Can I change the battery myself? Yes, it is a simple process of unscrewing the top plate on the scooter and unplugging. 

How can you keep the price of VOMO so low? From the outset it has been our mission to provide our products at the best price we can without compromising on quality. We have been working closely with our suppliers for a long time so that we are able to manufacture our scooter at the lowest price we can. 

How can I contact you? You can email us at hello@veetron.com

Can I get a refund? We understand that things happen, we will do everything we can to be fair and just. Indiegogo stipulates in their Terms that all contributions are non-refundable, but upon successful completion of our campaign we work one-on-one with backers to determine appropriate refunds if applicable. 

Do you sell spares? Yes, We plan on offering replacement parts through a network of local dealers as well as offering direct sales from ourselves. 

What is the minimum and maximum rider height? There are no absolute minimums or maximums, the handlebars can be set at from 110cm to 120cm off ground level and we have had riders comfortably ride VOMO that range in height from 4'11" to 6'6". 

Is VOMO fully assembled when delivered? Absolutely. Simply unpack and it's ready to go. When your VOMO arrives the battery will be about 50% charged.

Is VOMO waterproof? The scooter is water resistant (splash proof) though not to be submerged under water. With that being said, we do recommend to avoid riding in the rain for safety reasons. Always wipe out water afterwards and keep it dry to preserve the scooters life. 

How do I choose the color? After you have paid for your VOMO including shipping you can email us your color choice "silver or black" to hello@veetron.com. Please make sure you check your spam folder for any emails from hello@veetron.com. We will email you back confirming your color, you should keep that email for your records. UPDATE: From 19th August 2015 any new orders can now select the reuired color option at time of ordering by selecting the correct perk. 

If the battery runs out can I kick the scooter along? Yes absolutely. VOMO is designed to be kicked along just like any other kick scooter with the electrics either turned on or off.

How do I let you know my shipping address? When selecting the perk for your VOMO it will ask you for shipping address at the payment stage. If you have also selected any other perks we will ship them to the same address as you used for delivery of your VOMO. Please also email us a contact phone number so we can pass onto the delivery company. 

What is the difference between the VOMO Models? 8.8A and 11.6A refer to the battery size for the model. It is either 36V 8.8A or 36V 11.6A. The 11.6A Battery offers a longer range.

Can I use the battery charger in my country, what is the voltage? Yes! Our chargers work with voltages from 100V to 240V. We will also be sending you a plug extension that works for your country plug socket.  

How do I fix a flat tire? VOMO comes with durable tubeless inflatable tires and the same puncture repair kits that can be used on tubeless cycle tires can be used on VOMO. 


Photos


About Us

We think electric bikes and scooters are awesome but the really great ones are too expensive, and the inexpensive ones are simply horrible. We thought there should be a better solution, so we at VEETRON decided to change all that. Our mission is simple, to bring great light electric vehicles to the masses. 

We hope to show the world what a light electric vehicle can be and help bring the possibilities of electric transport to everyone! 

Feel free to reach out with any questions at hello@veetron.com

Legality

Laws and regulations regarding electric vehicles, and electric scooters vary by country, state, county, and municipality, so please check the local legal status of this product in your area and abide by your local laws.


Risks & Challenges

We have extensive experience in dealing with various suppliers and transportation companies in delivering hardware products. There will always be unknowns when creating a new product, but we're up to the challenge. 

In the interest of making the best product we can specifications described could be subject to small modifications which we will announce in the "Updates" section.

As with all Indiegogo Crowdfunded Projects: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

We take your trust in us very seriously. We will endeavour to make sure our Indiegogo backers are delighted about joining us on this adventure.
story_txt:
VOMO is Here!
 
VOMO is the ultimate light electric vehicle! This high performance electric scooter is packed with features, including a powerful 350-Watt motor with a 20 MPH top speed! 

Whether it is commuting to work, getting to the subway or bus stop, running errands, short trips are now super easy and fun with VOMO. In a car we have to deal with traffic, and parking. On a bicycle, we work up a sweat and then have to find a safe place to lock it up.

We felt there had to be a better way to handle these short trips. Our goal at VEETRON was to build the best light electric vehicle in the world so VOMO was created!




 

VOMO is Speedy

Many electric scooters on the market just do not have the power and speed needed to really get going and zoom up hills but not with VOMO, we wanted to build a scooter that offered high performance and the ability to take you anywhere!



 

VOMO Goes Everywhere With You

We designed VOMO so you can take it everywhere you want to go with a very quick and simple folding action and the ability to roll it when needed just like a suitcase.

story:
Short Summary

Hey friends, family and Weezy Ball lovers!

If you don't know my sister, Christine Todd, she is such a sweet, generous and strong person. There has been numerous times where she has given everything she has, even though she hasn't had very much! For her 20th birthday, I want her to feel the love back. :)

The last few years have been extremely rough for our family. My father became homeless due to a drug problem and my mother became mentally ill. With no other support system, Christine gave the money she had been saving to my mother to avoid an eviction. (Yet another instance of her generosity!) She works 2 jobs and is going to college and I would love to help make her life just a little bit easier. Don't you?! :)


What We Need & What You Get

  • I need at least $2,000 to get her a decent vehicle that is safe and runs well.
  • If you contribute, I will make my very famous and yummy dessert, WEEZY BALLS! For every $20- You will receive 6 balls. They are freezable as well, so the more the merrier!

The Impact

  • If you donate to this cause, it would make such a huge difference in Christine's life. Life will be easier and she would feel a support system.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you know of anybody selling a reliable car, that would be amazing as well!

story:
Let's take charge.

 

Delivery guaranteed.

Your contribution towards this campaign is a guaranteed purchase with us. If you order an eBike with us, you are guaranteed to get it.

 

The eBike that doesn't look like an eBike.

 

Lightweight and high-strength aluminium frame can be taken anywhere.

 

20” wheels, thick tyres and 7 gears make the e20 ideal for hybrid terrain.

 

Freedom features.

 

 

Dimensions.

 

Folded dimensions.

 

Meet the estarli family.

A gaggle of tech experts, eBike fanatics and lovers of the planet. We're based in the UK and we're ready to help you take charge of your ride.

 

Email: indiegogo@estarli.co.uk

www.estarli.co.uk

Instagram: estarli_uk

 

Tech headlines.

 

 

 

Production is underway.

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

General

 

This is a pretty low price for an eBike. How is it possible?

Thanks to our vast experience of working with suppliers and distributors around the world we  have managed to forge some strong partnerships giving us access to substantial discounts on components and parts. Because you are buying from the factory direct through a crowdfunding platform we have been able to further reduce the price to the lowest possible level. 

 

 

Is this a donation or will I get a bike?

When you go through the Indiegogo check out you'll see something that reads "Your donation is a way to support a project but does not guarantee that you will receive a perk."

This is just Indiegogo's way of protecting themselves with legal language. They have no control over what type of projects are funded on their platform so they want to cover themselves.

We guarantee the shipment of every single bike.

 

I can't see the battery, where is it?
 

In the seat post. You're probably used to seeing bulky batteries strapped onto frames or perhaps a bulky centre frame to house the battery. We weren't keen on either of those designs so we have opted for a slightly chunkier looking seat post that houses our powerful 7ah Samsung battery. 

 

Will the finished production bike be identical to those pictured in the campaign?

 

No. It will be even better. We have a few final improvements to make and reserve the right to make modifications in the interest of making your e20 even better. 

 

What sort of range can I expect to get from the e20?

 

The e20 is a dual mode bike so it pedals just like a normal bike. When using pedal assist, typical riders can expect to exceed 50 km of range when using assisted riding. Range figures are estimates and not a guarantee though. Range can vary significantly depending on the terrain, inclines, weight of the cyclist, pedal assist level etc.

Are you planning to offer extra upgrades based on goals?

 

Yes, we have some exciting ideas for stretch goals. When the campaign reaches a certain funding amount we’ll unlock these upgrades. Spread the word so we can release these sooner.

 

What is the maximum weight your frame can take?

 

The e20 is rated for riders up to 100kg.

 

Is there a warranty?

 

Yes. We're not in the business of building low quality or inferior products. Longevity is our aim, If you need any support at all you can reach our UK based support team by email or through our website. All estarli bikes come with a one year warranty. All parts are covered from defect or fault. If anything should fail outside normal wear and tear or rider damage we will send you a replacement component.

 

How do I get replacement parts?

 

You’ll be able to purchase replacements on our online store at https://www.estarli.co.uk or through email.

 

Where can I get my e20 serviced?

 

The e20 is extremely simple. Aside from the maintenance free electrical parts, the bike is built using standard tried and tested bike components. Any reputable bike shop will have the tools to service your e20. If however you do get stuck you can always contact our support team.

 

The eBike

What are the dimensions of the bike?

 

The bike is 150cm long by 110cm tall.

Folded the bike is 85cm long by 70cm tall.

 

Are there different frame sizes?

 

No. The e20 comes in one size and is fully adjustable to suite the rider.  We recommend a max rider height of 6'3. 

 

Can you ride it in the rain?

 

Yes you can. The e20 performs in all weathers, much like a traditional bike. 

 

How much does it weigh?

 

The e20is one of the lightest folding electric bikes on the market. The all-in weight including the battery is 17.5kg.

 

Can I replace the battery?

 

Yes you can. Should you ever need to swap the battery, all you need to do is losen the seat post using the quick release lever, disconnect the battery from the underside of the frame and pull the post out. If you run with two batteries we suggest getting an extra seat so you don't have to manually swap seats between batteries.

 

How do I charge the e20?

 

The battery for the e20 is cleverly integrated into the seat post. To charge the battery simply remove the waterproof cover at the top of the seatpost and plug in our charger. The battery can either be charged with the seat post connected to the bike or by itself .

 

Will the charger work with 240v and 110V outlets around the world?

 

Yes, the charger is rated 100-240V so it works in every country.

 

Is there room for a water bottle mount?

 

Yes, there are two Allen key bolts on the main bar of the frame designed to take a water bottle holder.

 

Are there mounting points for mud guards and a rack?

 

Yes, standard mounting points for front and rear mud guards along with mounting points for a rear luggage rack. If you opt for the e20 pro these will come with your bike.

 

Do you sell a rear luggage rack?

 

Yes just choose the perk with the pro package, pro package includes mud guards and a rear luggage rack.

 

Does it fit in a car?

 

Yes, we've tested a lot of cars from the electric Mini's to big Tesla's (we're a bit electric obsessed). So far we have yet to find a car the bike doesn't fit in. For vehicles with a smaller boot you may need to fold down one of the seats.

 

How do I repair punctures?

 

Repairing a puncture on the e20 is exactly the same as any other standard bike. The rear tyre can be changed whilst the motor is still plugged in.

 

How much maintenance does the motor require?

 

The e20 has a brushless maintenance free motor. Our motor supplier has been making these motors for many years and has fitted them to many 1 million motors globally.

 

 

Legal

Is your bike road legal?

 

Our bike is fully road legal in the EU, the 250w rated motor in accordance with EN15194 power assist function is limited to 15.5mph. Motors up to 250w are legal in most countries. 

 

What’s the max speed of the e20?

 

The e20 can easily achieve 25mph, but for legal reasons the power assist cuts out at 15.5mph from then on the only limit is down to how fast the rider can pedal.

 

Do I need a licence or insurance to ride your bike on public roads?

 

The e20 bike is specifically designed for the European market. The bike has a 250 watt motor and is limited to only offer power assistance up to 15.5mph. This means you do not need a licence or any insurance to ride the bike on the roads. If you live outside the EU we suggest checking with your local laws but we have yet to find a jurisdiction where it does not comply.

 

 

Purchases & Delivery

How much does it cost to ship?

 

Shipping within the United Kingdom is £55, shipping within the EU is no more than £95, you can check the most up to date shipping rate for your country and region by choosing your perk and entering the shipping address in the checkout. 

 

I live in the UK, can I come and pick it up myself?

 

Unfortunately not, we expect to be very busy fulfilling orders and have optimised our dispatch for courier collections. 

 

When do you expect to start shipping?

 

We expect to start shipping the first batches of e20s towards the end of November 2020. Shipping is first come first serve, so the sooner you claim yours, the sooner you’ll be riding!

 

Are there any import duties, taxes or VAT that I need to pay?

 

Our bikes are all assembled in the UK. We have included VAT in the price quoted therefore there is nothing else to pay no additional duties or import tariffs unlike bikes made outside the EU. If you are ordering outside the EU the backer is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT applicable to your jurisdiction.

 

What’s the refund policy?

 

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy here. We'll put the funds from Indiegogo directly into producing your bike, and delivering each order is important for this project to work.
story_txt:
Let's take charge. Delivery guaranteed.Your contribution towards this campaign is a guaranteed purchase with us. If you order an eBike with us, you are guaranteed to get it. 
The eBike that doesn't look like an eBike.

 Lightweight and high-strength aluminium frame can be taken anywhere. 20” wheels, thick tyres and 7 gears make the e20 ideal for hybrid terrain. Freedom features. 

 
Dimensions. Folded dimensions. Meet the estarli family.A gaggle of tech experts, eBike fanatics and lovers of the planet. We're based in the UK and we're ready to help you take charge of your ride. Email: indiegogo@estarli.co.ukwww.estarli.co.ukInstagram: estarli_uk
 Tech headlines.   Production is underway.  Frequently Asked QuestionsGeneral 
This is a pretty low price for an eBike. story:
Get ready for your Adventure!!!

Read about KKA S1 in:

KKA S1 is the first of its kind, being a unique and ground-breaking idea that will change skateboarding forever. This amazingly advanced electric skateboard satisfies each and every level of skating enthusiast going from beginner to adrenaline-filled performers.

You can experience feelings that you've never felt before with the KKA S1 and combine the awesomeness of skateboarding together with both the euphoria of skiing and snowboarding through our skateboards' unique mechanics. Whether you're caving, sliding and even doing a Tic-Tac, you will feel like you're atop of a mountain slope and experience the same thrill.

It doesn't matter where you use the KKA S1, even if we're talking about country roads, our electric skateboard is the safest way to reach your destination. It is fast, flexible and perfect for on and off-road maneuvers.

Bike lanes, city streets or country roads, KKA S1 is transportation as its best. It is fast, powerful, flexible, strong and durable for on and off-road maneuvers.

 

 

KKA S1 Skateboard - Reinvented - Better Performance

  • Explore the Carbon Fiber / Magnesium Alloy Frame Snowboard Design
  • 4 wheel / Rear Drive - Double Drive
  • Electric 500W Hub DC Double Motor
  • Motor Power - 5inch, 250Wx2 max rotate speed 1800rpm
  • Outrageous maximum speed of 32km/h and max mileage of 40km
  • 8.8Ah Lithium Battery
  • Electronic Holzer brake
  • Mobile App integration available
  • Bluetooth App Remote Control
  • CE / FCC Safety Certification

Awesome!

 

 

Flexible with small turning radius;

 

Made by our team of specialists, the design of the tire arc makes the KKA S1 the best skateboard on the market for turning on any surface.    

It has the following amazing adaptions:   

- 5-inch-high bullet PU tire (a regular skateboard has a 3/4-inch tire)  

- Wear-resistant 

 - Anti-corrosion  

- Perfect for poor road conditions  

The large and thick tires give the KKA S1 the ability to adapt faster to rough terrain and make your journey as smooth as possible.

 

 

 

 

The hub motor gives the KKA the possibility to have a high adoption to chassis and gives it a high-barrier capability.

 

 

 

High barrier ability and high adoption of the chassis;

 

 

 

As seen in the video, this highly-adaptive skateboard can resist to harsh climates, so you need not worry about being caught in a bad rain or going through mud.

 

 

 

The KKA S1 is a solution to the biggest problem of skateboards - being seen. You can't go out during the night with a normal skateboard without risking not being seen by a car. This awesome electric skateboard offers front LED movements and taillight to make sure that you get safe to your destination.

Front LED movement headlight and taillight for safety; 

 

Simple and easy to use controller with bigger swing lever, faster speed and better brakes after the rocker. The rocker press can be replaced.

 

 

 

 

If you already think that the KKA S1 is amazing, you have to know that it also comes with a remote control with which you can control the electric-skateboard and use the following commands:  

- Brake  

- Reverse

- Drive  

As you can see in the pictures, it also has a power button below it. What's more, the Bluetooth controlled balance allows the skateboard to adapt to the weight of the rider.

 

The KKA S1 is an amazingly easy electric skateboard and it's your own choice whether to use the controller or use the comfort of your own phone.

 

 

 

 

Our battery can last up to 3 days while charging only for 3 hours. They have 36 v/8.0 A and are the safest batteries on the market. It goes without saying that they have the following safety measures that have been checked over and over again by our team:  

- Flame Retardant  

- Overheating Protection  

- Explosion Protection

 

 

40 High Rate Discharge Life Battery, Capacity : 8800mAh/288Wh

Flame Retardant - Overheating Protection - Explosion Protection

 

 

Our company started with a simple idea: to reinvent transportation by creating a top-notch brand for our customers. We started our story in Las Vegas where we strived to lead the technology of boards. In 2015, we gave it a shot and we founded Better Wheels with the end-goal of shaking up the personal mobility industry. Following 2017, we created the "KKA" brand which stands for "Ok, Cool, America!" hoping to make it America's New Transportation.

We aimed high and went for a continuous pursuit of detail, high quality products and outstanding service. Here at KKA we aim to make perfect products for you.

I think we can all agree that skateboards have undergone many changes over the last couple of years. They went from classic skateboards to the creation of pennies, longboards and many other creations. However, there aren't so many skateboarders due to the low-safety measures they offer. Reduced balancing, high friction and poor aerodynamics are what drives people away from skateboards. There was much room for improvement in terms of turning, balancing

and using it in poor climates.

 

 

 

Once we saw the opportunity, we went straight for it. We saw that it's time for skateboards to provide the same lightweight and freestyle skating while also being modern, safe and fit for everyone.

 

That's how we got to the KKA S1 - a reliable electric skateboard that, combined with all of its components, creates the perfect way of transport. It's been in research and testing for years and we finally created a flawless skateboard. The KKA S1 is minimalistic, stylish, modern and last but not least, fashionable.

We reinvented the skateboard, while keeping its core components. We've made a better, faster and safer way of transportation while also making it durable, stronger and superior to anything else.

This amazing invention, the KKA S1 is not something that appeared out of nowhere. The first prototype was launched back in 2014 and received a lot of productive criticism and an overwhelming response from the community. All of these ideas and suggestions are what made the KKA S1 after carefully following every idea. This experience has led us to have a better perspective of what regular skateboarders want from a modern skateboard. They want it fast, reliable and flexible, allowing them to continuously stay on it without leaving the board.  

Simpler, this revolutionary skateboard allows you to do everything you could do with a regular skateboard, safer and faster. Having in mind its awesome steering and body frame, together with its high quality materials, it's perfect for both road and off-road trips. Compared to conventional skateboards, the KKA S1 stands out due to its amazing weight-balancing and dynamic cornering features.

 Although it has a battery in it, it won't bother you at all. We've designed the case to make it feel light and maneuverable. Of course, you can also use the board with the battery empty, while using the same features, without the remote-controlling. The lights used are incredibly durable and can easily be changed if needed.

The KKA S1 is perfect for any type of adventurer. Whether you're skateboarding to get to work or you are an adrenaline-filled enthusiast and no matter the age, no matter the distance, this electric skateboard is your safest choice!

 

Once introduced to the community, the KKA S1 has received an amazingly positive feedback and becomes more popular each day. Considering all of its features, we hope that it will replace the conventional skateboard within a couple of years.

Unlike regular skateboards, the KKA S1 doesn't need any kind of training or skateboarding experience. Step on it, push and ride. Even for advanced sports, its much easier to learn and to practice than with a conventional skateboard.

 

 

 

KKA S1 production model will be the lightest, most efficient - and most fun way to snowboard around your streets. Special pricing is only available to our Kickstarter visionaries as a thank-you for joining this movement.

 

 

 

Be Part of the Revolution

We want YOU to join us in changing the world and help us reinvent the skateboard as we know it. Our goal is to make skateboarding accessible for any person, regardless of their age. We are on the verge of being the next thing and we hope that you won't miss the opportunity to be part of this revolution.

Research and adapting to change is vital if survival is sought. To a common buyer, KKA S1 is the most trust-worthy way of transport and by far the safest as we have spent countless nights and days and hundreds of hours over schedule so we can test the S1 and bring you a perfect experience.

Currently, we're aiming to research the battery mechanics as we want this skateboard to be even more durable and as lightweight as possible, while keeping all of its awesome features intact. However, for growth and many more improvements, we need your help.

KKA S1 is not only our passion and dream - it represents an opportunity to change the skateboarding sport forever. It can make skateboarding available for everyone while also providing a reliable travel equipment. Regardless of age, the S1 is the perfect commuting device for you AND your family!

We have a keen interest in skateboarding and have many more ideas, however, they will require YOUR help in order for us to improve.

Risks and challenges

The KKA S1, an advanced and very popular product, there are often delays into full scale production. Luckily, we've been working with amazing suppliers and competent manufacturers to make it happen in time.

Our relationship with the manufacturers is unique as we have worked with them a lot of times before. They have never let us down and have proven the ability to foresee complications, therefore being ready for any problems and solving them before causing any harm. Therefore, with minimal to zero risks and almost no challenges, KKA S1 is the safest project to invest in.

All certifications and tests are projected early yet timely in order to assure top-quality control. Please drop any questions or feedback that you have as we're always eager to listen and help!

Special pricing is only available to our Kickstarter visionaries as a thank-you for joining this movement.   Be Part of the RevolutionWe want YOU to join us in changing the world and help us reinvent the skateboard as we know it. Our goal is to make skateboarding accessible for any person, regardless of their age. We are on the verge of being the next thing and we hope that you won't miss the opportunity to be part of this revolution.Research and adapting to change is vital if survival is sought. To a common buyer, KKA S1 is the most trust-worthy way of transport and by far the safest as we have spent countless nights and days and hundreds of hours over schedule so we can test the S1 and bring you a perfect experience.Currently, we're aiming to research the battery mechanics as we want this skateboard to be even more durable and as lightweight as possible, while keeping all of its awesome features intact. However, for growth and many more improvements, we need your help.KKA S1 is not only our passion and dream - it represents an opportunity to change the skateboarding sport forever. It can make skateboarding available for everyone while also providing a reliable travel equipment. Regardless of age, the S1 is the perfect commuting device for you AND your family!We have a keen interest in skateboarding and have many more ideas, however, they will require YOUR help in order for us to improve.Risks and challengesThe KKA S1, an advanced and very popular product, there are often delays into full scale production. Luckily, we've been working with amazing suppliers and competent manufacturers to make it happen in time.Our relationship with the manufacturers is unique as we have worked with them a lot of times before. They have never let us down and have proven the ability to foresee complications, therefore being ready for any problems and solving them before causing any harm. Therefore, with minimal to zero risks and almost no challenges, KKA S1 is the safest project to invest in.All certifications and tests are projected early yet timely in order to assure top-quality control. Please drop any questions or feedback that you have as we're always eager to listen and help!

story: Short of it is that I need a new bicycle. A few weeks back i was in an accident and while I'm ok my bike was pretty mangled up. I am putting this up mostly because it is my birthday this october and if family or friends (I'm not picky :) want to get me anything please help contribute to getting a bike that is not only new but also safer for me to ride than the rickety pieces of crap that I've been able to afford in the past. Thanks I hope the vid made you smile :) Thanks and ride safe

story:
Short Summary


BEN FELTEN IS AN INSPIRATIONAL BLIND GUY WHO WILL ATTEMPT TO SET A NEW BLINDFOLD MOTORCYCLE LAND SPEED RECORD AT OVER 265.33 KMPH IN AUSTRALIA. WE'VE SET A TARGET OF 270 KMPH!
The record attempt will be held as a Special Feature event of the Temora 1000 on October 25th 2014. The attempt is registered with the Guinness Book of World Records.

Ben is a former world champion rower and has a host of medals and records to his name in both rowing and cricket, representing Australia in both sports. Ben was instrumental in establishing rowing as paralympic sport. Ben is currently the President of Blind Sports NSW. 

Not content to just tackle this single record attempt; Ben plans to launch the In Sight of Dreams Foundation. In addition to inspiring young people to achieve their dreams, the In Sight of Freams Foundation wants to start a Motorsports Club for people with a disability. 


What We Need & What You Get

Can you help us by contributing towards raising the ~$150,000 its going to take to tackle this event and set up the In Sight of Dreams Foundation? Funds will go towards the cost of the bike, the timing & comms equipment, regulatory and legal fees, as well as making sure the team of mechanics, engineers and chase riders can make the attempt possible. Remaining funds will be directed towards the establishment of the foundation..

Oh, and we are looking for sponsors to! If your company would like to sponsor the attempt we would love to hear from you.

Any contribution you can make will help us get closer to achieving our target. Donate $27 and we will send you an autogrpahed poster.

Come and join us on this ride by being part of Club270! If you donate $270 you will  officially be a member of Club270 and be recognised on our website blindspeed.com.au . In addition, you'll recieve a limited edition signed T-Shirt. 

We also have limited number of Club270 Executive and Club270 Executive Plus   options available. Not only will you be recognised on the website but you'll get other benefits as well.

All funds will be put towards the Attempt, regardless of whether we reach the target or not. 

    The Impact

    Ultimately what Ben hopes to do by making this Attempt is to inspire people, disabled  or not to achieve their dreams. The Blindfold Motorcycle Land Speed Record Attempt is just a launch pad towards setting up the In Sight of Dreams Foundation. The Foundation will :

    • Mentor young people
    • Inspire young people to achieve their dreams
    • Support key charities that support the blind
    • Start a motorcycle club to give people with a disability a track experience 
    Ben has set up several successful sporting associations such as Sailability and was instrumental in making rowing a Paralympic sport. 

    Risks & Challenges

    Getting to the Attempt is no mean feat. In addition to financial costs there are a host of regulatory and technical issues to deal with. Key to this challenge is communication between Ben and his Chase Riders , without out whom Ben could not make the Attempt. In Ben's words, riding the bike is the easy bit!

    Ben is a former Motorbike racing enthusiast. 

    Ben has put together a team of experts in the field to help him overcome the many challenges the Attempt will throw  at him. These expert include the team at Motorcycle NSW, Motorcycle Australia, Australian Racing Drivers Club, Sydney Motorsport Park, Temora Shire Council, Suzuki Australia, Western Motorcycles and the organising committee of the Temora 1000.

    Ben will be riding a Suzuki Hayabusa 2014 which can reach speeds well over the 270kmph required. 

    Ben also has the support of a range of organisations such as Shark Helmets,  Berik, 4community, Suzuki and Moto Motion just to name a few who are all contributing to make sure this Attempt is a success. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Please get on board and help us promote the campaign - we have just 5 weeks left to make it happen!!

    Don't forget to share it through Facebook  -  www.facebook.com/blindlandspeedrecord

    If you know a company who would like to sponsor please contact kathryn.carey@4community.com or call 0418969149

story:
With KOINBE you can:

  • FIND items you want to share or borrow from your friends, family and community
  • CONNECT to the people around you on the go.
  • MEET your friends conveniently and share or borrow things quickly.
KOINBE allows everyone to share their things (drill, shoes, bikes, tools) with their friends, family and community. Imagine having access to things you want when you want them.










    OUR GRATITUDE PROGRAM:



     

    GRATITUDE PROGRAM EXPLAINED:







    RISKS & CHALLENGES:

    Running a social enterprise that aims to bring sharing economy to everyone inst going to be an easy job but together we will get it done. We have taken the time to research, analyze and asses all the risks and we believe that we will overcome them. Here are a few possible problems we are ready to face and overcome:

    • Delay in delivery of first public beta. Running a boostrapped, crowd supported social startup is harder than being backed by large venture capital funds and big investors but we welcome the challenge.
    • Delay on perks and gifts. We have calculated and double checked our math and everything is matching up nicely. In a case of unforeseen events we will work night and day to get all perks and gifts shipped on time and on budget.


    WAYS TO HELP:

    Here are other ways you can move mountains and make campaign a great success:

    • Spread the message of this campaign. Send it, Share it, Yell it, Copy&Paste it.
    • Join as a local community manager and be the first in your town to organize events, meetups and discussions around the sharing economy.
    • Put your cape on and join as a volunteer. Help the movement take off the ground and into the sky.
    • Join the team. See our open vacancies.

story:
Some of the press reviews:

“Now you can ride through town stylishly and effortlessly, surprising everyone with how you get there so fast and still look so good!”


"... iBike has a clean, retro-inspired look, weighs under 30 lb (13.6 kg), and a crowd-funding project tag below US$500. Is this the e-bike you've been waiting for?"

"Coolpeds' iBike aims to relieve two of the most common e-bike pain points: high cost and heavy weight."


Coolpeds USA has already successfully completed and delivered on a few super cool crowdfunding campaigns!


Transform your commute into a green and smile-inducing experience!

Introducing the world's most affordable and  lightweight electric bike.

The Coolpeds iBike is ready to revolutionize the electric bike industry with its super light weight (about 29 lb), powerful 350 Watt brushless motor, and front wheel drive system for easier handling.


                          STYLISH

We designed our entire bike to be beautiful down to the details.  We created a gorgeous retro style bike and finished it with a genuine leather seat and grips.  The battery is even concealed in a matching leather-look pouch (unlike other electric bikes that have very large and tacky plastic battery compartments).  So you can ride through town stylishly and effortlessly, surprising everyone with how you get there so fast and still look so good!

This is the most updated picture of the Coolpeds iBike showing the REAR BRAKE and the free upgraded leather BATTERY BAG with metal twist and magnet locks!


We now offer a straight handle bar option at no extra cost!


                 ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT

Just as much as we want to make you look good, we want to make your life easier. So we made sure to build the lightest e-bike out there.  We maximized style, function, and power while minimizing any excess bulk with a lightweight frame and slim tires.  Some other e-bikes weigh a hefty 50 pounds, which is difficult to carry around town, especially on daily commutes.  

Our electric bike weighs an amazing 29 pounds, which makes it easier to carry and accessible for many more people. It is light enough to be carried down steps to the subway, pushed through town in crowded areas, or carried with you wherever you need to go.  The smart LCD display control unit lets you adjust the top speed limit (power assist)  from levels 1-5.


      EASY TO RIDE & COMFORTABLE

Start riding immediately at the push of a button or by pedaling.  The spring cushion leather seat and tall handle bar provide a comfortable seat and riding posture.  The Smart LCD display also helps you customize your max speed setting and check your speed, battery level, and range traveled.

DETAILS




PRESS & REVIEWS

See us on CBS TV nationwide coverage!!

http://cbsdreamteam.com/the-henry-fords-innovation-nation/episodes/hover-bike/


Previous successful campaigns!

Coolpeds has already successfully completed a few crowdfunding campaigns, such as the super cool Briefcase Electric Scooter!

 

Test ride day at UCLA

Coolpeds booth at CES Las Vegas 2016

TECHNICAL SPECS

SPECIFICATIONS

The Specs - The Basics

Style:

Cruiser / Vintage

Transmission:

Single-Speed

Brakes:

V

Seat:

Genuine Leather + Under Spring Suspension

Lighting:

Front LED Lights / Rear Reflector

Fenders:

Optional add on

Kickstand:

Rear

Warranty:

1 Year All Parts

The Specs - Frame

Frame:

Steel lightweight Cruiser Frame

Handlebar:

Stainless steel tall cruiser bar for extra comfort

Fork:

Steel

The Specs - Wheels

Wheels:

26" x 2" Beach Cruiser Rims 

Tires:

26" x 2" (32 PSI)

Tubes:

26" x 2" 48mm Valve

The Specs - Performance

Motor:

36-Volt 350-Watts

Battery:

36-Volt 12 Ah

Top Speed
(Pedal Assist):

30 mph

Top Speed
(Fully Electric):

20 mph

Range
(Pedal-Assist):

Up to 50 miles

Range
(Fully Electric):

Up to 20 miles

Throttle Type:

Smart LCD display; 5-Level with brake safety power cut off

MANUFACTURING AND DELIVERY

The Coolpeds eBikes mass production line will start in August.   Most of the tooling and molds are complete already.    So your bike will be made and delivered for sure! 

PERK TIMELINE

June- crowd funding starts


July- campaign ends


August- production starts


September- first batch ships


ABOUT OUR TEAM



Tony Chan - founder of Coolpeds USA, graduated from UCLA, with over 15 years of manufacturing, international marketing, and automotive racing technology experiences; he previously worked at Accenture and Microsoft in Seattle as a software developer.  Tony received a number of patents in the USA for designs in various products and the innovative Coolpeds Briefcase Electric Scooter.  

Tony L - mechanical and electrical guru, with over 25 years of experience in electric motor design, industrial automation design, metal fabrication, tooling and molding, and manufacturing.

Jeff Smith - graduated from the Rhode Island School of Design in industrial design and has over 15 years of professional experience in designing sports products.

Karina Y - finance and marketing guru, graduated from York University in Toronto

Chester Mui - graduated from Tufts University, with over 10 years of expertise in product launch and global marketing; previously worked at IBM and Groupon USA.  



FAQ

What size is the Coolpeds ebike frame?

The frame is built to be one size fits most, and it has been tested up to 220 lbs.

What size are the tires?

26" x 1.5"

How many watts is the motor?

EU version 350W motor. EU version is 250W motor.

What is the range of the battery?

Electric/Pedal assist range up to 30-50 miles (rider weight and terrain contingent).

Under Electric Power Range - up to 20 miles (rider weight and terrain contingent).

What are the battery specifications?

36V  10Ah Samsung lithium ion battery

Is the frame aluminum or steel?

Carbon steel frame

How much does the Coolpeds eBike weigh?

The entire bike weighs about  14kg or 30 lbs

How fast is this bike?

Up to 20 MPH (rider weight and terrain contingent).

What is the gear ratio of the drive system?

Single gear.

When will I receive my Coolpeds eBIke?

Please refer to the Perk Timeline graphic above.

Can I get a refund?

Please read Indiegogo's policy here.

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

The backer is responsible.

How much is shipping?

USA is $168 and International is $239.

Do all perks require shipping be paid?

Yes.

Will I be able to buy replacement parts?

Yes via the official www.coolpeds.us website
