story:
Xtreme Fat Tire Bikes and Components team have designed a Electric Fat Bike that can cycle through any terrain and over many obstacles. We use  a Front Hub Motor that with combined with your own pedal power creates an All-Wheel Drive Fat Tire Electric Bike. This powerful E-Bike literally has no limits. We have a 750 watt and 1000 watt option for you to choose from.You can now cycle upstairs, over logs, and over most any obstacle your bottom bracket can clear and even some it can’t. The All-Terrain System allows cycling on even the softest sand, snow, deep mud, and gravel. For a LIMITED TIME only you can purchase our electric bikes for under $1000.

This Electric Bike is Literally  Unstoppable!!!!!

Why Front Wheel Drive?

Here's Why: By taking our ultimate Fat Bike and adding our Front Wheel Drive Electric System we feel we have designed a ONE OF A KIND E-Bike.

Most Electric Bikes are either rear wheel drive mid - drive, rear system.  This puts all the torque on the rear and as anyone who has ever driven through soft terrain like sand, snow, mud or over obstacles like curbs, stairs or logs, would know front wheel drive torque performs better.

With the motor in the front, you can go through any terrain. Also, with others rear torque systems, at top speed, in soft terrain, when you attempt to turn you easily could dig the wheel in and cause a dangerous situation.

With our E-Bike, you just power through those turns. And by adding a little pedal power you have an ALL-WHEEL DRIVE  E-BIKE  that will cycle through any terrain and over it almost anything!

Choose from the sleek E-Grizzly with matte black frame and fork and yellow neon rims or are game stalker E-Cherokee with camouflage frame, fork and rims. Both electric bikes are available with a 750 Watt, 36 Volt E-Bike system for speeds up to 20 mph or the 1000 Watt, 48 Volt E-Bike system with speeds up to 25 mph which is for off road use only.

Why Ride a Fat Tire E-Bike?

If you are a commuter, looking to protect the environment, or just a person looking to save money on  gas, then this e bike is for you. You can easily get around town, avoid traffic jams and enjoy the outdoors on our Electric Bikes.

Other great uses for our fat E-Bikes are for hunters, or a rider looking to go places they have only been able to get to on foot before, or someone that’s just up for some xtreme riding.

Xtreme’s Fat E-Bikes will get you there!

What makes Xtreme’s eBike so much better than the rest?

Our Safety Features:

Our Braking System:

We only use Avid Disc Rotors and Calipers and we use a 180mm rotor on both the Front and Rear for maximum stopping power.


Our eBike Motor:

Our motor only works with your thumb on the throttle; it shuts off automatically when you release it.


Our Tires:

Our Fat Tires are the widest width available which provides stability and superior stopping power.

Most other Fat Tire E-Bikes utilize either Center or Rear Wheel Drive Systems. This not only is a Safety Factor in Loose or Soft Terrain but, it also prohibits their ability to move through loose terrain or over obstacles.

The Rear Wheel Drive System is proven to turn poorly in Soft Terrain and can be hard to maneuver which can be dangerous at high speeds in soft terrain such as snow, grass or sand.

The Center Wheel Drive Systems can become unstable on uneven terrains and negotiating obstacles and have far more difficulty in climbing obstacles compared to the ALL-Wheel Drive System.

We have designed the first ever ALL-WHEEL Drive for SUPERIOR SAFETY and BEST for getting through most any terrain, and over obstacles!

Our Copyrighted Skull Tire with its’ 5” width is made of Puncture-Resistant Rubber and is currently the WIDEST FAT TIRE being  manufactured.


This tire is not only the coolest out there, but is very functional as well with its Center Bead.

You can Ride on only 10mm of tire when on hard surfaces and with 5” of width you have the widest tire made for soft terrain. This tire works with 5 PSI to 30 PSI, so it can be flattened out for very Soft Terrain and add pressure to 30 PSI for the road. This tire with its large air capacity acts just like a Shock for Jumps and Rough Terrain.

Electric Bike Battery:

Our batteries are made by Greenway, one of the top Battery Manufacturers is Asia. It uses a separate Water Bottle Mount that is not part of the battery like most other companies use and can be easily removed without having to take off any wires from the battery. This battery has a sealed shell that is completely Water Proof with its own built in voltage meter to tell if it needs a charge or not. Plus it has a neat carrying handle attached to it for Easy Removal  to carry for security or take with you to charge. This comes either as a 36 Volt or 48 Volt system and uses only the best Lithium Ion Technology with Sony Cells.

Front Hub Electric Bike Motor:

Choose From: 750 Watt with 36 Volts for everyone, OR

1000 Watt with 48 Volts for Off Road Use Only for the Xtreme Rider in You.

This allows you to have a Fat E-Bike that can take you literally anywhere!

Rear Wheel System:

Rear Wheel is a Quick Release Hub with a Shimano 11-36T Cassette and an 8-Speed Shimano Alivio Rear Derailleur.

Now add these two great features together and here’s what you get:

The only Fat Bike which is All-Wheel Drive on the Market. This Bike’s Drive System will literally take you anywhere, over most any object, even upstairs and over logs with ease.

In Addition:

Top Quality Sealed Bearings Components: Our E-Bikes are not only made for any Terrain but, also any environment with its sealed Bearing Head Set, Bottom Bracket, and Hubs making it completely weather resistant.

All Alloy Components: 

We use all alloy parts and frame for additional weather resistance.

Front Hub Motors and Electric Systems:

750 Watt System: We use a Front Hub Motor which has an all Alloy sealed Shell. The 36V Battery which is Lithium Ion cells and its sealed case with handles is easy to remove and change.

1000 Watt System: (Off Road Only Version) We use the same Front Hub Motor but with 48 V Battery and both have a 22 AMP Sealed Control Unit mounted to the Seat Post.

**(Wattage is Calculated Volts X AMPS= Watts.  36V X 22 AMP= 792 Watts and 48V X 22 AMPS= 1052 Watts)**

All of our motors are Brushless and our parts, as well as, our cord plugs are water resistant.

Control Pad and Throttle:

Handle bar mounted, Control pad and Throttle

Our Bike has three Levels which are controlled by the Control Pad:

Low: For just cruising

Medium: For riding through and over most any obstacle or terrain.

High: For full torque and speed

Warranty and After Market Support:

Xtreme Fat Bikes uses the best Cycling and E-Components made. We Warranty the Frame and Fork System for Three Years and all of our E-Components are plug and play. So, even after our Six Month Warranty we can Replace any part separately and never have to replace the whole unit. Our Hub Motors slide out of their Shell and can be replaced as well, without ever having to Re-Lace a new Hub.

Variety of Bike Sizes:

For your safety and comfort we offer a variety of E-Bike sizes.

Xtreme will personally size you to make sure we put you on a perfect Bike that fits you!

Small 15”: Fits 5’6” and under

Medium 18”: Fits 5’4” to 6’4”

Large 21”: Fits 6’2” and taller

Components:


Rear Wheel System:

E-Control Unit Components:

 Xtreme’s Camouflage Rims

(Available under Perks Sold Seperately)

Rim Specifications:

100mm Ultra- Light Alloy Rims , 26" by 100mm  with Cut-Outs

Schrader Valve ,36H

Camouflage Color 

$99.50 Per Set (2 Rims ) 

Two Black Rim Strips Included 

Shipping $50 within Continental USA.


Xtreme Hunting and Fishing Gear Rack:

Can mount to Front Or Back as Shown in Photos

Specifications:

Steel Fishing and Hunting Rack with Optional Camouflage coating

Three Rubber straps for fishing rods of any size, two for bow and one for arrow, or three to hold rifles.

All bolts and nuts are Stainless Steel.


Xtreme 's Optional Rear Standard Bike Rack


Specifications:

Standard steel rear bike rack with a 31.8 mm seat post clamp mount.

Stainless steel bolts for attachment with alloy brackets to allow for easy mount on our bikes or most any bike with a 190mm rear drop out

Will hold up to 50 LBS of weight.

Easy to attach for Fishing and Hunting Gear Racks




E-Bike Conversion Kits:
(Sold Separately)
Everything you'll need to convert your bike to an E-Bike! Kit includes: a Sealed Hub Motor, Seat Post Mount Control Unit, Plugs & Cords, 750 Watt, 36 Volt Sealed Battery with Water Bottle Mount & Key. Handle Bar Mounted, Thumb Throttle, Control Pad and Rapid Charger, Steel Front Fork with 1 1/8 “ stem and 135mm drop-out. Shipping to the Continental US is included in price. Shipping to International Locations varies by destination, please contact us for quote.

E-Bike Specifications:

Frame: Alloy Al6061, with front emblem (Alloy).

Fork: Steel 1  1/8” Threadless.

Headset: 1  1/8 Threadless, Sealed Bearings, Alloy Shell.

Handlebars:  Alloy 31.8mm center clamp, 700 mm length with 35mm rise (textured black).

Stem:  1  1/8”  Alloy with 31.8 mm clamp, 90mm length.

Brakes/Levers: Avid BB5 disc brakes with Front/Rear 180mm Rotors.

Rims and Wheel Sets:

Rim: 100mm Alloy Rims with Cut Outs, ultra-light single wall alloy, welded seam, 36H.

Front Hubs: Motor Hub with Alloy sealed Shell, 750 Watt or 1000 Watt System or KT 135mm Alloy with sealed bearings Quick Release.

Rear Hub: Alloy Hub with Sealed Bearings and 8-Speed Cassette, Quick Release.

Tire: 26’ by 5” width; Widest tires manufactured with Copyrighted Skull Design. High density rubber for puncture resistance with center bead.

Tubes: 4” x 26” Schrader valve.

Components:

Crank Set:  Alloy 38T chain ring, Alloy crank with 175mm arm.

Chain: KMC Rust Buster.

BB Set: Steel shell, sealed bearings, 100mm shell width.

Shifter: Shimano 8-Speed Alivio

Rear Derailleur: Alivio 8-Speed

Seatpost: Alloy 27.2 mm, 350 mm length (black)

Seatpost Clamp:Alloy with Quick Release.

Weight and Packing:

Packing: 85% complete.

Weight: Grizzly 38 Ibs, E-Grizzly 56 Ibs

E-Components:

Front Wheel Hub Motor: 750 Watt  36V or 1000 Watt 48V, Brushless Hub with Alloy Sealed Shell.

Throttle:

Throttle: Handle Bar Mounted Thumb Throttle

Control Pad:  Control Pad with three power levels.

Control Unit: Seat Post mounted rear 22 AMP.

Speed: 36V gets 20 MPH, distance at full speed steady 30 Miles+, 

48V gets 30MPH at full speed steady 30 Miles+

FAQs - Frequently Asked Questions:

Why Doesn’t Our Bike Have Shocks?

Installing shocks on a Fat Tire Bike offers no significant value. The Fat Tires behave like shocks due to the large volume of air they contain and will cushion your ride over rough terrain and obstacles.

Why is Xtreme E-Bike the Only “REAL” Fat Tire E-Bike?

Fat Tire Electric Bikes with Rear Wheel Motors are really not true Fat Tire E-Bikes they are really just Electric Bikes with Fat Tires and are limited to cycling on streets and hard terrain.

Here’s why:

The Rear Wheel Drive E-Bike’s front wheel will dig in and bog down in loose terrain, making it dangerous to ride. In addition, the E-Bike not drive over loose terrain and obstacles. Everyone in the auto industry will tell you Front Wheel Drive is preferred in snow and dirt and that All Wheel Drive is the most effective method for riding to places you cannot get to with Rear Wheel Drive. Our Xtreme E-Bike will allow you to cycle in any and all terrain. You will not get this with a Rear Wheel Fat Tire E-Bike. Instead all you get is an E-Bike with the look of a Fat Tire Bike!

Our Electric Bike is Front Wheel Drive. What Exactly Does This Mean? 

The Front Wheel Drive makes our Bike the only All-Terrain Electric Bike currently in production. The Xtreme E-Bike can take you anywhere. You can ride on sand, snow, mud, upstairs and over obstacles. No other E-Bike in today’s market will allow you to do anything except ride on streets and other hard surfaces. If you are someone who enjoys riding on the beach, in the snow, on trails as well as the street, than this is the best E-Bike for you.

What Makes Our Company Better and Able to Guarantee You Will Receive a Bike? 

We have already produced and sold close to 100 “Real” Fat Tire E-Bikes. Our Xtreme E-Bikes are not only being used for personal use but for commercial use as rental units at beach and ski resorts. What better way to tour the country side of a resort town than on a Fat Tire All Terrain E-Bike?

We have recently sold several E-Bikes to a company that conducts cavern tours at the Louisville Mega Cavern, a 100 acre set of caves system in Louisville, Kentucky.

In addition, we have received only positive feedback from everyone who has tested and ridden our E-Bikes. They all agree that Front Wheel Drive combined with peddling power allows them much more freedom to ride to places that they could not go with a Rear Wheel Drive E-Bike.

What is the Difference between the E-Cherokee and E-Grizzly? 

These are the exact same E-Bike. The E-Cherokee is all Camouflage; the E-Grizzly is Matte Black with Neon Yellow Rims. 

What is the Difference between the 750 Watt and 1000 Watt E-Bike? 

Power is the only difference between our 750 Watt and 1000 Watt Electric Bikes.

The 1000 Watt has more power which you can use to get a little more speed to about 25 MPH and climbing and riding over obstacles; the 750 Watt will reach speeds of 20 MPH and while it cycles over obstacles, it does have less climbing power.

How Do you get maximum Speed from your E-Bike?

Check and make sure that none of your brake pads are rubbing the tires. Also, be sure that your tires are inflated to 28 Ibs.


How Do I get a correct reading from my Spedometer?

Spedometers measure speed based on the diameter of tires. Most are not calibrated to proper settings. Make sure it is set at 29.5 tire diameter to ensure proper readings.


 How Far can you Travel on a Charged Battery?

Both the 750 Watt and the 1000 Watt Electric Bike can go around 20 Miles on hard surface at top speed without any peddling. The distance will vary if you are on soft terrain or going up hills as that takes more power.

If you add peddling to your journey you can substantially increase the distance you can travel on a fully charged battery.

How Long Does it Take to Fully Charge the Battery?

A completely depleted battery takes approximately three hours to charge.

How Long Will the Battery Last?

The battery is rated to last 500 cycles. A cycle = depleting a battery then fully charging it 500 times. So how long the battery last depends on how much usage. Most batteries last a lot longer than 500 Cycles more like 1000-1500 Charges because, typically a battery is never completed depleted prior to charging.

What is Our Warranty with Our Electric Bikes?

We offer a one year manufacturer’s warranty on all parts except the battery which is warrantied for six months.

We also offer an extended warranty for an additional year to cover the electrical components excluding the battery available for purchase at $150.00

How Do We Let You Know What Size and Color E-Bike We Want?

We will contact you at the end of the campaign to confirm the size and color of your E-Bike and email you an invoice confirming your specifications.

How Can You Contact Us Once You Purchase Your E-Bike and After the IndieGoGo Campaign has Ended?

Visit our website at www.XtremeFatTireBikes.com where you can email us or Call us at: (757) 635-5160 or Toll Free at (800) 820-7659.

Xtreme Fat Tire Bikes and Components team have designed a Electric Fat Bike that can cycle through any terrain and over many obstacles. We use  a Front Hub Motor that with combined with your own pedal power creates an All-Wheel Drive Fat Tire Electric Bike. This powerful E-Bike literally has no limits. We have a 750 watt and 1000 watt option for you to choose from.You can now cycle upstairs, over logs, and over most any obstacle your bottom bracket can clear and even some it can’t. The All-Terrain System allows cycling on even the softest sand, snow, deep mud, and gravel. For a LIMITED TIME only you can purchase our electric bikes for under $1000.This Electric Bike is Literally  Unstoppable!!!!!Why Front Wheel Drive?Here's Why: By taking our ultimate Fat Bike and adding our Front Wheel Drive Electric System we feel we have designed a ONE OF A KIND E-Bike.Most Electric Bikes are either rear wheel drive mid - drive, rear system.  This puts all the torque on the rear and as anyone who has ever driven through soft terrain like sand, snow, mud or over obstacles like curbs, stairs or logs, would know front wheel drive torque performs better.With the motor in the front, you can go through any terrain. Also, with others rear torque systems, at top speed, in soft terrain, when you attempt to turn you easily could dig the wheel in and cause a dangerous situation.With our E-Bike, you just power through those turns. story:
Hi. My name is Paul Trunzo. I have a BA from Knox College, Galesburg, Illinois. The ideas I've acquired over the years have come from two trade schools that I've received degrees from: National Radio Institute, Washington, DC, and also Foley Belsaw, Kansas City, MO . I used to tear down TV sets and VCRs for friends and family. I saved my family a good bit of money by repairing lawn mower equipment.


Generating clean energy is a worthy endeavor. Unfortunately, over the past few years it's become more difficult to work on my projects. I'm attempting to obtain outside funding to make my work a little easier. The work I propose may be able to  increase the efficiency of solar panels all over the world by up to 30%. I need to create a machine that moves smoothly, and produces approx. 1.5 amps or more of electrical energy.


I need to obtain a large garage and hire two wood workers/metal workers, one mathematician, and one cad operator. I , also , need 2 courses: one in CAD; the other in CNC.
story_txt: Hi. My name is Paul Trunzo. I have a BA from Knox College, Galesburg, Illinois. The ideas I've acquired over the years have come from two trade schools that I've received degrees from: National Radio Institute, Washington, DC, and also Foley Belsaw, Kansas City, MO . I used to tear down TV sets and VCRs for friends and family. I saved my family a good bit of money by repairing lawn mower equipment.Generating clean energy is a worthy endeavor. Unfortunately, over the past few years it's become more difficult to work on my projects. I'm attempting to obtain outside funding to make my work a little easier. The work I propose may be able to  increase the efficiency of solar panels all over the world by up to 30%. I need to create a machine that moves smoothly, and produces approx. 1.5 amps or more of electrical energy. I need to obtain a large garage and hire two wood workers/metal workers, one mathematician, and one cad operator. I , also , need 2 courses: one in CAD; the other in CNC.

story:
The world's first home drone that you can fly from anywhere on the planet.





By connecting to the Internet, Rook allows you to control and view the camera stream from your phone in real-time. Just connect Rook to your home Wi-Fi network, and use it as a platform for different needs in your life:

  • Flying security camera
  • Sensing device integrated into your smart home suite
  • Pet monitor or baby/nanny/family cam
  • Video tour of your home
  • See whether you turned off the stove, locked the front door, or where you left your wallet





Rook was started by engineers at Northwestern University who noticed that all current drones on the market require you to be nearby to control them. They wouldn't connect once you stepped out of range. 

So we created Rook, the first consumer drone that connects to the Internet, allowing you to control the drone from your office, the gym, or anywhere else in the world... anytime!









Current drones have complicated roll, pitch, and yaw controls (what?!), lacking intuitive controls that would be useful for everyday consumers. Users can't easily program them or set up indoor flight routines. We wanted a drone that was easy to setup and fly. And that's how the idea for Rook was born.



The basic free package allows you to stream video from Rook. In the future, we will also release premium paid plans to give you access to tons of cool features like security analytics, multi-user access, and triggered routines running on the cloud. 

Premium plans will allow Rook to be integrated with existing smart home systems, be used for scheduled flight routines to check on the house, or allow realtors and property management folks to show their listings to clients who live far away.




What You Get

By backing this project, you'll be the FIRST in the world to have your very own Rook, at a highly discounted price. In addition, a free Android/iOS app will let you control and view your Rook, anywhere you are.


Bonuses

But that's not all! We're working on more features that you might like, such as:
  • Voice command flight
  • Child-friendly programming game for parents and educators
  • Platform for triggered routines
  • Integration with smart home systems
  • Enterprise and government solutions
Finally, refer five friends and your Rook is free! We'll track your referrals through a special Indiegogo code once you back the campaign.



The Team and the Vision

Our vision is a drone in every home, a flying robot assistant with useful software that you can use from anywhere in the world. Join us in being a part of a visionary group of people who bring this vision of everyday robotics into the world! 





Other Ways You Can Help

Supporters like you really are key to making this a success. In addition to pre-ordering Rook or backing one of the other tiers, you can help by: 

  • Sharing Rook on Facebook 
  • Sharing our Facebook ads, whenever you see them
  • Writing about us if you're a blogger or journalist
  • Software developer? Get in touch to see how you can develop for Rook.


Risks

HARDWARE IS... WELL HARD. MANY HARDWARE PROJECTS HAVE DIFFICULTY DELIVERING. 
Some hardware campaigns promise many things and try to make everything from scratch: from recalculating aerodynamics of the drone frame, to even writing their own trigonometric math functions for their microprocessor.
In contrast, we are not reinventing the wheel. We're using off-the-shelf components as much as possible, which greatly reduces risk because tooling is often the most costly aspect of hardware development. Our approach is to under promise and over deliver, never the other way around.


Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

When does Rook ship?
We expect Rook to begin shipping worldwide around December 2016! As an early backer, you will get Rook before anyone else in the world.

Can Rook work on iOS/Android?
Yes. Both :)

How long is the battery? How often how I check Rook?
Currently Rook can be flown for 5 min, which is enough for a checkup in most houses. You can check Rook on your break from school/work every hour. We're working on sourcing better batteries, and battery capacity is improving all the time!

What colors or designs can I get Rook in?
We'd love to have your feedback on what you'd like - we're asking our customers for the most popular colors and designs, and will work with manufacturers to try to deliver them!

What does the name “Rook” mean?
Rook is a chess piece, a chariot. It's also an intelligent blackbird that flies in Europe and Asia. We want Rook to be a useful flying tool that you can use indoors to improve your life. It's also short for "Rookie," since we're rookies to entrepreneurship (a nod to Mr. Branson's "Virgin" brand, when he was a virgin to business).

I’m an educator/parent. How can my kids use Rook?
If there's customer demand, we'll release a child-friendly "game" that comes with Rook, so young children can intuitively interact with Rook the drone, and command a robot. Let us know in the comments if you'd pay for this game!

I’m interested in a corporate partnership / I want to use Rook for my business. How can I get in touch with you?
Please tell us what industry you're in and how you'd like to use Rook at corporate@eightyninerobotics.com. We are working on a more robust version for industry.

I’m a distributor, and I want to sell Rook. What’s the MSRP? Can we be the exclusive distributor?
Wholesale price is $99, and the MSRP range is $200-250. We have received many inquiries about distribution, so unfortunately we can not work with you exclusively. Sorry!

I’m a developer / I want to hack with Rook. Are there plans for an API?
Currently no, mostly due to security concerns. If you are a developer who is passionate about the vision of Rook and want to help in your spare time, contact us at developers@eightyninerobotics.com.

I have a great idea / comment / other question. How can I contact you?
Leave us a comment in the comments section of this campaign - we promise to read every one of them!

What about FAA regulations?
If Rook is used as intended and flown indoors, FAA limitations do not apply to Rook.

story:
Beautiful in its simplicity

 

VOLTERY team   

   We are two guys from Sønderborg, Denmark with knowledge in business management, manufacturing process  and engineering, which are passionate about providing a cheaper alternative to electric bicycles already on the market. It seems that electric bikes are more of a high end product and we want to change that. And we can. With the help and contributions we will be able to produce an stylish affordable and practical e-bike.

What We Need & What You Get

   We are looking for 50 000$ to fund our project. The money will be spent on acquiring parts and materials to construct the bicycle, pay for workshop and utilities. Importing parts is expensive and we calculate that it will take most of the funding. We just want to make the bike and ship it to our customers and backers as soon as possible.

The Impact

   VOLTERY is a Danish quality electric bicycle. It is simple yet versitile. We want for it to be affordable as to a high school student working in summer break, as to a university professor who is just tired of sitting in traffic jams in a city.

Beautiful in its simplicity is our motto.

   The bike itself is simple, it folds and fits in a trunk of a Mini, but you get enough power from 250/350W electric motor to last for around 50 km using a varied mode (except model VOLTERY 350 PEGS). Simple 3 speed internal gearbox allows bicycle to reach 25km/h - 32km/h  easily. Uphill or downhill is not a problem.

We are offering 3 types of running gear for VOLTERY:

  • VOLTERY 250 WPA is a starter e-bike. If you want to have simple and reliable commute bicycle, this is for you. Not the most powerful of e-bikes, but will get you where needed. It is for people, who do not want to charge that often. The battery combined with motor has the most range. You lose some speed, but for city driving, going to and from work it is all you need.
  •  VOLTERY 350 WPA is our most powerful version. Get all the speed you need from 350W motor and never be late for appointment. Good for hillier regions where you definitely will feel the advantage of more power to reach the peak. More power means less range, but the difference is not so big to change your biking habits. 
  • VOLTERY 350 PEGS is for the one who does not care about biking. If you just want to get there, use this option. No biking, no sweat. Just sit there and relax while controlling the speed on the handlebar. Least range of all, meant to be as a last mile transport. If you have some blocks from train station or parking garage to get to your work, this is the option for you. 

Risks & Challenges

      Biggest risks consist of getting the right parts in the right condition, importing and delays in shipping are scary, but doing extensive research in manufacturers and suppliers will avoid most of the hurdles. As we both are interested in success of VOLTERY, no obstacle is too big to overcome.

   We are in constant contact with parts manufacturers, to ensure best quality and most reasonable price, having contacts in shipping and delivery has helped us to lower the costs and time expenditure severely. If there is a delay at any point, we have enough experience to deal with it ensuring timely delivery to our customers.

Other Ways You Can Help...

   We understand that not everyone can contribute financially, but spreading the word can help a lot too.

   We want to reach as big of an audience as possible to help us succeed, so please share and post about VOLTERY!

Frequently asked questions

Q:The price is very low for an e-bike. Why is that?

A: It is a campaign price, the price only accessible to our backers. Our dream is to make cycling accessible to everyone. We have worked long and hard to create an e-Bike that is affordable and made from quality components.

Q: How can you ensure such a low price?

A: A key factor is having a good relationship with manufacturers and streamlined production, so no extra costs occur.  We have tested and tried the manufacturing capabilities of companies we are working with, so we know each and every part of the process.

Q: How confident are you that you can deliver on time?

A: Very, we will work directly with manufacturers of Voltery parts, to have the best results and timelines. If pressure is necessary, we will be on our phones 24/7 to deliver the bike on the date we promised.

Q:Can I get the Voltery in Peru?

Yes, we deliver Voltery anywhere in the world. 

Q: What is the weight limitation for Voltery?

A: Voltery is build strong and can handle riders up to 125 kg with ease.

Q: Does Voltery come in different sizes?

A: The Voltery e-bike is completely adjustable. It does not matter how tall or short are you. It is made to fit all and will do so with ease.

Q: How much does Voltery weigh?

A: Voltery weighs approximately 19 kg (42 lbs) without the battery and 21.5 kgs with the battery.

Q: Can I still bike on Voltery if the battery runs out of power?

A: Of course! If you run out of power, you can cycle as you would do with a regular bicycle. Even without an engine it is easy to ride. Except the bike without pedal assist.

Q: Can I charge the battery by pedalling?

A: At the moment, no, but we are working on it for the future products.

Q: Can the battery be removed?

A: Yes. The battery is designed in a way that you can change it or replace with 2 easy steps that takes less than a minute.

Q: I live in Denmark, can i pick it up myself?

No. We do not have a retail office, and all Voltery e-bikes will be shipped to your door.

story:
This is the platform that lets you set up and program your intelligent car

What if your car was intelligent like KITT in the 80’s TV show Knight Rider? With AutoPi all cars become intelligent and can have eyes, ears and a voice.

Until now all functionality and data from cars have belonged only to the manufacturers. With AutoPi the car owners can, as a cooperating community, take control over their own vehicles and data without having to be an engineer.

The AutoPi Dongle and the AutoPi Cloud is an IoT maker platform, which allows you to add advanced features to your car and gives you a lot of extension possibilities.

With both a hardware dongle and a software cloud platform, we offer you some of the coolest features available today.

There are virtually no limits to what you can build with the AutoPi platform

Below you can see some of our best ideas, and we hope to inspire you guys to make some truly cool stuff!

On our website, it is possible to vote for the usecase you want us to develop first.

The rest of the features will be implemented after in order, starting with the most voted.

IoT maker platform

With the AutoPi Cloud we provide access to an online cloud platform where you can manage every aspect of your intelligent car.

The AutoPi Cloud comes with some killer features, created to help you make your own IoT Platform for your car. These features includes:

  • Fully customizable dashboard with interactive widgets.
  • View data from your historic trips.
  • Easily add new features from a growing add-ons library.
  • Discover advanced OBD/CAN commands from a growing user-maintained library.
  • Test and communicate directly with your car, using the built-in terminal.
  • Advanced if-this-then-that triggers. You can add your own triggers and events - even from custom built code.
  • Create your own code modules with the built-in IDE and integrate with new external devices and more.

Advanced triggers

The best foundation for your car-based IoT project

AutoPi Core runs on your AutoPi Dongle and ensures communication with your car, connected peripheral devices and communication to the AutoPi Cloud. It collects and securely stores your vehicle data, letting you access them from the AutoPi Cloud or via the API.

We have created a software stack from the bottom up. You can focus on building killer features right away, instead of spending time on tedious configuration and setup of the underlying platform foundation (drivers, network, security, logging etc.).

Highlights of the AutoPi Core

  • Enforces maximum security on your AutoPi Dongle.
  • Ensures stable and secure communication with your car.
  • Integrates with connected peripheral devices.
  • Advanced power management to prevent battery drain.

One Powerful Device

AutoPi is built on top of Raspberry Pi and works as the link between your car and the AutoPi Cloud. We decided to pack it with a number of leading edge hardware components, giving you maximum possibilities.

The AutoPi Dongle comes assembled with a Raspberry Pi Zero Wirelss and works out-of-the-box, but in some cases you may need more processing power for advanced tasks. That is why we created the AutoPi Rasperry Pi 3 Adapter board. This is a small HAT adapter, which makes sure that the AutoPi Dongle can be connected to the Raspberry Pi 3.

We have created a few demonstration videos that will teach and show you exactly how to use the features of the AutoPi Cloud platform.

Installation of the AutoPi Dongle is simple. It just needs to be plugged into your car's OBD-II port. All cars produced after 2002 have an OBD-II port.

With a simple setup procedure, similar to a Google Chromecast, everyone can do it.

We have packed the AutoPi Dongle with leading edge hardware components, giving it unprecedented specifications.

The AutoPi dongle comes fully assembled and ready to be plugged into your car. This is included in the box when you receive your copy.

We want to be honest and upfront about our delivery dates. Here is how we see the timeline.

Compare the different AutoPi Dongle editions, so you can choose the right one for your needs.

Always upgradeable

The WiFi Only and DIY editions can always be upgraded later on with any supported 4G/LTE modem, if needed.

This is the Perks available

We have arranged for a trusted and well-known company to ship the AutoPi to you. This will help you get your AutoPi faster, and allows us to offer EU and USA friendly shipping.

We are proud to offer worldwide shipping. Whether you are in the USA, South America or India, you can purchase an AutoPi without worrying about expensive shipping costs!

The AutoPi project has been a long journey, ranging a couple of years back. Our vision for the project has been changed somewhat from the beginning. We have been through many revisions of our prototype and this has brought us to where we are now. Our initial concept was built on the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, but when the Zero became available we decided to incorporate it instead.

We are a team of dedicated and hardworking friends. We are engineers, creators, innovators, thinkers, makers, software developers and much more.

We are located in Aalborg, Denmark.

Here is how we see the timeline.Compare the different AutoPi Dongle editions, so you can choose the right one for your needs.Always upgradeableThe WiFi Only and DIY editions can always be upgraded later on with any supported 4G/LTE modem, if needed.This is the Perks availableWe have arranged for a trusted and well-known company to ship the AutoPi to you. This will help you get your AutoPi faster, and allows us to offer EU and USA friendly shipping.We are proud to offer worldwide shipping. Whether you are in the USA, South America or India, you can purchase an AutoPi without worrying about expensive shipping costs!The AutoPi project has been a long journey, ranging a couple of years back. Our vision for the project has been changed somewhat from the beginning. We have been through many revisions of our prototype and this has brought us to where we are now. Our initial concept was built on the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, but when the Zero became available we decided to incorporate it instead.We are a team of dedicated and hardworking friends. We are engineers, creators, innovators, thinkers, makers, software developers and much more.We are located in Aalborg, Denmark.

story:
Our Story: Give A Bike - Change A Life

Los Angeles is one of the many cities in the world that faces a large amount of individuals that experience homelessness. To help break the cycle of homelessness, The Skid Row Housing Trust (SRHT) provides permanent supportive housing so that people who have experienced homelessness and prolonged extreme poverty can lead safe and stable lives in wellness.

Imagine the freedom of hopping on a bike, riding down the street, and getting where you need to go. That’s just the feeling we want to share with the residents of the SRHT buildings, as they transition from the challenges of living on the streets to making positive strides towards their new way of living. We want to help in a significant way and we need your help! Help us build “The Trust Bike.”

Rotelli Cyclery (RC) is a small independent bike shop located in Downtown Los Angeles with a big idea. RC occasionally donates a bike to fundraisers, but this time RC wants to donate over 200 bikes to the SRHT residents. But we need your help! Our goal is to be able to donate these 200 bikes to create a bike-sharing program within 26 of the SRHT residential buildings. We truly feel that we can change many lives in a positive just by simply giving them bikes. If you’re someone that loves riding bikes and/or helping people in need, we think you’re really going to love getting our Trust Bike idea off the ground with us.

The Trust Bike:

The Trust Bike is a single speed bike with a design inspired by one of Rob Rotello’s (Rotelli Cyclery owner) favorites frames from the 1980s. This functional commuter style bike requires little to no maintenance. We design this single gear ride, with brakes and upright handlebars, to be comfortable and versatile.  

 “Skid Row is part of our community. We are all together down here. We are all one in Downtown LA. This is our way of giving back. We do bikes. How can we help Skid Row? They can use bikes. They can get to job interviews. They can get to doctors appointments. They can get to their jobs day in and day out.  It gives people mobility, freedom, hope and opportunity. It is a small way for us to help.” 
- Rob Rotello

How will it work?

This goal is a big undertaking for any company, especially a new small business. Your donation in any amount will help RC get 'Give a Bike - Change a Life' off and rolling.

After this campaign is launched RC will be able to continue the program without future funding. Once all 26 buildings have bicycles, we will then give the equivalent in cash donations.

For every bike bought at Rotelli Cyclery, we will donate a Trust Bike to the SRHT. In this first phase, the goal is to sell and give away 200 bikes. From there, we will continue to support the bike share program by providing maintenance classes to a select few of the SRHT residents that’ll help keep the bikes in good condition. 

How can you help?

  • Donate in a small amount and we will send you a token of our appreciation.
  • Donate a bike and you’ll instantly help a formerly homeless SRHT resident have the ability to transport to job interviews, exercise, and other endless opportunities.
  • Donate in a large amount and you have the option of receiving a Trust Bike or the option of receiving credit towards creating a custom built bike at Rotelli Cyclery for yourself.
Once we reach our goal it will place us in a position to continue the program without future funding. We know that you can help get us get to our goal of 200 bikes and making this dream a reality. If you're unable to donate, please spread the word to your circle of friends. Thank you so much! We really appreciate your time :)

About Rotelli Cyclery:

Rotelli Cyclery is a custom bicycle shop located in the Downtown L.A. Arts District, specializing in repurposing quality vintage steel frames to build unique rides. We believe your bicycle should reflect your riding needs as well as your personal style.

While Rotelli Cyclery establishes our small business near Skid Row, we know that being part of the downtown business community is essential. And being just steps from Skid Row they have learned that the work of the nonprofit Skid Row Housing Trust (SRHT) has become a vital component to that addresses the homelessness issues in Los Angeles. As partners with the SRHT, Rotelli Cyclery has donated bikes for fundraisers and been part of this growing company’s small business network. 

About the Skid Row Housing Trust:

The Skid Row Housing Trust provides permanent supportive housing so that people who have experienced homelessness, prolonged extreme poverty, poor health, disabilities, mental illness and/or addiction can lead safe, stable lives in wellness.

“Having bikes available at our buildings for residents to freely use will give them new access to the city,” says Mike Alvidrez, the CEO of SRHT. "We want to break down any barriers that hold our residents back, and the cost and difficulty of transportation around Los Angeles is one of those barriers - especially for those who have limited incomes and who must count every penny. We are thrilled that Rotelli Cyclery is partnering with the Trust to provide this new tool to our community.”
- Mike Alvidrez, the CEO of SRHT
“The bikes would help our residents tremendously. Exercise is a crucial part of mental health. Bikes provide physical activity. The physical activity will contribute to their success in the mental health services.”
- Dr. Jose Antonio Aguilar Director of Resident Programs

story:
The concept of Elos started in 2006, when a group of friends came together to teach each other how to skateboard and to share the joy of cruising. After countless iterations and road tests, our passion has grown up with us and became a unique part of our daily urban transportation. We want to share our passion with you.  

Now everyday commuters, students, families and city dwellers can "breeze" through town and go places in a fun new way on their stylish skateboard.

Inspired by race cars and adapted from principles of leverage, Elos is the only design which can provide stability even in high speed AND can handle sharp turns easily.

Elos is a one of the kind skateboard. The patent-pending deck design provides a solid and stable platform to learn on. With a couple of quick tips, most people could learn how to ride in 5 min. Most kids don’t even need tips to start.

Designed for quick stop and go. Whether you are waiting for the red light or grabbing that quick pizza, Elos provides a quick and easy solution.

Love your skateboard? We do too. Your Elos will come with a unique QR code for one click customer support and to help connect your skateboard back if it's lost.

The design of Elos is inspired by the same principles that goes into race car design. The super wide deck works like a large steering wheel which gives you control into every angle of your turn. The leverage effect makes parts work seamlessly for tight turns and to stay stable while cruising in high speed. Who said one has to compromise performance with size?

Inspired by racecar design: Low center of gravity means stability and legendary controlling.

Elos is designed with quality to last a long time. Most skateboards are often damaged at the nose and tail. With solid metal protection at the nose and the tail, Elos will last much longer compared to traditional skateboards.

Trucks are protecting Elos deck from head to toe.

Regular grip tape (sandpaper) on skateboards will wear your shoes out, scratch up your cloth and can make your hands rough. We replaced the grip tape with a foot anchor to increase traction and to provide tactile feedback.

Foot anchors provide you with tactical feedback.

Elos was originally designed and created for loved ones. Thus we only use premium parts that we have trusted for years. The board is made of top-grade American hard maple that is processed in California. We hand assemble Elos and make sure each one is up to our standards before shipping.

 

 

Special thank you to our friends and families who support us with unconditionally love:

  • Filming actors: Brandon, Rachel, Lee, Paul, Max, Mateusz
  • Post-Kickstarter campaign member: Teff, Leo, Jerico
  • Previous team members: Heikki, Arvin, Varsha, Roy, Leon
  • Feature-of-the-day IG models: Lisa, Jeff, Derek, John, Annie, and Kevin
  • Mentor: Frank
  • Legal: Liz Nevis 
  • Gogo partner: Alex
  • MARKiT: Francois, Andrea, Gino, En
  • Growth Hack Lab 
  • Hacker Dojo
  • KPLUS - Shawn Chiao
  • Flux 3D printer - Shawn Lin
  • 林小批, 唐鈞翰, Norns Song, Neil Tan, Stanley Wu, Jorge
  • You - who love Elos

 

Thanks a ton ya'll for support. Let's go to next adventure!

 

Risks and challenges

We have put in tremendous efforts and with the help of friends, the Elos team delivered over 400 Elos Skateboards to our backers on Kickstarter in Dec 2016,  we have worked out pretty much all the kinks so the Spring batch will be even smoother.

P1. Manufacturing:
From supply-chain logistics, tooling, quality control, and assembly, expert knowledge is required to get it right. We have been building skateboards ourselves so we are familiar with the process. To ensure things go right, we have contact and finished the first round of sample ordering to check for quality issues. Right now we have at least one candidate for each component and we will keep contacting and testing for more sources so we do not have all eggs in the same basket.
Since we need to get components from suppliers, the more units we order, the strong the bargaining power we will have. Suppler usually gives priority to a bigger customers if there is a limitation to its capacity. To prevent this, we will be sourcing from multiple places.

Receiving and checking pilot run samples is different from receiving larger orders since there might be change of tooling and process. Currently we are making Elos in the low 10s. We will carefully ramp up production to ensure all Elos will come out with our standard. We already have most of the material half way through the production process for super early bird orders.

P2. Shipping:
Whenever a new product is shipped around the world, issues such as delays or damages on the road must be considered. However, we made sure that our estimated delivery time is realistic to give us enough buffer time in consideration of these factors. Last but not least, we will keep our backers updated on the status of their Elos Skateboards. We plan to release to limited countries and possibly open to more when we are confident.

story:
Falctron by EcoBikez is the first LUXURY eBike selling at under $1000!

But only for a limited time. Don't wait, be a part of the luxury eBike movement and contribute now. Be the first to ride by on alloy wheels, suspended on dual shocks, leaving a light trail from built in LED lights, all with a flick of a wrist. The Falctron already comes with plenty of luxury features, built right in to it's beautiful, sleek design.

The money you contribute will be used
to integrate innovation.

This means continually upgrading our products with built-in luxury features, paying attention to users' needs, and all the while maintaining an affordable price. The falctron has amazing features already, Built in LEDs, front and back shocks and disc breaks, to name a few. But we want to keep improving. For example, one of our perks will give you a cell phone holder. But we want to incoporate the cellphone holder into the Falctrons design. Functionality is important to us but we also understand user experience is a must.


Our stretch goals outline our plans to elevate the Falctron. But before you jump ahead, check out what makes the Falctron by EcoBikez already the best electric bike.


Front suspension

The Falctron supports preload adjustments and lockouts. There is a switch on the handle bar that will allow you to set the front suspension according to your weight and lock it in for a customized ride.

Back Air Shocks

An Air shock in the rear will ensure your body isnt feeling every bump, crack, or pothole on the streets. This gives the Falctron a truly unique position as it is the only eBike at this price with rear air shocks.

Air Pump

The Falctron comes with a complimentary pump for the air shock. This will ensure you maintain your flight, or well you know, a smooth ride.

6 Speed

Switch between 6 speeds for increased control. You don't have to always use electric motor, and when you don't, switching gears will help leverage your pedalling.

Alloy Wheels

The only ebike under $1000 with an Alumninum alloy rims. These rims will provide a durable ride, while maintaining a light weight.

Disc Breaks

Your safety is always important, and having both front and back wheels come with disc breaks is another assurance of just that. Disc breaks dont wear down like traditional breaks. This will give you a safer ride for greater mileage.

Removable Mudguards

Stay protected with front and back mud guards. Never again have to wash your clothes because of spray back from the tires. And the Falctron's mudguards are integrated into its style to maintain the sleek ebike look.

Removable Battery

Easily remove your battery to charge or swap out for another. It even has a lock to ensure security. The battery only takes about 5 hours to charge. And if you forget to unplug after the battery is full, it is protected from overcharging and reducing life span. However, we recommend never to keep it plugged in over 24 hours. As well, it works with both 110/220V.

Built-in Back Lights

Safety is important to us, and the Falctron comes with a built-in tail light. The light is designed to compliment the Falctrons body; it is not an accessory but instead, a standard.

Front LED Lights

A brilliant LED light will illuminate your ride and ensure people will see you coming. The light is powered by the battery and controlled by switches on the handle for ease of access.

LCD Display

Monitor your battery life, speed (in km or miles), current mode, and even total kilometers. That's right, the Falctron comes with an Odometer and trip. The LCD Display is backlit and is controlled with buttons on the handle bar.

Custom Max Speed

Easily set a custom max speed. This will ensure you dont accelerate past the legal speed limit in your city. After all, Falctron default max speed of 40kmh is pretty fast for an eBike.

Twist to Start

The most ergonomical and safe method to command the motor: twist the left handle bar to accelerate. But dont worry, Only when the key is in the battery, and the power switch is turned on, will the twist function work. You can even turn off the bike while your riding to save battery juice for when you really need it.

Kick-Stand

Even our kickstand is not your standard kickstand. An additional peice at the bottom gives an elegant look and provides a thicker base to ensure the bike is held up securely. You can also adjust the height of the kickstand.


Matte Black Crane Design

The Falctron gets its name from the synergy of a Falcon and an Electron. The electron because, well, electricity, but the Falcon symbolizes the beauty, elegance, and fierceness of the eBike. And if you squint one eye when looking at the Falctron, the frame does look like a Falcon, although technically a Crane Design.


FALCTRON: FOR ALL YOUR NEEDS!

Daily Commute

Recreational & Leisure


Adventurous Exploration


TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS

Body
Frame 6061 aluminum alloy, design based on human.
Stem Aluminum alloy
Fork Aluminum alloy suspension fork. Adjustable.
Handlebar Aluminum alloy
Saddle Sport Type
Pedal Aluminum alloy MTB style pedal with reflector
Kickstand Adjustable Aluminum Alloy Kickstand

Wheels
Tire 26”x2.125 MTB tyre
Rim Aluminum alloy
Brakes F/R Disk brake
Mudguard Polypropylene plastic

Mechanical
Rear derailleur Outer 6 speed Shimano
Brake lever Aluminum alloy with power off switch
Chain Rust resistant chain
Chain wheel 42T, aluminum alloy crank

Electrical
Motor Rear Brushless hub motor 48V 500W
Battery 48V 11.6Ah Samsung Li-ion battery
Charger AC 100V 240V 2amps smart charger Charging time: 4-5hours
Controller Intelligent brushless.
PAS 1:1 intelligent pedal assistant system.

Shipping
Package Dimensions 178x26x110cm (Handlebar off)
Weight 60 lbs


TIMELINE

MAY 2015 Campaign Launched

JUNE 2015 Campaign Ends

JULY 2015 Falctron & Perks Manufactured and Shipped

AUGUST 2015 Falctron & Perks Delivered


PERKS

Extra Battery - 48v 11.6Ah

$180.00

Choose this perk to receive a second Samsung Battery. This will enable you to easily pop in a second battery when you run out of juice on the first battery. Keep one at work and one at home and ensure you are never out of juice on your daily commute.

Phone Holder

$35.00

We are currently trying to include a built-in phone holder with the Falctron. By contributing to this perk, you not only get an iOttie Easy One Touch Bike Mount phone holder, but also gives us the opportunity to develop a built in solution for the Falctron that will allow a phone holder to sit above the LCD Display. We are always about user experience and functionality. We want to ensure the handle bar is not cluttered.

Hornit 140db Horn

$40.00

Safety is always a priority, and when your riding, its important to be heard. The Hornit will ensure your presence is made aware of, just like the horn on a car. This perk will give you the Hornit, which you can easily attach towards the center of the handle bar. The included switch to sound off the horn can be attached closer to your left or right hand for ease of pressing. However, by contributing to this perk, you give us the opportuntiy to develop a solution to include the Hornit on the bottom front end of the frame of the bike. Of course the switch will remain on the handle bar so you can easily press the horn quickly as you will need.


THE TEAM

We are a team of eBike enthusiasts, entrepreneurs, and designers. We work to bring you a complete eBike. The ability to purchase an eBike that is sleek, elegant, useful, and easy to use.

Prem Rajah
Founder

Prem is a bike enthusiast from Toronto Canada. He has put together the most feature rich yet affordable electric bike based on various international suppliers. All the parts of the Falctron are readily available which means the bike will be ready for delivery. You can contribute without risk and expect to be cruising by August 2015.
Mithunan Ravendren
Marketing Manager

Mithunan is a young web designer and all round marketing guru. With over 5 years of experience in marketing, he has worked on various projects, always striving for the best. Being introduced to ebikes, he knew this was a game changer and had to get involved.

As well, it works with both 110/220V.




Built-in Back LightsSafety is important to us, and the Falctron comes with a built-in tail light. The light is designed to compliment the Falctrons body; it is not an accessory but instead, a standard. 




Front LED LightsA brilliant LED light will illuminate your ride and ensure people will see you coming. The light is powered by the battery and controlled by switches on the handle for ease of access.




LCD DisplayMonitor your battery life, speed (in km or miles), current mode, and even total kilometers. That's right, the Falctron comes with an Odometer and trip. The LCD Display is backlit and is controlled with buttons on the handle bar. 






Custom Max SpeedEasily set a custom max speed. This will ensure you dont accelerate past the legal speed limit in your city. After all, Falctron default max speed of 40kmh is pretty fast for an eBike.




Twist to StartThe most ergonomical and safe method to command the motor: twist the left handle bar to accelerate. But dont worry, Only when the key is in the battery, and the power switch is turned on, will the twist function work. You can even turn off the bike while your riding to save battery juice for when you really need it. 






Kick-Stand Even our kickstand is not your standard kickstand. An additional peice at the bottom gives an elegant look and provides a thicker base to ensure the bike is held up securely. You can also adjust the height of the kickstand.








Matte Black Crane Design The Falctron gets its name from the synergy of a Falcon and an Electron. The electron because, well, electricity, but the Falcon symbolizes the beauty, elegance, and fierceness of the eBike. And if you squint one eye when looking at the Falctron, the frame does look like a Falcon, although technically a Crane Design.

MOAR FAT TIRE EBIKE

The World's Most Powerful, Full-Suspension Folding Frame Electric Bicycle designed for on or off-road.

 

 

An all-in-one solution for the weekend warrior, the daily commuter and/or the eBike enthusiast:

  • POWER - 30% more torque, power and efficiency than the competition.
  • SAFETY - Waterproof, disc brakes, headlights, turn signals & brake lights.
  • DESIGN - Full suspension, folding frame, fat tires, gears & aircraft aluminum.

Folding frame for compact, easy transport and storage.

 

Carefully engineered as a solution to the very cheap and very expensive eBikes that are currently on the market:

  • BARE BONES - Most cheap eBikes are made with low quality components, requiring immediate upgrades with expensive after-market accessories.
  • EXPENSIVE - Most expensive eBikes are loaded with pricey components that the average consumer doesn't need or won't notice in day to day life.

MOAR created (3) eBike models with carefully selected premium components to fit common uses with no unneeded extras and no upgrades required.

A Powerful, Safe & Intelligently Designed Electric Bicycle.

 

 

The full-suspension, fat-tire eBike that offers more power, range, practicality & safety:

 

 

 

Our unique features and approachable price point come together to offer one thing; the ultimate every-day eBike.

                                                    Click Here for Media Kit

 

MOAR EBIKE IS BEYOND POWERFUL.

MOAR is engineered with 30% more power and range than the competition, adding high torque for effortless sprints uphill. 

 

 

 

The Ultimate MOAR Bike

MOAR has partnered with 8Fun, one of the world’s top eBike motor manufacturers, to bring you a revolution in eBike power – the Rapt II

 

Our ultimate model features a completely new, never-before offered 1000W mid-drive motor. This motor boasts higher efficiency than our previous 750W offering, at over 80%. It is quieter, at <55DB, and .3kg lighter. It boasts cutting edge torque sensing, and is IP65 dust, splash, and rainproof.

 

Top Speed is normally limited to 20MPH to comply with legal regulations, but when you’re riding in unregulated areas such as off-road trails, you can unlock the full, 30MPH top speed with a few button presses on your LCD screen!

 

Get your Rapt II now!

 

 

MOAR is powered by either a 500w rear-hub or a 750w mid-drive motor.

Our motors are not just designed for 10-15 seconds of "peak power",  meaning you can ride all day at 750w without burning up the motor. We estimate peak power for the mid-drive motor would roughly be in the 1,000-1,200w range.

 

750W Mid-Drive Electric Bike Motor

Our silent 750w rated mid-drive motor drives the chain directly through its Shimano 9 speed gears, giving riders more precision control over their riding.

  • Available on the "Rapt" model for $1,999​

 

At 118ft-lb (160NM) of max torque, our 750w mid-drive motor can tow a SUV from a standstill and has more than enough power to conquer even the steepest hills.

 

 

500w Rear Hub Electric Bike Motor

Our silent 500w rated 8Fun rear hub geared motor easily tackles steep hills with 44ft-lb (60NM) of max torque and comes in either a 7 or 8 speed gear setup.

  • Available on the "Sun & Fun" model for $999 and "24/7" model for $1,199

 

Top speed is capped at 20 mph to comply with regulations; however, press a few buttons on the LCD screen to unlock max speeds of 28 mph (mid-drive motor) and 25 mph (rear-hub motor) for off-road riding only.

 

9 Mosfet Motor Controller

Most electric bikes use a 6 Mosfet, with MOAR eBike we've opted to use a minimum of 9 Mosfet (higher the better) in our motor controllers.

The motor controller and level of Mosfet ensure a smooth and responsive delivery of maximum electrical power to our 500w and 700w motors. This ensures you get the maximum torque and power that these 8FUN premium rated motors can handle and exactly at the moment you want it.

 

 

All electronics are powered by one 48V battery with either 10, 13 or 17AH.

All batteries on MOAR Electric Bikes are made using premium 48V Samsung Li-Ion batteries (same as Tesla uses) which provides faster and more efficient power delivery with 30% more range than the standard 36V cells used by other eBikes.

 

 

48V Electric Bike Battery Range

Estimated range for a 176lb (80kg) rider cruising on flat ground at 15 mph on a MOAR eBike for each battery option:

  • 10AH = 30 miles electric only, 50 miles level one pedal assist.
  • 13AH = 40 miles electric only, 65 miles level one pedal assist.
  • 17AH = 50 miles electric only, 85 miles level one pedal assist.

 

One Concealed, Removable Battery

Not only does the rear rack add functionality, it conceals the removable battery.

The 48V battery is housed in an IP65 splash-proof aluminum casing allowing it to easily slide in/out to charge away from your MOAR eBike.

With only one battery powering everything from the motor to electronics packages, there's no forgetting to charge your headlights and no extra wires or mounts.

 

 

Each MOAR eBike comes complete with 7, 8, or 9 speed gears made by Shimano.

Our premium "Rapt" model ebike with the 750w mid-drive comes with the 9 speed Shimano gear system, the "24/7" 500w rear-hub motor model comes with 8 speeds, and the "Sun & Fun" is equipped with a 7 speed.

With our premium gear systems you'll get more control over your ride while increasing efficiency. 

 

 

Most ebikes use "speed sensors" to calibrate PAS as you pedal, we opted to use "torque sensors" for more precise control.

With a Pedal Assistance System you set a power level for and the electric bike motors will provide assistance in proportion to your pedaling, assisting you to maintain speed.

With our Pedal Assistance System you can tailor trim your riding style with the tap of a button on the control panel located on your handle bars.

 

Pedal Assistance Handlebar LCD Screen

MOAR ebike has 5 levels of assistance within the PAS, ranging from economy mode to sporty mode which is controlled by the conveneient LCD control panel.

The Pedal Assist System will allow you to:

  • Exercise - Get a workout by setting PAS to off or low assistance like on a traditional bike.
  • Range - Easily double your distance covered by using PAS and eliminate range anxiety.
  • Terrain - Tackle tough hills or mountains by increasing the PAS to full or all-electric power.

 

Torque Sensor vs. Speed Sensor

A premium electric bike uses a torque sensor instead of a speed sensor for PAS allowing it to measure how hard you are pushing on the pedals. 

The torque sensors measures the pressure on the crank to deliver the precise amount of assistance to you when you need it. For example, if you are riding on a trail and need to climb a steep slope, the MOAR PAS knows you are pedaling harder and provides more power based on your selection of our 5 levels of PAS.

The torque sensor is available on the "Rapt" and "24/7" models while a cadence sensor is used on the "Sun & Fun" model.

 

SAFETY FIRST WITH MOAR EBIKE.

Riding is fun but safety is paramount, so we equipped MOAR with premium electronics and a few extras to keep the fun going.

 

MOAR motors have the power to go fast so we knew we had to provide the power to stop you even faster and opted for the stopping power of Tektro disc brakes.

MOAR electric bikes come equipped with either hydraulic assisted (premium) or mechanical 160mm rotor disc brakes (standard) made by Tektro USA that allow you to stop on a dime, all while triggering the automatic motor cutoff and rear brake light.

Tektro hydraulic assisted disk brakes are available on the "Rapt" and "24/7" models while the mechanical are standard on the "Sun & Fun" model.

 

 

One battery to power them all: motor, lights, horn & USB port.

Unlike most eBikes with aftermarket electronics, all MOAR safety components are centralized to the rear rack battery that powers the motor, so you'll never be put at a risk by running out of battery on a safety component while riding.

 

1,000 Lumen Projection Headlights

MOAR's dual LED projection headlights were designed to be bright while not blinding oncoming traffic at night.

These powerful Cree T6 dual LED projection headlights each shine a path of light of 1,000 lumens for up to 30 feet in front of you and each is rated at 30,000 hours of service life.

With the Angel Eye glow ring (like on newer Audi's or BMW's) you'll get a soft glow on the road directly in front of you while also illuminating the road ahead.

 

Brake Lights, Turn Signals & Horn

We've added extra safety features even though they're not required by law.

The brakes light glows automatically whenever the disc brakes are applied, with the turn signals and horn activated via handlebar.​

AN INTELLIGENTLY DESIGNED EBIKE.

MOAR is created with you in mind, designing it to be practical, compact, versatile, comfortable, all-terrain & easy on the eyes.

 

 

Easily fold the MOAR eBike to half its size for storage and transport with one flip of the safety catch and a pull a latch.

For added equipment safety, MOAR is the only electric bike on the market with a right-handed fold, allowing the front wheel to form a protective cage around the rear derailleur during transport.

Look closely at the photo above with MOAR in the car trunk and you'll note the folding pedals that allow even easier transport. To further compact MOAR, simply pull on the quick release to easily remove the front wheel.

 

MOAR is the only folding, full suspension, fat-tire eBike on the market. 

ALL MOAR ebikes are equipped with both REAR and front suspensions, which are only available on super premium bikes and for good reason:  you have to design and build your own suspension.

Full suspension not only complements the fat tire by improving the ride and handling, we consider it a must for a bike that will routinely travel around 20mph because of:

  • Body & Bike Fatigue - Full suspension reduces the wear and tear on your body and the bike itself by softening jolts and reducing fatigue on your hands, legs, joints and rear, even if you bike standing up.

  • Ride Comfort - It's fairly obvious but full suspension makes for a more enjoyable ride at higher speeds. Don't believe us? Take a spin on one without full-suspension and you'll see what we mean.

  • Ride Handling - Rear suspension helps tremendously with traction on the ground and lets you keep control of your bike at higher speed.

 

Our own patented designed rack is one of the features that turns MOAR into a pragmatic daily commuter and errand runner.

A unique sturdy rack that is part of the bike frame, independent from the rear suspension and is welded to the frame as part of the design language of the bike, creating a strong statement and extending the exciting lines of the frame.

It also conveniently allows you to carry saddle bags for computers, briefcase, groceries and other things. Handily, the rear rack houses and hides our removable lithium battery.

 

All MOAR frames are heat treated 6061 aircraft grade aluminum alloy, making them rugged, lightweight and rust free.

By design, the standover height is 30.5 inches, the seat height is engineered to be 33" high at it’s lowest setting and it’s adjustable, so it fits riders from 5’2" to 6’4" with the aluminum frame rated for a 220lb rider.


 

Moar bikes weigh around 60lb without the battery. Each battery adds:

  • 10AH battery: 9 lb
  • 13AH battery: 9.5lb
  • 17AH battery: 11 lb

 

The overall dimensions are as follows:

Unfolded:

  • End to end: 75in
  • Wheelbase (hub to hub) : 47in
  • Handle bar Height: 42.5in
  • Handle bar width: 25in
  • Handle bar to seat post: 24in
  • Lowest seat height: 35in

Folded:

  • Height (front wheel on): 38in
  • Length: 46in
  • Width (front wheel on): 20in
  • Width (front wheel off): 16in

 

An ebike traditionally has a lot of wires, so where are MOAR's?

MOAR designed the electrical systems so all wires are housed internally within the frame for safety, waterproofing and overall appeal.

Further, exposed electrical wires are wrapped in a protective sheath for added protection.

 

All MOAR bikes are equipped w backlit-LCD control panels convienently located on the handle bar.


The display provides the following information: battery level indicator, power consumption meter, speedometer, odometer and allows for PAS (Pedal Assistance System) control.

 

As a bonus, you'll never have a low smartphone battery...

We've added a USB Port to keep you charged throughout your ride.
