story:
ELWING BOARDS

Elwing is the world's most compact electric skateboard. Every detail has been designed based on the idea that commuting should be the fun and easy part of the day. The result is an extremely lightweight electric skateboard that holds a incredible amount of power.

 

Elwing's performance is amazing : 18mph of top speed and 7 miles of range for only 9,9lbs. It takes only 45 minutes to charge with the fast charger. The in-wheel motor provides phenomenal gliding sensations and allows you to keep riding without using the motor.

 

 

Elwing packs a powerful motor within a small form factor so it's versatile enough for any situation while being light enough to hold with one finger.

 

 

FEATURED IN

 

JOIN ELWING BOARDS TESTS FEEDBACK FACEBOOK GROUP


PERFORMANCE

TECHNOLOGY

 

BEAT THE TRAFFIC

 

GLIDE TO WORK

CARRY IT EVERYWHERE

 

NEVER PUSH WHEN GOING UPHILL

 

CONTROL YOUR SPEED WHEN GOING DOWNHILL

 

EASY TO LEARN

 

LIMITED EDITION

Art and board sports have always been very related. It's beautiful to see someone riding with style, and so should the product be. We've had this limited edition designed by Mecca Collective and laser engraved by  Le Shape.

 

TIMELINE

 

FEATURES

 

THE PROJECT

The Elwing Board is the result of 2 years of prototyping, testing, failing and learning. We met in 2014 in Shanghai, where we spent over 2 hours everyday commuting to work.

We believe commuting should be the fun and easy part of the day.

As board sports addicts, electric skateboards seemed to be the perfect solution to our commuting solution. But all we found on the market were electric longboards. They are super fun but too heavy and expensive.

We built a compact electric skateboard that holds an incredible amount of power. Since then we wake up everyday knowing that we’ll have our daily dose of fun.

 

THE TEAM

Quentin - Co-founder, sales and marketing.

He is addicted to freeski, snowboard, windsurf and downhill skateboarding. Quentin has worked in the sports retail and marketing for 4 years.

Gael - Co-founder, mechanical engineer.

An avid windsurfer, skateboarder, snowboarder. A passionate mechanical engineer who spends his time creating machines. 

Pierre - Product designer

Driven by his passion for surfing, skateboarding and snowboarding, Pierre is motivated by the desire of creating things since the 90’s. He studied at Ecole de Design de Nantes Atlantique in Shanghai.

Osborn - Mechanical engineer

Osborn is a talented mechanical engineer. Passionate about modeling and  creating  complex products, he has 6 years experience in the field. No doubt his next passion will be  linked with board sports. 

Eduardo - Electrical engineer

Obsessive Traveler, rideables nerd and coffee drinker. Eduardo is a Power Electronics, Telecom and Industrial Automatic Engineer. He founded TokyLab to focus on what he loves. He joined Elwing Boards to bring our software and electronics to the next level.

 

THEY SUPPORT US

 

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Designing a product that contains mechanical, electrical and electronic constraints is not easy. We understand that delays happen and things may take a little longer than expected.

We're always planning ahead to bypass potential delays.  For an on-time delivery, we're working to solve potential production problems now. Things like:

  • Finishing the design of a new remote control with a larger slider to improve accuracy while braking and speeding up. We will then have to adapt the software and solve the remaining small bugs to reach the perfect settings.
  • It takes about 2 months to pass FCC/CE certifications. It could take 1 more month if we fail some tests in the first try. We've started the conversation early and hope to have the certification by the end of this campaign.

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP US

Please share this page and talk to your friends about Elwing! You can use the social share links at the top of the page to do that. We're trying to build a community of awesome people who'll help us get off the ground and spread the word that commuting will never be the same!

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

What about replacement wheels?

The Elwing Board's durability has been tested and the wheels do not get damaged in a normal usage. All wheels will be available as spare parts on our website. The non-motorized wheels can be changed with any other standard 83mm wheels on the market. The motorized wheel will be available on our website as a spare parts. For mechanical safety and durability reasons, the motorized wheel is molded with the rotor. If you ever need to change the motorized wheel, you will be able to buy a new rotor with it.
 

Is the Elwing Board waterproof?

The motor is fully waterproof. The whole board is splash-proof but not waterproof. Just like any skateboard, Elwing's bearings could also be damaged by water. We recommend you use your Elwing Board just like you'd use any regular skateboard.
 

How much will it cost to replace batteries?

The battery comes included with the board. Buying a spare battery will cost around $80.
 

Where can I get replacement parts?

All replacement parts will be available on our online shop. All maintenance parts will be available through our customer service.
 

What is the rider weight limit?

We tested the hill limits (uphill climbing and downhill braking) and range using a 185 pound rider. Heavier riders will see a decrease in speed going uphill, but performance on flat ground won't change.
 

What is the warranty?

All board rewards will come with a one-year warranty on manufacturing defects from the day you receive it.
 

What is the final retail price?

The final MSRP is currently planned for $749, but depends on a lot of factors like distribution, retail options and final manufacturing costs and may go up.The difference in price between a reward board via Indiegogo and a retail model later will be significant.

Can I swap for my own deck? Can I just get a kit?

No. The deck is modified to fit exactly with the battery box and to have the exact right flex needed. Wheel wells have been designed to match with the wheels size to avoid any wheel bite, even during carving.
 

Can I push like a normal skateboard?

Yes you can. The in-wheel motor generates almost no drag so it just feels like riding a regular skateboard (unlike most of other electric skateboards that have a drive belt which produces a lot of drag).
 

Can I get more battery range?

For now we do not offer extended battery range. However if you kick-push twice when every time you start riding, you can save up to 40% of the energy the motor will consume.
 

Where can I try one out?

We have a couple of demo boards in San Francisco and in Shanghai. Please send us a direct message if you want to demo!
 
We have 2 prototypes available for a demo in Paris. Please contact the ambassadors on www.demooz.com.

story:
If you missed out on our crowdfunding campaign - see our new online store at loopmount.com

 

 

Introducing Loop

Loop is a minimal phone mount that sits discreetly on your bike's handlebars and is ready to use in seconds. It's totally different from anything else on the market and is perfect to help any cyclist get from A to B quickly and easily .  

 

The Problem 

We love to explore on our bikes and using a phone makes it quicker and easier than ever. But constantly checking directions in traffic is hassle and can be dangerous.  

 

We've always loved the idea of a phone holder, but hated the way they look and work. We created Loop out of frustration with the existing solutions on the market - they're ugly, clunky to use or need accessories or phone cases just to work.   

The Solution

We created Loop from the ground up to be right for cycling. That means holding any size phone securely without ruining the look of your bike. We knew it needed to be quick and easy to use and that it shouldn't need any accessories to work.     We wanted to create something robust and beautifully engineered so started with an all-metal construction.  

 

We've made Loop work with all major phones (including an iPhone 11 Pro Max) and all handlebars sizes (22.2mm to 31.8mm - that's 7/8" to 1 1/4"). It will fit a lot of stems as well if they are close to round. Most importantly it's designed to look and feel like it's part of your bike.

It's completely different from anything on the market - we've protected the design with a worldwide patent pending and extra protection in China (中国专利审查中) with Jiaquan IP.

So what makes Loop different from everything else on the market?

1. Engineered to hold your phone securely

Loop has been engineered to be secure enough on the bumpiest roads. We've designed it for strength from the start - incorporating industrial springs which clamp your phone in place. 

 

Despite its strength - we wouldn't recommend it for off-road or extreme riding.

 

2. Quick and easy to use 

We wanted to make using Loop as quick and easy as jumping on your bike. So the interaction takes seconds - and requires absolutely no accessories. 

 

3. Looks and feels like part of your bike

Loop is inspired by your handlebars - low profile and discreet. It's designed to look and feel like it's part of your bike, whatever type of cyclist you are.  

    

4. Built to last

Loop made from CNC technology and it's all-metal construction is built to last.  

 

5. Made for every bike & every phone

Loop is designed to fit small to large phones, every type of bike, and all major sizes of handlebars. 

     

How we got here

 Sketching & Ideation

 

CAD & Engineering 

 

Development & Prototyping

Testing 

 

Next Steps

Loop mount is fully designed, engineered and prototyped. We are looking for your support through kickstarter to help us pay for tooling, complete final testing and certification and produce the first batch of products.   

 

Specs 

Loop comes in Black and Silver.  

 

Whats in the box

  • 1 x Loop Mount
  • Small shim 
  • Medium shim 
  • Large shim
  • Allen Key

 

Phone Sizes

Loop opens up to 80mm / 3.15" - that is enough for large smart phone in a case. 

 

Handlebar Sizes 

Loop is designed to work on all major handlebar sizes (22.2mm to 31.8mm - that's 7/8" to 1 1/4"). It can also be mounted on your stem if it's tubular (or approximately circular).  

 

Collaborators

We're working with some great collaborators to help bring you this project...

 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

 

More than $30,000,000 has been raised with Sprint's support

story:
Guilty of texting while driving?  You're not alone!
Despite knowing the dangers, most drivers admit that they text when behind the wheel. The prevalence of incidents caused by distracted drivers continues to increase. There are phones and apps that allow users to verbally write text messages but these technologies are full of glitches and lack the features required to be utilized effectively; as a result, the number of people texting while they drive still remains high.




Here are some quick stats:
  • Each day in the US, more than 9 people are killed and 1,060 people are injured in accidents that involve a distracted driver. 
  • Texting while driving is about 6 times more likely to cause an accident than driving intoxicated. (National Hwy Transportation Safety Admin) 
  • Texting while driving slows your brake reaction speed by 18%. (Human Factors & Ergonomics Society) 
  • Driver distraction is a factor in about 4 million motor vehicle crashes in North America each year. 
  • Drivers who are texting while driving are 23 times more likely to be involved in a crash or near crash event compared with non-distracted drivers. (Virginia Tech Transportation Institute, 2010). 
  • 84% of distracted driving related fatalities in the US were tied to the general classification of carelessness or inattentiveness (National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, 2009) 
  • 80% of collisions and 65% of near crashes have some form of driver inattention as contributing factors (National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, 2010) 
  • International research shows that 20% to 30% of all collisions involve driver distraction (Alberta Transportation, 2011)

It is widely known that use of cell-phones and other electronics while driving is associated with higher rates of dangerous or fatal car crashes. In the United States, 10 states have banned the use of handheld cell phones while driving; several other states have placed a similar ban on novice drivers only. In Canada, all 10 provinces have some form of cell phone/distracted driving laws in place that include fines and licence demerit points. Despite the laws that have been put in place or the devastating statistics, many people continue to put the safety of themselves and others at risk. Rather than wait for each person to be affected personally by injury or tragedy, a solution that could change this behaviour is to provide a convenient and reliable alternative to using a handheld device while driving.

Introducing Vennoott  - the app that will call, text and post on social media sites for you so you can keep your hands free and eyes focussed on the road. There are other apps out there that provide speech-to-text functionality but reviews show that there are many flaws including the app not picking up someone's voice or accent correctly, poor sound quality, screen freezes, and lack of maintenance. Vennoott will provide a solution to all of those things. Users will be able to receive and send texts while driving, cooking, and cleaning without a single touch! Features include:


  • Speech-to-text 
  • Text-to-audio (be able to hear the texts you receive so you don't need to pick up your phone) 
  • Built-in, multi-language (and multi-accent) speech recognizer 
  • Voice-to-call (handsfree dialing) 
  • Call-to-Audio (app states the caller's name and number and state whether you want to answer or ignore) 
  • Speech-to-email 
  • Email-to-Audio (app reads new emails for you) 
  • Audio Google Search (state what you want to search for and the app will respond with search results) 
  • Speech-to-post (posts your statement onto Facebook, Twitter, Skype, etc.)



In addition, our vision is an app that does not require a data or wifi connection but the ability to achieve this depends partly on the amount of support we receive.  Support this game-changing app today and be part of the solution!  The app is like your very own personal assistant, but for a much cheaper price! Visit www.vennoott.com to learn more.


What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to greatly reduce the number of distracted drivers on the road.  In order to achieve this, we must utilize high-end technicians and some of the world's best software engineers to develop and maintain the app.  We also require funds to advertise the app when it is launched.

If we do not have enough funds to develop the app, donations received through indiegogo will be refunded by December 1, 2014.

A free trial of Vennoott will be available to anyone; it will then cost $1.99/month for continued use.  We are offering 1 month - 7 year subscriptions for free for those who donate to our campaign.  In addition, supporters will receive one of the following gifts from our team:

Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with Microphone

Thinking Vennott isn't for you since you don't have bluetooth in your car?  This wireless bluetooth speaker is for you!  It is easily portable for use in your car, kitchen, etc.




T-Shirt



Ball-Point Pen


Long Sleeve Shirt

Key Ring


USB Memory Stick (8GB)







The Impact

We wholeheartedly believe that this app will save lives and make a positive difference in our world that has gone technology-crazy! Your donation will contribute to a very worthwhile cause.  If it prevents even one incident, we consider it a success.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    We appreciate donations of any size but if you are unable to give, please tell your family and friends about Vennoot by directing them to this campaign or sending them to our website directly: www.vennoott.com. Thank you!
story_txt:
Guilty of texting while driving?  You're not alone!
Despite knowing the dangers, most drivers admit that they text when behind the wheel. The prevalence of incidents caused by distracted drivers continues to increase. There are phones and apps that allow users to verbally write text messages but these technologies are full of glitches and lack the features required to be utilized effectively; as a result, the number of people texting while they drive still remains high. 




Here are some quick stats:

Each day in the US, more than 9 people are killed and 1,060 people are injured in accidents that involve a distracted driver. 
Texting while driving is about 6 times more likely to cause an accident than driving intoxicated. (National Hwy Transportation Safety Admin) 
Texting while driving slows your brake reaction speed by 18%. (Human Factors & Ergonomics Society) 

Driver distraction is a factor in about 4 million motor vehicle crashes in North America each year. 
Drivers who are texting while driving are 23 times more likely to be involved in a crash or near crash event compared with non-distracted drivers. (Virginia Tech Transportation Institute, 2010). 

84% of distracted driving related fatalities in the US were tied to the general classification of carelessness or inattentiveness (National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, 2009) 

80% of collisions and 65% of near crashes have some form of driver inattention as contributing factors (National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, 2010) 
International research shows that 20% to 30% of all collisions involve driver distraction (Alberta Transportation, 2011) 


It is widely known that use of cell-phones and other electronics while driving is associated with higher rates of dangerous or fatal car crashes. In the United States, 10 states have banned the use of handheld cell phones while driving; several other states have placed a similar ban on novice drivers only. In Canada, all 10 provinces have some form of cell phone/distracted driving laws in place that include fines and licence demerit points. Despite the laws that have been put in place or the devastating statistics, many people continue to put the safety of themselves and others at risk. Rather than wait for each person to be affected personally by injury or tragedy, a solution that could change this behaviour is to provide a convenient and reliable alternative to using a handheld device while driving. 

Introducing Vennoott  - the app that will call, text and post on social media sites for you so you can keep your hands free and eyes focussed on the road. There are other apps out there that provide speech-to-text functionality but reviews show that there are many flaws including the app not picking up someone's voice or accent correctly, poor sound quality, screen freezes, and lack of maintenance. Vennoott will provide a solution to all of those things. Users will be able to receive and send texts while driving, cooking, and cleaning without a single touch! Features include: 



Speech-to-text 
Text-to-audio (be able to hear the texts you receive so you don't need to pick up your phone) 
Built-in, multi-language (and multi-accent) speech recognizer 
Voice-to-call (handsfree dialing) 
Call-to-Audio (app states the caller's name and number and state whether you want to answer or ignore) 
Speech-to-email 
Email-to-Audio (app reads new emails for you) 
Audio Google Search (state what you want to search for and the app will respond with search results) 
Speech-to-post (posts your statement onto Facebook, Twitter, Skype, etc.) 







In addition, our vision is an app that does not require a data or wifi connection but the ability to achieve this depends partly on the amount of support we receive.  Support this game-changing app today and be part of the solution!  The app is like your very own personal assistant, but for a much cheaper price! Visit www.vennoott.com to learn more.


What We Need & What You Get
 Our goal is to greatly reduce the number of distracted drivers on the road.  In order to achieve this, we must utilize high-end technicians and some of the world's best software engineers to develop and maintain the app.  We also require funds to advertise the app when it is launched.
If we do not have enough funds to develop the app, donations received through indiegogo will be refunded by December 1, 2014.
A free trial of Vennoott will be available to anyone; it will then cost $1.99/month for continued use.  We are offering 1 month - 7 year subscriptions for free for those who donate to our campaign.  In addition, supporters will receive one of the following gifts from our team:
Wireless Bluetooth Speaker with Microphone
Thinking Vennott isn't for you since you don't have bluetooth in your car?  This wireless bluetooth speaker is for you!  It is easily portable for use in your car, kitchen, etc.








T-Shirt


Ball-Point Pen


Long Sleeve Shirt
Key Ring

USB Memory Stick (8GB)








The Impact
 We wholeheartedly believe that this app will save lives and make a positive difference in our world that has gone technology-crazy! Your donation will contribute to a very worthwhile cause.  If it prevents even one incident, we consider it a success.
  Other Ways You Can Help We appreciate donations of any size but if you are unable to give, please tell your family and friends about Vennoot by directing them to this campaign or sending them to our website directly: www.vennoott.com. Thank you!

story:
Graffiti Removal Services is a locally owned small business in Portland, Oregon. Our service helps private residences, business owners, schools and cities fight the never ending battle against graffiti in our communities using only the most environmentally friendly products and methods of removal.

Most of the removals that we do around the city require close access for one of our work trucks with a pressure washer and other equipment mounted inside to effectively remove the graffiti.  Recently we have been challenged by our access to local public parks, bike paths and pedestrian bridges and an increase in tagging in these areas.  Since our work trucks limit our access, we are looking to evolve and adapt our removal methods in order to re-beautify our neighborhoods. 

We are partnering with a locally owned bike manufacturer to pioneer a mode of transportation that will allow us access to remove hard to reach graffiti by developing an environmentally friendly 3 wheeled electric assisted cargo bike. With your help, we can clean up the bike trails, public parks and hard to reach locations that have been previously inaccessible for removal personnel and equipment.

The 3 Wheel Electric Bike will be a smaller, environmentally friendly, human powered version of our work trucks. The electric assist and customizable flat-bed design will give us the power and room that we need to carry all of the same products, tools and even a mini-pressure washer that we use for graffiti removal on a larger scale in our trucks.

Electric Motors

The bike will have an electric hub motor for the best in power and durability allowing for a maximum hauling capacity of up to 600lbs- enough to climb even the steepest hills. The electric hub motor eliminates the need for a transmission, cross axle and differential, resulting in weight savings and increased cargo capacity.

Front Wheel Drive

The front wheel drive pedal system features efficient power transfer with zero steering pull.  This system allows for high maneuverability and enables each wheel to have its own power source.

Steel Frame

The bike will be constructed with a hand-built tubular steel frame for the strength needed to move 600lbs of cargo for a long time while only weighing in at a standalone weight of 250lbs.

Brakes

Unlike bicycle brakes, the motorcycle rear brakes used on the 3 wheel bike will use large rotors and heavy-duty calipers engineered for increased safety and stopping power even when hauling heavy loads.

Cargo Box

We will be working with another locally owned company to fabricate a customized cargo box.  In order to make the cargo box as light as possible we plan to use reinforced welded aluminum with customized drawers, winged doors, an exhaust vent for the mini-pressure washer and all of the products and tools that will allow us to remove graffiti from any substrate.

Our goal is $14,500 which covers roughly 85% of our project’s estimated total $17,000 cost.

43% of total costs account for the custom construction of the electric bike. Back in March of 2014 we contacted a local Portland, Oregon bike manufacturer who has been doing business in Portland since 1997 and specializes in customizing electric assisted 3 wheeled bikes. 

30% of total projected costs go to cover the fabrication of our custom cargo box. It is designed specifically to hold all of our pressure washing equipment and environmentally friendly removal chemicals.

7% of our projected costs go to reward supplies for those receiving Perks.

5% goes to Indiegogo fees.

8% of our projected costs will be stocking the cargo box with a portable pressure washer, equipment and various products for graffiti removal. We are happy to pay for this out of pocket.

The last 7% of costs would be the finishing Graphic Vehicle Wrap and design. We will be covering costs for this as well as it is our logo that will be going on the bike.

If we are overfunded, our plan will be to cover the costs of the pressure washing equipment and the Graphic Vehicle Wrap.  Should we be overfunded beyond our costs, we will add additional stretch goals that will directly benefit our community by providing services free of charge around the City of Portland.


$1 or more - Our sincere thanks and your name listed as a backer on our website where we promote the bike and the community's efforts to make this happen.

$25 or more - Our thanks and your name listed on our website as a backer. We will also send you a copy of the one sheet Vanquisher Comic that we distribute at community cleanups.

$50 or more (plus $5 shipping) - Our thanks, your name listed as a backer on our website, a copy of the Vanquisher comic, and a carton of our 6 Graffiti SafeWipes, great for removing graffiti from smooth surfaces like plastic, metal, or glass.

$100 or more (plus $5 shipping) - Our thanks, your name listed as a backer on our website, a copy of the Vanquisher comic, and a carton of our 20 Graffiti SafeWipes, great for removing graffiti from smooth surfaces like plastic, metal, or glass.

$1000 or more - This is the big one. If you are an organizer or member of a community graffiti cleanup in the states of Oregon or Washington within a 300 mile radius of Portland, how would you like to have someone from Graffiti Removal Services bring the Graffiti Removal Bike down for a community clean up as early as Spring 2016. Let us know when your community cleanup is and we will put your event on the schedule. (Quantity may be limited by scheduling. Please contact us before you pledge.)

Reward Perks are ready to ship once funding is approved. The bike itself should take one month to manufacture. It could potentially be wrapped and ready to go by the end of September. We would expect to be using the bike to participate in Portland Community Clean Up events as early as October 2015.

Every year, Portland neighborhoods and district community leaders invite us to help assist with community and neighborhood cleanups where we provide training, product, supplies and support to our communities.

We believe the bike would be a great tool for these community cleanups, both as an environmentally sound way to show up and support our neighborhoods and as a rallying point for community organizers and citizens to take their neighborhoods back from the negative influences of graffiti and vandalism.


As with any project, there are potential delays. We have independent contractors fabricating both the 3 Wheel Electric Bike as well as the Custom Cargo Box casing unit for our pressure washer, tank and graffiti removal equipment. Either of these could run into production delays or go over budget, but we don't expect them to.

As far as backer reward fulfillment, we will make every effort to deliver any physical items promised as soon as possible. Any planned appearances or community service will be provided subject to scheduling and we will be in close communication to make sure that we meet or exceed your expectations.

Thank You!

story:
Introducing the Electric Works C60

Innovation. Performance. Durability. Value.

The C60 is the latest release from the Electric Works team, with over 15 years of experience in the micro-mobility and urban transportation industry we are very prepared to bring this game changing scooter to market!

Built to Perform

 The C60 is the perfect solution to the growing need for portable, powerful, practical and environmentally friendly travel.

Our strategy from the start was to eliminate the excessive cost barriers of high performance e-scooters by selling direct.  Operational costs are reduced heavily through economies of scale and innovative manufacturing methods which we then pass on to the customer!  

 

The C60 with 60v10ah LG battery starts at only

$995 

FREE USA Shipping and Cheap Global Transit!

Motor power : Electric Works Synwave - 60V 2400W dual hub

Power Management: Proprietary Electric Works controllers featuring TCS (traction control system in 2WD)

Battery: LG Standard 60v10ah or upgraded 60V 20Ah battery pack 

Brakes: Front and Rear Mechanical Disk 

Max speed : 68kmh (38mph)

Max Range: (20ah) 100km/62 miles (10ah) 50km/32 miles

Max load : 158kg/350lbs

Max Incline : 40 degrees

Weight : 27kg/59lbs 

Battery Weight : (20ah) 7kg/15.4lbs (10ah) - 4kg/9lbs

Suspension: Adjustable air shocks front and rear with damping control system

Front and Rear LED Lights 

Tires: Tubeless 11 inch multi terrain air tire 

Standard Display: Speedometer, Battery Level, Ride Mode (Eco, Cruise, Sport)

Warranty: Lifetime on chassis, 3 years LG battery pack module

Production has begun so shipping is quick!

The C60 is hands down the best value in last mile transportation, exceeding our competitors specs and at hundreds less!

 

The Electric Works C60 features a remarkable 2WD system which includes our own EW Synwave twin 1200 watt hub motors producing a remarkable 2400w of combined power.

An Industry First!

Our goal has always been safety, so one of our unique features in both Standard and Sport mode allow you the option of engaging our proprietary TCS (traction control system) which uses a number of live riding metrics including inclination and wheel slippage to adjust throttle response, front and rear motor modulation and acceleration! 
 

 With the handlebar mounted finger throttle acceleration is smooth and effortless.

The full color LCD throttle/computer module is easy and intuitive to use with ride modes and important data accessible on the fly.

In Eco Mode you are using only the rear 1200W motor for maximum efficiency and range. The red "DUAL" motor button engages 2WD wheel drive when in standard or sport mode for maximum power and traction!  

Hills are absolutely no issue with the C60, the twin 1200w (2400w) 2WD torque will enable effortless climbing with optimal traction on roads or trails with inclinations up to 40 degrees!

The C60 features battery packs with the latest high density LG cells, available in 60v10ah or our optional upgrade to 60v20ah. Both packs feature thermal control technology, dual charging ports and an advanced battery maintenance system to ensure a proper balanced charge.

 

All our battery packs have an industry leading 3 year warranty and are able to be charged in or out of the C60 scooter for added convenience!

Security is very important with Electric Works so we designed a locking alloy deck lid to protect your battery pack from theft!

Other notable features of the C60 include multi mode, high intensity LED head and tail lights activated by a handlebar mounted switch

These extremely bright LED lights will make sure you're seen day or night!

The C60s stopping power is handled by twin mechanical disk brakes which enable quick and effortless stopping power wet or dry!

BONUS!

During this Indiegogo campaign you will have the added option of being able to customize your C60 by choosing your mechanical brake color during the check out process!

Also take a look at our optional Hydraulic Brake Upgrade to increase your stopping power and add some additional customization!

​Comfort is crucial, the C60 features a rubberized deck lid and front and rear adjustable air ride suspension with 3" of travel to absorb bumps of all sizes and make sure you stay in control 

Our innovative leading link suspension design ensures stable steering at any speed!

Our optional seat kit further cushions the riding experience with an additional 3" of elastomer dampened suspension in the adjustable seatpost!

One of the key benefits of the C60 is its portability! It is able to be folded in seconds and can easily fit in your car trunk or on public transportation for those hybrid commutes

Bonus!

All Electric Works C60 scooters ordered on Indiegogo will ship with a complimentary padded storage/travel bag that can fit a complete C60 scooter with our Rear Cargo Rack and Seat Kit options installed (with seat kit, seat post must be removed)  Our bag is waterproof, lockable, TSA travel compliant and internal pockets can hold the included Smart charger and tool kit etc.

Electric Works offers a number of upgrades and accessories for the C60 which are available separately or able to be added on to your scooter order at the point of check out.  

Be sure to take advantage of these huge discounts while they last!

C60 CARGO RACK

The C60 Cargo Rack is the ideal option for strapping on loads up to 50 lbs (22.6kg) its adds some additional utilitarian functionality to the C60 and also makes a great grab handle when transporting!

C60 SEAT KIT

The C60 Suspension Seat Kit offers the rider a very comfortable seating position when riding, it provides an additional 3" of elastomer dampening as well as a gel padded saddle

SECOND QUICK CHARGER

The C60's LG battery packs offer dual charging ports to safely charge with two chargers at once to double the rate of charge!

Perfect if you need to get back on the road quickly or just need a spare charger for the home or office.

Detailing the second charging port on both the 60v10ah and 60v20ah

BIOLOK

BIOMETRIC CABLE LOCK

The Electric Works Biolok is a modern fingerprint activated cable locking system which can store up to 20 distinct fingerprints and allows for rapid and secure locking of your C60 scooter (or any other item)  - Tried and tested for durability, IP65 waterproof, USB chargeable and operates 1000 times per charge or sit up to 180 days on one charge!  (back up key included)

C60 Device Holder/USB Charger

The perfect accessory for holding and charging any device from 3.5" to 6.5" wide! 

Made from durable aluminum and IP66 waterproof rated - Installed with every C60 Order

C60 Key Start Module

The C60 Key Start Module is a great addition which adds a higher level of security to your scooter!   With integrated LED voltmeter you can also keep track of your battery performance.

Two keys included - Unit is installed prior to delivery if ordered with C60 scooter!

C60 Turn Signal Kit

The C60 turn signal kit includes two aluminum bar end mounted LED signal lights and handlebar mounted control unit.

Turn signal color modes:  

White: Automatically activated by the headlight switch for further riding visibility

 
Yellow: Flashes either left of right based on control unit

 

*Stock LED tail lights are also integrated into control unit

It is able to be folded in seconds and can easily fit in your car trunk or on public transportation for those hybrid commutesBonus!All Electric Works C60 scooters ordered on Indiegogo will ship with a complimentary padded storage/travel bag that can fit a complete C60 scooter with our Rear Cargo Rack and Seat Kit options installed (with seat kit, seat post must be removed)  Our bag is waterproof, lockable, TSA travel compliant and internal pockets can hold the included Smart charger and tool kit etc.Electric Works offers a number of upgrades and accessories for the C60 which are available separately or able to be added on to your scooter order at the point of check out.  Be sure to take advantage of these huge discounts while they last!C60 CARGO RACKThe C60 Cargo Rack is the ideal option for strapping on loads up to 50 lbs (22.6kg) its adds some additional utilitarian functionality to the C60 and also makes a great grab handle when transporting!C60 SEAT KITThe C60 Suspension Seat Kit offers the rider a very comfortable seating position when riding, it provides an additional 3" of elastomer dampening as well as a gel padded saddleSECOND QUICK CHARGERThe C60's LG battery packs offer dual charging ports to safely charge with two chargers at once to double the rate of charge!Perfect if you need to get back on the road quickly or just need a spare charger for the home or office.Detailing the second charging port on both the 60v10ah and 60v20ahBIOLOKBIOMETRIC CABLE LOCKThe Electric Works Biolok is a modern fingerprint activated cable locking system which can store up to 20 distinct fingerprints and allows for rapid and secure locking of your C60 scooter (or any other item)  - Tried and tested for durability, IP65 waterproof, USB chargeable and operates 1000 times per charge or sit up to 180 days on one charge!  (back up key included)C60 Device Holder/USB ChargerThe perfect accessory for holding and charging any device from 3.5" to 6.5" wide! Made from durable aluminum and IP66 waterproof rated - Installed with every C60 OrderC60 Key Start ModuleThe C60 Key Start Module is a great addition which adds a higher level of security to your scooter!   With integrated LED voltmeter you can also keep track of your battery performance.Two keys included - Unit is installed prior to delivery if ordered with C60 scooter!C60 Turn Signal KitThe C60 turn signal kit includes two aluminum bar end mounted LED signal lights and handlebar mounted control unit.Turn signal color modes:  White: Automatically activated by the headlight switch for further riding visibility Yellow: Flashes either left of right based on control unit *Stock LED tail lights are also integrated into control unit

story:
The Revolution has Landed

Jupiter Bike is the latest new product from the creative minds at Diamond Tech.  Diamond Tech has been designing and offering innovative products for more than twenty years.  Our goal is to introduce exciting, new, ecofriendly products to customers in the U.S. and around the world.  Our company’s slogan is Innovations for Creativity.  We are a team of entrepreneurs, designers, and managers who takes pride in the quality of our products and our commitment to customer service. 

JUPITER BIKE FEATURES

Take it anywhere! 100% Street Legal!

Safe, Durable and Easy to Unfold

The Jupiter Bike was not only made with speed and portability in mind, but also safety. Watch this video to find out more about the safety measures in place.

Join the Revolution Now!

The Jupiter Bike is now in production.  This is the start of the Jupiter smart transportation line – with innovative new products to follow.  Your contribution will help bring ecofriendly transportation to market more quickly.  Join the Jupiter foldable smart bike revolution.

Watch this video to find out more about the safety measures in place.Join the Revolution Now!The Jupiter Bike is now in production.  This is the start of the Jupiter smart transportation line – with innovative new products to follow.  Your contribution will help bring ecofriendly transportation to market more quickly.  Join the Jupiter foldable smart bike revolution.

story:
Everyday a cyclist or pedestrian is struck and killed by a motor vehicle. As the number of bicyclists increases, so do the fatalities. The number one killer of adult bicyclist is being hit from behind by a motor vehicle. Most drivers claim they did not see the bicyclist until it was too late.

As the roads become more congested, bicyclists and pedestrians are at greater risk from drivers.  Let’s face facts here. To some motorists, it’s as if the cyclist or pedestrian appears out of no where. For cyclists the problem is even worse, drivers do not see them or are inattentive due to other distractions. The results for everyone are bad, for the cyclist and pedestrian, often fatal.

The number of bicyclists are increasing daily. People are walking more than ever for health reasons, environmental awareness or just out of necessity.

Please donate and help make Roadar a reality.

I am running this campaign to raise funds to build a prototype to demonstrate to the market the feasibility of my hypothesis. Between myself and my Technical Advisor, a working Electronics Engineer, and avid cyclist, with decades of experience. We have identified the companies and material that we need to build a working prototype that will demonstrate a working solution to this very real problem of bicycle and pedestrian fatalities.

By participating in this effort, you will help save lives. It’s as simple as that.

I am raising $100,000. This money will go the purchase of various pieces of equipment, paying for engineering and testing and supporting engineering projects with auto manufacturers and Tier 1 suppliers, bicycle manufacturers and apparel manufacturers.

By completing this step we can attract investors to take us to developing the production level product.

I am in constant contact with the individuals in the position to bring the technology into the advance research labs of the automakers for further testing on their vehicles.

The first 200 donations of $100 or more will receive a Roadar Tee Shirt.

If you can’t help with a donation, please help get the word out about Roadar and use the Indiegogo share tools to reach as many people as you can.

My name is Ron Moore and I have decades of real world experience in communications. I am an inventor and have worked for the largest technology companies in the world and have worked in the start up world quite extensively. You can see my Linked In profile here. As you can see, I have a great deal of experience in conceiving and running a project.

I am also a life long bicyclist. I log 120 miles per week on my road bike so I see the problem of sharing the road first hand.  I’m also a driver and know that bicyclists can appear out of no where.  There is a way of alleviating a lot of the problems of visibility and Roadar will clearly save lives.

Thank you.

story:
Hello Indiegogosuporters,

My name is Damian and on behalf of Vortexdesign I would like to present a new form of transport called Cyclotor - a bike you can ride as a normal bicycle (7 speed gears), as a bike with electric assistance (cruise control button) or as an electric scooter (thumb throttle).

The goal for me was to create a unique, handmade quality bike with a special retro look that will make it stand out from the crowd.

The result is the Black Galaxy, limited edition Cyclotor bike. Only ten of Black Galaxy models will be produced. Each one will be handmade and thus unique by itself. Each buyer will get to personalize it by choosing his/her lucky stainless steel racing number on the tank.


Black Galaxy Cyclotor is made for cruising. With its front suspension, adjustable seating, powerful batteries, motor and regenerative braking it will give you a ride of your lifetime.

Technical specifications

-1000W motor

-48V, 20Amp LipoFe4

-regenerative braking

-front/rear disc brakes, 7-speed gears

-custom leather bags

-24 inch heavy-duty alum wheels, quick release front tire

-Height 98cm, axis to axis length 120,5cm, tank width 22cm, weight 50kg

-Handmade, hand painted – made in Slovenia, EU


This is a fully functioning prototype; the end/production model will have certain changes (fiberglass tank, double rear arm-see below, weight,etc.), but the basic Vortex design is to remain.

Due to additional safety reasons the production models will not have a singular rear arm as shown in the video, but a classical double sided fork in the same form/design as the prototype.



Other perks:


Promo knife/bottle opener carabiner key chain.



Vortexdesign logo keychain. Stainless steel promotional bottle opener with a small blade. Laser cut, laser engraved. Length 7cm, width 6cm, thickness 3mm.


Vortexdesign T-shirt



“To ride or not to be, to be or not to ride”…..that is the question. Shakespearean dilemma on quality 100% cotton T-shirt in all sizes (XS to XXL) and three colors (blue, black, white).


Your funding will enable me to kick start my Vortexdesign company and buy certain machines which will ease the production of Cyclotor bikes and allow me to create and present even more different projects in the future.

Hope you’ll like and support the project.

Best regards.

Damian Goncin


*Keep in mind that evendough all the perks have zero additional shipping cost, Vortexdesign will not be held responsible for any additional customs or any other cost or tax, so please check your countries regulations (that goes especially for non EU countries).

story:
Breve riassunto

Siamo i giovani Gestori del Rifugio Bruno Pomilio, in località Majelletta, ad un'altitudine di 1888m S.L.M. . Abbiamo cominciato questa campagna di Crowdfunding per coinvolgere tutti i clienti che ci spronano a continuare nella nostra impresa di tener aperto il Rifugio anche durante il periodo invernale visto che gli organi di competenza ci ignorano e ci lasciano isolati, limitando così anche la nostra possibilità di offrire un servizio di sicurezza e soccorso che si addice ad una struttura come la Nostra.

Il Vostro contributo ci aiuterà ad acquistare un mezzo cabinato che ci consentirà di trasportare cose e persone in sicurezza dalla partenza degli impianti fino alla nostra quota, e, di permetterci di coadiuvare eventualmente in situazioni di pericolo e/o soccorso.

TUTTI voi che contribuirete avrete in omaggio accessi al servizio navetta e gadgets ufficiali del Rifugio Bruno Pomilio, e chi non fosse in grado di contribuire verrà ringraziato dal momento in cui ci aiuti a far sentire la nostra voce!

story:
Rubbee X makes every bike electric. It has batteries, electronics and a motor that touches the rear tire of the bike. It also has a wireless cadence sensor that tracks Your pedaling pattern and adapts the electric assist automatically. Its patented quick-release lock technology enables Rubbee to be installed and detached with one hand, in just one second. Make Your bike electric.

We've prepared these rewards to our Indiegogo backers with heavy discounts from future retail price. These prices are only valid for our Indiegogo supporters.

We have a long history of making electric drives for bicycles. All the way since our first Kickstarter campaign to today. We commit to deliver the Rubbee X in time for the next riding season.

Combined, our team has over 40 years of experience in development and manufacturing of electric vehicles. We've worked on multiple hybrid electric trucks, charging stations, electric cars and, of course - Rubbee itself. So when it comes to engineering - we've got what it takes.

We used to manufacture all the previous generation Rubbee units in our own assembly line in Lithuania. Now we're gearing up for a much larger scale of manufacturing. So from the very beginning we've developed Rubbee X in close partnership with a solid manufacturing partner. Hint - they employ over 2500 people. They are huge ! This ensures quality, smooth certification process and great after sales support.

For the past year we've been working on our next-gen electronics, new motor, batteries and other new components of the Rubbee X. It's a product we've developed from the ground up with all our knowledge from the previous generations of it. We've built multiple prototypes along the way, here are some moments of our journey and a short video about how the earlier prototypes of Rubbee X works:

story:
Our Mission:

To help communities share what's great about them- including the advertising wealth their social media content creates.

Summary:

Our team comes originally from the worlds of advertising, technology and charity. We started out 4 years ago to build a social sharing network that would re-distribute the advertising wealth that it's content creates.

As we've developed the network, and built and improved the technology over continuous iteration, we've improved many features- including how we give to charity.

Today, it's really the dream medium for charity giving.

Simply using it as a social network earns our charity partners money. Our software sees to it that for every 10 baaCoin we pay to our content generators (that's everyone posting) we pay another into a charity account.

Our users can also make additional donations either from the money their content earns on baagloo, or their own funds, or both, at any time. Simply use the charity selector.

Our goal on Indiegogo is to raise the funds to bring in additional tech and marketing and grow the network to the next level; and to get new users of the baagloo network on board. So please download the free iOS app here http://apple.co/1Iu8hUZ  and/ or sign up on our website, https://www.baagloo.com 

Now you're ready to baagloo!


What We Need & What You Get:

baagloo is already really useful, beautiful and a force for good, and we've got a growing community of users.

We want baagloo always to be about our users, from our users and for our users.

So we think the best people to involve in our first ever crowd fund are our users.

We're looking to raise $35k to help us bring additional people on board and get us to the next level. All funds will be invested into additional features and services which will make it ultimately easier to use baagloo more often and generate more funds!

Your contributions and joining up will really make a difference and remember the more people on board the more funds we can generate for charity. So come on board and invite all your friends.

There are a whole lot of perks to choose from.

Being very passionate about what baagloo is already doing and what- with your help- we'll do more of, we've designed perks that allow you to get more involved in our plans and that make you a part of these long term.

There are therefore a lot of 'digital' perks that are based around our technology, where you can become an active part of baagloo.

There are also perks which are more 'physical', and celebrate the cool baagloo brand.

You can also combine these into 'packages'.

The Perks:

1. Charity Nomination:

Nominate any legal charity for inclusion into our TOP 100 charities board.

It's $10 per vote and you can vote as many times as you like.

We'll share your donation 50/50 with your chosen charity wether they make the top 100 or not.

Check the baagloo website for vote updates on the leaderboard.

The TOP 100 will remain in place for 6 months; meaning your chosen charity has continuous exposure over this period.

Here's how it works: when you select the perk via Indiegogo we'll create an account for you in baagloo using the same email, or using your existing baagloo account if you already have one, and credit your votes to your account.

And we'll email a you confirmation that your votes are in your account ready for you to use.

You simply use your votes on the charity section of the baagloo website.

It's that simple!


2. T-Shirts
Cool T-Shirts bearing the beautiful, registered baagloo trade-mark thumbs-up logo like the ones worn by the team in the movie. Choose logo style, size, colour and cut.

3. Explorer/ Curator Spotlight
For $10 per selection, you get to choose which posts should be featured in the Explore section of the app. Your choice/s will appear for 4 weeks on rotation. You can also opt for a 'package' of 15 selections for $100.
Great for spreading the word about an event you would like to feature.


4. VIP/ Priority Membership

Get access to VIP areas of a special, priority access app.

Invites to special events, restricted offers and new releases of the app will be served straight to this limited edition version.


5. Charity Stars
You and your chosen charitable activity will be promoted in a new Charity Stars section for 1 month. You'll be able to tell the story of your activity and raise funds and support right across the baagloo community.


6. Map Masters

Using our location services, you can put your place-of-interest on the map.

You provide the address and postcode/ zip code and we set up the location button for it at our control centre.

It's great for any size of business, just like Kate tells us in the video.

It's also a fantastic and original way to celebrate a special event. A first date, a birth, a marriage. Even a favourite place for a run, a bike ride or surfing spot. Once it's on, you'll be able to refer your friends and customers to it so they can find it instantly.

There are a choice of symbols. Let us know what the subject is and we'll pick one for you. You can alway change it if you're not happy. Please let us have the callout to go on the top of the symbol (max 25 characters).

7. In-Feed Ads

We'll place your ads everyday to reach our growing audience and send them your message.

The ads will be served 'native' in-feed so appear entirely natural and enhancing to the overall experience.

We'll also design the ads for you based on the elements you provide. (Image, copy & address/ phone #).

Your audience will be able to click on the address to locate, and/ or on the phone number to call you direct.

It's perfect for any promoted notification you want to send out and will reach across the entire community.


8. Founder Pack

Your name will appear in-logo and be part of our founders section in-app and on the website.
This is a very special level of involvement and you will receive priority notifications at all times.
You'll be invited to participate in Founders Events and feedback sessions.
You'll receive a commemorative t-shirt based on the multi-name logo (example above).

The TOP 100 will remain in place for 6 months; meaning your chosen charity has continuous exposure over this period.
Here's how it works: when you select the perk via Indiegogo we'll create an account for you in baagloo using the same email, or using your existing baagloo account if you already have one, and credit your votes to your account.
And we'll email a you confirmation that your votes are in your account ready for you to use.
You simply use your votes on the charity section of the baagloo website.
It's that simple!


2. T-Shirts
Cool T-Shirts bearing the beautiful, registered baagloo trade-mark thumbs-up logo like the ones worn by the team in the movie. Choose logo style, size, colour and cut.

3. Explorer/ Curator Spotlight
For $10 per selection, you get to choose which posts should be featured in the Explore section of the app. Your choice/s will appear for 4 weeks on rotation. You can also opt for a 'package' of 15 selections for $100.Great for spreading the word about an event you would like to feature.



4. VIP/ Priority Membership

Get access to VIP areas of a special, priority access app.
Invites to special events, restricted offers and new releases of the app will be served straight to this limited edition version.



5. Charity Stars
You and your chosen charitable activity will be promoted in a new Charity Stars section for 1 month. You'll be able to tell the story of your activity and raise funds and support right across the baagloo community.





6. Map Masters
Using our location services, you can put your place-of-interest on the map.
You provide the address and postcode/ zip code and we set up the location button for it at our control centre.
It's great for any size of business, just like Kate tells us in the video.
It's also a fantastic and original way to celebrate a special event. A first date, a birth, a marriage. Even a favourite place for a run, a bike ride or surfing spot. Once it's on, you'll be able to refer your friends and customers to it so they can find it instantly.

There are a choice of symbols. Let us know what the subject is and we'll pick one for you. You can alway change it if you're not happy. Please let us have the callout to go on the top of the symbol (max 25 characters).






7. In-Feed Ads
We'll place your ads everyday to reach our growing audience and send them your message.
The ads will be served 'native' in-feed so appear entirely natural and enhancing to the overall experience.
We'll also design the ads for you based on the elements you provide. (Image, copy & address/ phone #).
Your audience will be able to click on the address to locate, and/ or on the phone number to call you direct.
It's perfect for any promoted notification you want to send out and will reach across the entire community.






8. Founder Pack

Your name will appear in-logo and be part of our founders section in-app and on the website.

This is a very special level of involvement and you will receive priority notifications at all times.
You'll be invited to participate in Founders Events and feedback sessions.
You'll receive a commemorative t-shirt based on the multi-name logo (example above).

story:
Our vision

In this world there are many cloud service providers. We are not once again one of those, we are disrupting the market and changing the way the giants of this world are operating.

- Unlimited: Yes, we are, unlimited storage for everything you build, not GBs or TBs, storage is cheap and we are fair. We provide you all the time more and more capacity to share, build and access your dreams from anywhere.

- Performance: Our investment goes into the cloud, where all the magic happens, we are not the cloud for just small documents here or there, we are the powercloud for the photographers, the video editors and all the people in need of a performing cloud storage.

- Privacy: We store your information in Europe and we are not automatically sharing any of your personal data, just because: that's the way cloud should be.

- Open: We love open-source, we want the world to be more open than ever before, we connect with developers, inventors and customers to foster for a new era of cloud storage.

Fennobox is the cloud for the doers of this world. We are here to serve the most demanding applications like raw video sharing, high-quality medical images distribution & helping all the doers of this world, to achieve more.

Fennobox is :

    • up to 20x more faster than the competition

    • unlimited cloud storage

    • a European alternative to the actual giants

What you will get

  • You will get access to the best prices when subscribing up-front & vote for new functionalities that will be delivered to Fennobox.
  • Privacy, your data are not used in any commercial way. Your data is protected by European data protection laws.
  • Your data is encrypted.
  • You can select in which locations your data is stored.
  • Applications will be available for Windows, OS X, Linux & Mobile platforms iOS and Android. (January 2016)
  • We have already a prototype of the system running, we need to expand our capacity to get ready for public opening (March 2016)

Technical specifications

  • Servers will be located in Canada, France, Finland & Switzerland (Other locations coming in second half of 2016)
  • Up to 200 Mb/s access to our cloud service, per customer
  • Unlimited storage
  • Access from many devices as you want
  • Web access via SSL
  • Apps and open API for developers coming in 2016

The Fennobox Impact

  • We are going to disrupt the cloud storage market, we are unlimited, we offer liberty to our users, we decided that’s the new normal.
  • You won’t store only documents; our cloud is to store everything! That’s the way things are, since Fennobox is here.
  • Slow loading times are for the past; we are up to 20x faster than the competition.
  • Privacy is automatic and built-in, ending the seamless distribution of your data to different governmental organizations.

After-launch pricing

  • 49 USD / Month for Monthly subscription (no minimum contract duration)
  • 400 USD / Year for Yearly subscription (no minimum contract duration)
  • Packages for teams and SME's will be published later during the year.
  • All packages will be available to the public from March 2016
  • Subscriptions will be possible via InDemand

story:
You love cycling but because it can be exhausting you are thinking about an e-bike? Even more, you love your own bike and don´t want to change it for a heavy and bulky e-bike? This is a true dilemma and makes add-e the answer. New technology, high quality materials and quality engineering now makes it possible to turn your own bike into an e-bike with style. Mounted within seconds! With add-e you can choose to use your bike as a normal bicycle or as an e-bike. You can have 2 in 1. No additional space needed, eco-friendly and most of all with add-e you save money. Just pimp your own beloved bike and do some easygoing cycling, but in style.

add-e is a true lightweight champion with an outstanding performance. The inconspicuous design and modular set-up allows it not only to be mounted on almost every bike, but can be easily self-mounted without the need for any modifications. Besides its unique design, with add-e it is possible to use your bike as an e-bike as well as a normal bike. You´ll have 2 options in 1. It is up to you to choose when you need the extra power while riding. How does add-e do this? The special mechanism, undocks the drive unit in off-mode (when not pedalling) letting the tyre to run totally friction free.  
Smaller, lighter, faster… add-e


Add-e can be fitted to almost any bicycle without trouble, by using the mounting brackets provided. You can fit the assembly yourself without having to make alterations to the bike. 
Type 1 (Pedal bearing fitting) is the ideal solution for racing bikes, mountain bikes and many types of trekking bikes. The frame around the pedal bearing is standard which simplifies the fitting. In this case the mounting bracket is fitted on top of the pedal bearing and fastened securely.
Type 2 (Kickstand fitting) is the ideal solution for city bikes and older bicycles with a classical kickstand bracket. With this version the mounting bracket is bolted directly onto the kickstand bracket. However, if you are not quite sure which version you need drop us an Email and we will be pleased to assist you.

Add-e is a friction roller drive. This means that the wheel of the bicycle is directly driven without the need of a gearbox. The most efficient performance is achieved over tyres that have a smooth tread. After the initial fitting, the drive unit can be removed from the bicycle and re-fitted within seconds. video
Additional mounting kits enable the use of add-e on a number of bikes. The drive unit and the battery can be switched easily between two (or more) bikes. Therefore you can upgrade multiple bicycles with little money.

Add-e is built according to the European Pedelec Standards. This means that the motor only drives when pedalling at the same time. When you stop pedalling, add-e stops as well. This simple control system makes additional handlebar components completely unnecessary. The animation shows how it really works.

You like add-e and want to support us? Help us by telling your friends and acquaintances about add-e. Make your friends aware of this campaigne and became a fan on facebook. The more people we reach the better. And being quick pays off. “The early bird….” Offers are limited, and only for a short time so don’t wait too long.


After reaching our campaign target, we will do our utmost to get your order out quickly. Please consider that a certain time is necessary for production in series and that orders will be completed chronologically. First come first served.

Add-e is a team of 3 working together on the implementation of add-e since more than two years. Supported by renowned mentors and a broadly diversified network, they are the dynamic spirit behind add-e.


Where to buy add-e?
Please buy one of the perks, listed on the right. Currently we do not offer any alternative way of purchasing. If you do not want to pay by Paypal, please contact our support team at indiegogo@add-e.at.

Who do I contact in case of questions regarding the product, my order or payment?
Please contact our support team directly at indiegogoadd-e.at with any question you may have.

When are the perks expected to be shipped?
We expect to begin shipping in August. The orders will be dispatched in the order of their arrival. Therefore the delivery time may be longer in case of high demand.

Can I use add-e for every bicycle?
Yes, the design generally allows the combination with any bicycle. In those rare cases where the standard mounting plates cannot be used, e.g. with special frame shapes and some full suspension Bikes, we offer individual solutions. Please always refer to our service team first if in doubt.

Can I use the same add-e with two different bicycles?
Yes, thanks to the modular system this is possible without restrictions. The mounting kit can be ordered separately and allows the use of the drive unit with  as many different bicycles as you wish.

Does add-e meet the legal requirements of road traffic regulations?
Yes, add-e was designed following the Pedelec regulation EN 15194. Nevertheless, different regulations are valid in different countries and their respective road traffic regulations. add-e is standard fitted  with a 'pedal assistant sensor' and will be adapted to customer requirements in different countries (with consideration to capacity and final speed).

Do I have to bring my bike to a workshop for fitting add-e?
No, add-e is intended as a retrofit kit which can be assembled by the customer. The first assembly requires no special skills, nevertheless one should be able to handle a spanner.  Allow 30 to 60 minutes for the first-time assembly, depending on the bicycle.

How far can I go with add-e?
The actual reach depends on many different factors, particularly the physical contribution of the cyclist. More than 50 km are rarely reached on one battery charge. A high support level in steep terrain will considerably reduce the actual distance. However, full-day tours are possible with only one battery charge, since add-e causes no friction at all when turned off and only has minimal excess weight. For full-day tours add-e should therefore only be used periodically, for example to overcome tiring slopes. Hence, questions of distance  are difficult to answer and specifications cannot be directly compared with the technical information on conventional e-bike motors.

Must I pedal nevertheless?
Yes, add-e is designed as an auxiliary drive according to the valid pedelec regulations. The drive thereby switches itself off automatically as soon as you stop pedalling.  However, because there is no definition as to how strong one should pedal, it is possible to let the drive do the largest part  of work, relax and move the pedals only ostensibly.

Does the friction roller work even if it is wet and rainy?
Yes, the coating of the friction roller has been optimized during many tests for maximum power transfer. add-e get you to your destination quickly even in a downpour and sopping wet streets.

Must I dismantle add-e when I want to ride my bicycle "normally"?
No, add-e has a cleverly devised mechanism, enabling the friction roller to completely disconnect automatically. Therefore the bicycle can be driven like without e-drive in spite of the fully mounted add-e.

Which tyre should I use with add-e?
Due to the design principle of the friction roller 'smooth treaded' tyres are best suited.  These slicks have no diagonal grooves, run noiselessly and are ideal for urban areas and easy terrain. For those riding more off-road routes and need a coarser profile, we recommend tyres like 'Hurricane' from Schwalbe with a continuous middle profile. In addition, broader tyres provide better suspension comfort and a more efficient power transmission between tyre and friction roller.

How much does a full battery charge cost?
A full charge costs about 3 cents. (The battery in add-e can store about 130 watt-hours of energy. The costs for 1.000 watt-hours amount to approx. 20 cents)

story:
Our Story

Don's Hat Rack was created in 1999 in memory of Donald Perrotti who lost his battle to cancer. The hat rack is located in Yale New Haven Children's Hospital in New Haven Connecticut where Don spent 6 years of his life. Since there has been 2 more rack locations in the Guilford CT Yale hospital and Smillow Cancer Center.

It is a tough thing for a child to loose his or her hair and a hat is one of the ways to make them feel a little bit better about it. Don's Hat Rack is for kids who are fighting cancer to be able to choose any hat they want during thier time of struggle.  Donald's family and friends are always collecting hats and donations to keep a constant supply available.

When Donald passed away, his family was  overwhelmed with the emotional response and monetary donations of all his friends. They decided to give it back to the children's hospital buying a new supply of televisions, games, toys, and other things. The idea of a motorcycle rally was to collect hats and donations so they could continue to supply the hospital with these things as well as help other families with health care costs who need it the most all while keeping the spirit of Don alive. a few years ago, the family and friends of Don began the first annual Don's Hat Rack Motorcycle Rally to honor his 30th birthday. The outcome was more than expected and this year will host the seventh annual ride.

 

The Hat rack is always seeking donations to provide children and there families with the things that are most importaant in thier time of need. Not only do we stock the Hat Racks with all types of hats but we provide support with utility bills, health costs, as well as rent or mortgage. We provide grocery gift cards and during holidays help with any thing necessary to make the day special.

 

Monetary donations for this Annual Motorcycle Rally will help provide food for the hundreds of riders that attend the event. It will also help with providing raffle prizes which bring in a good portion of the money raised.
