story:
The Zenith is a high-performance E-Bike which is being developed to provide you with the best urban cycling commute. Built for those who live, work and excel in a fast-paced urban lifestyle and need a quicker way to get around the traffic that comes by car or public transport. Its 50 km (31 mile) range and lightweight frame will take you across any urban centre while also being able to fold up to be brought onto public transport or placed under a desk when not in use.

 

 

Getting around the city is expensive. Lease or car payments, parking costs, insurance, gas, and so many other small expenses can amount up to $1000 every month. With the Zenith you’ll only have one upfront cost and years of savings, and that’s not even considering the fun you’ll have riding around! Imagine what you can do with the money you’ll save AND the time you’ll save avoiding traffic with the Zenith.

 

If you ever find yourself low on battery and without a plug to recharge, you can pedal the Zenith as a regular bike to get to your destination. It functions as a 3-speed bike to help you deal with traffic and hills.

Go anywhere in the city you need to with Zenith. Featuring a 50km (31 mile) range on a single charge, Zenith allows you to commute around any urban metropolitan area without having to stop or worry about running out of juice.

Zenith is a completely foldable e-bike and can fit in your trunk, under your desk at work, and even in the smallest urban condominium. And it can be unpacked just as easily back to its original size in under 10 seconds.

Zenith uses 12” polyurethane tires with silk-print reflective rims to give you ultimate comfort and safety. They also provide improved control and handling of the bike and eliminate any risk of punctures with enhanced safety on the road.

Mechanical disk brakes give you expert modulation, full control and smooth braking requiring a single finger to engage.

Using a racing bike design to provide smooth and reliable shifting, the Zenith offers 3 modes of power support, making transition between throttle, speed and pedal assist smooth and simple.

 

Zenith is the high-performance e-bike built to as lightweight as possible. Weighing just 16.9kg (37 lbs), it can be picked up, brought upstairs, onto a bus, or fit into a trunk without hassle or worry.

 

See every detail of your trip on the handy backlit LCD display sitting on your right handlebar. Control everything from Zenith’s speeds to the power assist level adjustment, or just see your speed, distance and battery life at anytime and anywhere.

Take the Zenith to work and, before it’s lunch time, you’ll have the battery back to 100% thanks to the battery’s 3 hours, 0 to 100%, recharge time.

Swapping in Zenith’s battery is a 10 second task so you can quickly be on your way again!

 

The Zenith is an e-bike which will be your daily commuter for years to come. With a long lasting 36V lithium-ion battery, sturdy frame, comfortable seat, and high-performance Polyurethane durable tires, it’ll continue to serve you reliably for its entire life.
Zenith use of the an aluminum frame/polyurethane tires makes them durable enough that a replacement is unnecessary. However if there are any issues regarding the Zenith just email us at team@zenithbike.net and we will happily work with you to either fix your issue or send replacement parts.

 

The Zenith E-Bike is available in a variety of colours so you can fully express yourself as you make your commute.

 

Enjoy Zenith in a variety of matte colors:

 

 

Zenith is a global e-bike manufacturer based in FOSHAN, China with marketing teams in the EU and the USA. Acting as one of the largest e-bike manufacturers, Zenith has an annual production output of more than 150,000 bicycles, often being contacted to create the best selling models for brands such as Team Sky and shipping them for sale to parts Europe, America, and Africa. Our team has come together to create our own version of a powerful E-bike with which will help consumers be more eco-friendly in their day to day lives while also providing them with a means to turn their daily commute into an enjoyable experience.
story_txt:
The Zenith is a high-performance E-Bike which is being developed to provide you with the best urban cycling commute. Built for those who live, work and excel in a fast-paced urban lifestyle and need a quicker way to get around the traffic that comes by car or public transport. Its 50 km (31 mile) range and lightweight frame will take you across any urban centre while also being able to fold up to be brought onto public transport or placed under a desk when not in use.


 



 


Getting around the city is expensive. Lease or car payments, parking costs, insurance, gas, and so many other small expenses can amount up to $1000 every month. With the Zenith you’ll only have one upfront cost and years of savings, and that’s not even considering the fun you’ll have riding around! Imagine what you can do with the money you’ll save AND the time you’ll save avoiding traffic with the Zenith.

 



If you ever find yourself low on battery and without a plug to recharge, you can pedal the Zenith as a regular bike to get to your destination. It functions as a 3-speed bike to help you deal with traffic and hills.


Go anywhere in the city you need to with Zenith. Featuring a 50km (31 mile) range on a single charge, Zenith allows you to commute around any urban metropolitan area without having to stop or worry about running out of juice.

Zenith is a completely foldable e-bike and can fit in your trunk, under your desk at work, and even in the smallest urban condominium. And it can be unpacked just as easily back to its original size in under 10 seconds.


Zenith uses 12” polyurethane tires with silk-print reflective rims to give you ultimate comfort and safety. They also provide improved control and handling of the bike and eliminate any risk of punctures with enhanced safety on the road.

Mechanical disk brakes give you expert modulation, full control and smooth braking requiring a single finger to engage.

Using a racing bike design to provide smooth and reliable shifting, the Zenith offers 3 modes of power support, making transition between throttle, speed and pedal assist smooth and simple.
 



Zenith is the high-performance e-bike built to as lightweight as possible. Weighing just 16.9kg (37 lbs), it can be picked up, brought upstairs, onto a bus, or fit into a trunk without hassle or worry.
 

See every detail of your trip on the handy backlit LCD display sitting on your right handlebar. Control everything from Zenith’s speeds to the power assist level adjustment, or just see your speed, distance and battery life at anytime and anywhere.


Take the Zenith to work and, before it’s lunch time, you’ll have the battery back to 100% thanks to the battery’s 3 hours, 0 to 100%, recharge time.

Swapping in Zenith’s battery is a 10 second task so you can quickly be on your way again!
 

The Zenith is an e-bike which will be your daily commuter for years to come. With a long lasting 36V lithium-ion battery, sturdy frame, comfortable seat, and high-performance Polyurethane durable tires, it’ll continue to serve you reliably for its entire life.Zenith use of the an aluminum frame/polyurethane tires makes them durable enough that a replacement is unnecessary. However if there are any issues regarding the Zenith just email us at team@zenithbike.net and we will happily work with you to either fix your issue or send replacement parts.

 



The Zenith E-Bike is available in a variety of colours so you can fully express yourself as you make your commute. Enjoy Zenith in a variety of matte colors:


 


 


Zenith is a global e-bike manufacturer based in FOSHAN, China with marketing teams in the EU and the USA. Acting as one of the largest e-bike manufacturers, Zenith has an annual production output of more than 150,000 bicycles, often being contacted to create the best selling models for brands such as Team Sky and shipping them for sale to parts Europe, America, and Africa. Our team has come together to create our own version of a powerful E-bike with which will help consumers be more eco-friendly in their day to day lives while also providing them with a means to turn their daily commute into an enjoyable experience.

story:
THE KIDMOTO STORY

 

-------------------------------------------

Kidmoto Technologies™ started in New York City in November 2016 with the vision of creating an app for providing safe airport taxi transportation for families with small children. Kidmoto aims to help safety-minded parents navigate the complex and hazardous world of airport transportation.

Car services and taxis do not provide secured car seats for small children. Too often, parents are faced with the reality of just “jumping into a cab” with unrestrained children. Kidmoto created a solution to a problem and provides a fresh perspective on the hardships that parents face.

The Kidmoto mission is to provide the convenience of accessible and safe airport taxi transportation for families by growing a network of drivers that provide professionally secured car seats for safe airport transportation.

The Kidmoto app connects parents to a network of professionally-trained, Kidmoto certified, drivers that provide installed car seats. The concept of providing safe family airport transportation is now a reality, due to the efforts of CEO Nelson Nigel, a lifelong entrepreneur and former NYC yellow taxi driver. 

Currently Kidmoto Technologies™ addresses the safe transportation safety needs of parents traveling to or from NYC airports and plans for national growth.  

Kidmoto also provides Kidrent, which is an add-on service, providing parents the convenience of renting strollers and Pack N Play play areas while staying in NYC.

--------------------------

​

 

--------------------------

story:
What's the Deal

The Ovarian Psycos all-womyn of color bike collective is trying to open a community bike shop in Boyle Heights, Los Angeles next year. The Ladies, Trans, & Sissies contingent of the New Orleans Community Bike Project (Plan B)http://bikeproject.org/ is planning a cross-country road trip to raise additional funds, awareness, and support them as they prepare to open the shop. 

Short Summary

Tracey and Alisha, (the sissy contingent), two womyn bike mechanics, will be travelling cross-country in January 2013, visiting bike shops and collectives along the way to gather donations and generate support for the Ovarian Psycos. 

What We Need & What You Get

Tracey and Alisha need $1,000 to cover travel expenses. Additional donations will go toward opening the shop, including purchasing office equipment and software. 

Additional donations of books, 'zines, tools, bike parts, office equipment etc. also greatly needed and appreciated. Plan B is a recognized nonprofit, so all contributions are tax-deductible. 

Contributors will recieve nifty Ovarian Psycos swag! Buttons! Stickers! T-shirts! Awesomeness! Really! 

 

The Impact

The Ovarian Psycos are empowering underrepresented communities. By teaching women and trans individuals how to build and repair bikes, a field traditionally dominated by white males, they're directly challenging racism and patriarchy, and encouraging women to gain autonomy and build community, and mentor other young women. This shop is absolutley necessary and long overdue.

If you can't contribute money or supplies, you can still help by spreading the word about Ovarian Psycos.

http://www.facebook.com/ovarian.psycos

  • http://ovarianpsycos.com/

 

ANY CONTRIBUTION IS GREATLY APPREACIATED. REMEMBER YOU CAN DONATE $1, $5 AND UP!

story:
We want people believe and see that electric car can be convenient, good-looking, long range, dual purpose, everyday use, modern and safe and not too expensive.

Everyone knows that electric car is quiet, powerful from the very beginning of start, ecological and does not need regular maintenance such as filters, coolant and oil exchange e.t.c., safe and you don't have to pay to oil company for fuel. Just plug in your car and drive short time later. Everything is fine but there is some big annoying thing - terribly small range of large scale produced cars. Even in the begging of 20th century almost all of electric cars were able to run 100 miles per one charge. At the present time most of all large scale produced cars are able to run hardly 100 km. Some cars are able to run over 200 miles - Tesla S and Rimac Concept One - but the price is high and too high. It is sad because everyone wants electric car with 300 miles range or more and not to pay too much for it.

Some time ago our team got big and complex project. We had to convert Porsche Cayenne 4x4 to fully electric car with all safe and comfort function. It was really hard but we made it. We made full time 4x4 with all equipment, adjustable ground clearance and 350+ km of range. More over our first test drive was before Tesla S was ready and presented. Our customer got what he wanted and we started new projects.

Once we noticed that there is some problem with electric cars. If we take a look at cars we will see all kind of cars - small one, micro cars, big, heavy duty truck, e.t.c. - all what you can imagine. But if we do the same on electric cars we will see the long range electric luxury family sedan(one model S ) and a couple of high-end super cars with super price. Also we can find a few models of city car with good range such as Nissan Leaf with 120km of range - enough for town, local ride and visiting malls. And most of all electric cars are compact and very compact with terribly small range. And thats all. There are no pick-up trucks, there are no so popular and convenient crossovers or dual purpose, there are no compact and long range everyday cars.

 

So we projected and designed new kind of electric car:

- as compact as half of luxury sedan. You don't have to carry 4 additional seats and up to 1.5 m of empty and unnecessary space(common sedan).

- as powerful as pick-up truck. Maximum torque from 0 rpm

- is able to carry up to 300kg(600 lbs) of load

- fast enough to ride on highway

- long range. More than 400 km of range for commercial version. Our Project will be able to go 800+ km.

- adjustable ground clearance allows to drive in a city and off-road.

- dual purpose

- small scale produced car will be cost about 20000-25000 USD.

It is only two passenger car. Most of car owners have to carry additional empty space because most of time they drive alone.

It is a car for driver. For family ride there are VANs , for large load they have heavy pick-up trucks. Two passenger sport coupe doesn't suitable for off-road drive.

Our Project is perfect for every day drive, for Safari or fishing drive, it is ecological, suitable for couples and singles, for delivery work and for shopping.

The construction of bodyframe allow us to design every kind of vehicle type - it could be only off-road vehicle or it could be comfort four seats city car. Any type you want.

We need to build the first prototype as technology and ability demonstration vehicle. And it is possible with Your help. Together we can start new type of electric cars. And we don't need years and millions like car manufacturers - we don't have hundreds of managers and lawyers and we don't have to pay tremendous salary and taxes.

We want to start our Project in California, USA.
 Why we decided that it is California is the one of the best place to start new small electric car revolution?
 The main reasons are:
 - California is green state, that means that government support any ecologic projects.
 - hundreds of all size workshops where you can order and to project anything you need for cars.
 - very simple procedure of legalization, but not always fast.
 - almost perfect conditions for e-car tests: hills, valley, swamps, heat, cold places in mountains..
 - we have two of our team members in USA. They helped us distantly in our earlier projects. One is software developer, the other one is automotive conditioning systems specialist.

A small part of investments will be spent on workshop rent, some special equipment, legalization and different safe tests. But most part will be spent on development and improving characteristics.

Lets make this project alive! This small Project, that could start new electric car brand, became are small part of our lives.
 We are really want to see it alive and really need your help!


Risks and challenges

There is always a little place for obstacles and risk.

The first obstacle which can stop us - is lack of investments. We calculated our project many times for a few last years. We show it different specialists and drivers, some body parts were tested in Federal State Unitary Enterprise «Central Scientific Research Automobile and Engine Institute»(http://en.nami.ru/) . All main details and parts were re-calculated many times. And we contacted and had negotiations with many suppliers of the main parts, i.e. we have main suppliers and a few for just in case . The other risk is time delay of parts we need. Anyway, The Project will be finished.

 

Beside money lack only aliens invasion and global weather change are able to stop us. We have very powerful support, and that support is everyone included and involved in our Project - our families, our children, all our friend and a lot of people who trust us and believe in us.
 The second reason which is able to delay the end of the Project is legalization bureaucracy. It could take up to 4-5 additional months.

After years that we spent in negotiations, development and calculations, after the really complex project(Porsche ) we really don't see any serious and unbreakable obstacles that are able to leave The Project unfinished.
 But, to build that concept is only first step of our plans.

Pre-orders of commercial version will be available only after safty and range tests. 

We believe that our Project will be exactly that e-car which every one can afford and want to have.

 And it will not disappoint customers. After The Project will be finished we will start new campaign!
 The second our goal is start small scale production.


Have question about this Project? Discuss Elcar at http://crowdfundingforum.com/showthread.php/104...

story:
Short Summary

 

My name is Cantwell Lihanda. My friends call me Canty. I live in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.

My Indiegogo campaign is a fundraiser to expand my work which helps people in extreme poverty.

Let me explain. 

I am the African communications coordinator for PiF, a different kind of micro business creator. PiF provides small business grants to people living in areas of extreme poverty. The grants help people to become self-sustaining through the creation of small business like kiosk pharmacies, piggeries, internet cafes, grocery shops, small fishing enterprises, home-based sewing businesses and many more. 

Instead of paying the grants back to a bank or loaning agency, the participants pay forward from their profits to people in their own social circles. This way, the profits are shared and keep growing exponentially.

You can find out more about PiF by going to www.communitybuilders.ca and clicking on the Pay it Forward links.  

My work involves traveling to remote village areas in Tanzania, Kenya, Uganda, Burundi and DR Congo to coach and support people who want to help themselves by starting a small business after receiving a PiF grant. . 

When I am not travelling, I work out of my small home office in Dar es Salaam and this is where I need help.  

Let me explain more.

Everyone connected to PiF needs to be self-sufficient, even me, the communications coordinator. So far, Community Builders has spent $3,000 to train me and set me up in a home office in Dar es Salaam. But now I have to start a small business like all the other PiF participants and pay forward from my profits to people in extreme poverty.

My business will be called PiF Crowd Funding Support Services. It is a business to help micro business people in extreme poverty to raise funds to start businesses through Indiegogo and other social media websites.

My business will assist 20 PiF leaders in five sub-Saharan countries and many of the more than 500 PiF participants to use PiF and Indiegogo services, as well as other social media tools to raise funds for their small businesses. I will ask each person I help to pay me a small portion of the funds they raise to pay for my services.

In my business plan, the PiF leaders will raise a total of $20,000 over the next four months. I will ask for 10% of the funds raised, or $2,000. I will keep this approach going in the future and help to start more small businesses.

My own pay forward plan with the profits of my business is to help women and their families living in Bagamoyo, Tanzania. Most the families I want to reach out to have poor health and ragged clothes. They eat only one meal per day which is just a mixture of corn flour and vegetables.

I am partnering with a retired Tanzanian nurse who owns a dispensary in Bagamoyo Tanzania. Her name is Alice Munuo. Alice has been of much help by offering free medical treatment to the families living in extreme poverty conditions. Women from these families visit her clinic, mostly for maternity care. Normally, the women come to give birth with no resources and Alice goes out of her way to help them and even offer some food. But these handouts just help them for one day or two day and they go back and languish in poverty.

So I will pay forward the funds from my business to help these women to start small businesses related to farming, poultry and fishing in order to help improve their living standards.  When the women get profit from their small business they will pay forward to others who are extremely poor to start up even small businesses. 

We hope that this circle will continue until everyone's living standards in the area improves. We will also follow-up every month and support where we can. 

So please help me and I will help PiF participants and leaders to raise funds all over Africa and I will also pay forward the profits of my own work to very poor families in Bagamoyo with the help of Alice. 

Thank you very much.

Cantwell Karegi Lihanda

story:
Nireeka Prime with the most unique design ever for a bicycle, and a powerful mid-drive motor, a high range battery, will be going to create memorable experiences for you!
We have perfected a way to balance fat bikes parameters by designing a completely new frame.


 

Welcome to our 2nd campaign on IGG!
...

Prime is the result of 18 months of research and product development and a wealth of campaign management experience. We designed the product and campaign based on your feedback.

 

Begin your new adventure with the newest Nireeka model. With its polished carbon fiber frame, manufactured with the most durable and sustainable materials and garnished with an exquisite paint job, the Nireeka Prime is as much an art as it is a bicycle! Coming equipped with a mighty mid-drive Bafang propulsion powertrain, Nireeka Prime is voracious to rock up on all terrains.

WHY WE CALL IT THE SMARTEST?
...

AS SEEN ON
...

 

SO, WHAT IS PRIME EXACTLY?
...

Prime is a purpose-built carbon fiber mid-drive electric motor ebike with 4" fat tires and the huge 160nm of torque gives you the confidence to explore any land on the planet earth and beyond ;)



OVERVIEW
...

• Incredibly lightweight, the whole bike weighs less than 26 KG.
• Solid Monocoque Carbon fiber frame with a lifetime warranty.
• Powerful mid-drive motor with more than 160nm torque.
• Durable Li-ion LG battery.
• 180mm rear/160mm fr hydraulic discs brake (203mm optional).
• 10S Shimano Deore cassette.
• Speed/Torque Sensor.
• Walk mode. The bike assists you when walking with the bike.

All the features come with the most beautiful purpose-built ebike ever! It's not a converted one but a pure ebike.

 

WHY PRIME?
...



Ride easily on sand, beach, snow, tarmac, mountain; literally everywhere. All you need is a purpose-built and solid frame, a set of fat tires, a powerful motor, and a durable battery. Simply a Nireeka Prime!

 

HEARTBEAT ASSIST (OPTIONAL NSD)
...

This system uses your heartbeat rate to command the motor how much torque you need. You can set your lowest rate (Where the motor starts assisting), your highest rate (Where the motor gives you 100% of torque) and also gives you a comprehensive report.

 

ACCIDENT REPORT SYSTEM (OPTIONAL NSD)

...

What do you do after a crash?

Although a collision with an automobile, an obstacle or another cyclist are the greatest hazards cyclists face, there's something that makes it even more dangerous. What if you're not able to call the Police or someone else for help?

Happily, we have a solution for it.

"Our Smart system will send a TEXT MESSAGE containing your accurate location to a primary number you already set"

 

CARBON FIBER FRAME
...

Our monocoque carbon fiber frame has been built by the EPS molding method which provides a clean internal surface just like the external surface. This results in a Zero Fiber Wrinkles which would've created an extra weight.

 

MID-DRIVE MOTOR
...

The mid-drive motor constantly samples relevant information at a frequency of up to 80k Hz via a torque sensor and two speed sensors which are all highly synchronized & sensitive.

The resulting data on crank torque, vehicle speed and the speed of rotation of the pedals are made available to the controller, ensuring precise control of the vehicle while achieving the highest possible efficiency. The Max Drive System puts the rider in complete control. In spite of generous power output and a maximum torque of more than 160 N.m, the motor operates in virtual silence. The modular motor design and integrated controller make disassembly easier and improve service responsiveness.

Water-resistance components

 

 

TORQUE SENSOR
...

The torque sensor measures your actual force on the pedal, sampling at 1,000 times per second over the entire pedal stroke. 

The harder you pedal, the more torque comes from the motor. It makes all these adjustments in real-time. Therefore, it is technically amplifying your every input. It feels like you are bionic. 

 

BATTERY
...

 

Prime comes with the best quality Lithium-ion LG battery with 1,000 times charging time lifetime. There are two versions available, both 48V, the standard one is 10Ah (480Wh) and the upgraded one is 17Ah (816Wh).

It's easily removable and you can charge the battery either on the bike or take it off and charge it at the comfort of your home. 

Please note: The Prime battery is not the same model as the Nireeka Homie series.

THE SMARTEST E-BIKE EVER (OPTIONAL NSD)
...

Alarm Buzzer: High decibel alarm
Advanced daytime light: Multi-color LED
Light sensor: Automatic display and daytime light brightness dimming control
Heartbeat assist: Moderates PAS based on the heartbeat rate
Radar: Ultrasonic obstacle detector sensor
Gyroscope: A device used for measuring or maintaining orientation and angular velocity
Accelerometer: Measures proper acceleration
Intelligent assist: Improves basic assist system
Tracker: To find the bike if stolen
OTA: Update over-the-air
Blanview: Better display visibility under the sunlight
Brake cut-off: Smart engine cut-off at brake detection

 

Anti-theft system (OPTIONAL NSD):

Our anti-theft system not only detects any suspicious movement when your bike is locked but also sends the precise location of the bike if it's stolen.

The device has a very powerful Buzzer and flashing LEDs in the case of theft.

If the device failed to connect to the Internet for sending the location, it sends a TEXT MESSAGE to your phone containing the precise location of your bike.

You can lock/unlock your bike using a PIN code on the display or your smartphone.

 

DASHBOARD
...

Default display (Click to view all specs):

 

Upgraded display (Click to view all specs):

The color display not only provides a better monitor quality but also gives you a lot more features such as light sensor, USB charger and back light. Click here for more details.

 

 

SUSPENSION FORK
...

If you like to transform your Prime to a hardcore electric mountain bike, you need our custom-designed suspension fork. You can get the upgrade as an add-on when placing your bike order or get it separately and merge it into your order on our customer panel from here.

 

DESIGN
...

Prime is a purpose-built ebike with a unique and eye-catching silhouette like any other Nireeka models.

 

COLORS
...

We're offering 3 automotive quality painting color; Matte Black, Glossy White and Glossy Red.

FEATURES AT A GLANCE
...

 

FEATURES
...

Mid-drive motor

  • One of the best Bafang products
  • 160nm torque enough for towing a car
  • Internal controller, torque/speed sensor

Battery

  • 10Ah 48V LG Lithium-ion battery
  • Aluminum enclosure
  • Chargeable on&off the bike
  • Fast charger (optional)

10-speed Cassette

  • Shimano Deore Cassette
  • Shimano Deore Shifter
   

Disk brake

  • 180 mm rear disk
  • 160 mm front disk
  • 203mm optional
  • Hydraulic disk brake
   

Fat tire&wheel

  • 26"x4" fat tires
  • Aluminum wheels
  • Carbon fiber optional wheels

Carbon fiber frame

  • 3K-12K UD carbon fiber fabric
  • Lightweight despite the huge size
  • Monocoque frame and fork
  • EPS molding

Computer display (Upgrade)

  • 3.5" TFT
  • IP65 Waterproof
  • USB/Bluetooth data port
  • CE/ROHS

 

 

 

UPGRADES
...

Now, it's the time! Just go ahead and make your bike a dream machine by click on the below image,

 

 

GEOMETRY
...

Prime is only available in one size which is 17". Please check the below information to see if it's suitable for you.

Is Prime suitable for you?
If your height is between 5'3" (160 cm) and 6'9" (206 cm) and your legs length is between 28" (71 cm) to 32½" (83 cm) the bike is perfect for you.

How much is the max allowed rider weight?
We have a lifetime frame warranty for the riders less than 275lbs (125kg). 

What is the standover height?
Standover height is the distance from the ground to the top of the top tube. In male mtb bikes, it is usually higher than the female versions. Prime gives you a combination of both at the same time so it's also very easy for females to ride without sacrificing the great design.

 

LIGHTWEIGHT FRAME & COMPONENTS
...

Despite the gigantic body shape to have the battery inside, the frame is lightweight thanks to the carbon fiber frame and fork.

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION
...

* The default battery (10Ah 48V - 480Wh) provides 50 km (31 miles) range and the upgraded version (17Ah 48V - 816Wh) provides 80 km (50 miles) on the assist mode.

 

SHIPPING AND VAT
...

Before placing your order please note:

  1. The shipping cost is not included in the price. You will be charged for the shipping cost on the checkout stage. For most of the countries the shipping cost is $349.
  2. VAT & Duties are not included in the price and you as the backers are responsible for that.
    • The US backers don't need to pay any VAT or extras.
    • The EU backers should pay VAT in advance.
    • The backers from the other countries, will be charged in their destination country by the courier.
  3. The bike comes with a lifetime frame warranty even if you don't get the warranty perk.

 

WARRANTY
...

The bike comes with a lifetime frame warranty but if you like to have a "Part Replacement Warranty" you need to get the associated perk. This warranty includes only parts replacement and you as the backers are responsible for the labor costs of fixing or replacing the parts.

 

TIMELINE
...

 

PRODUCTION
...



In order for frames to be evaluated reliably, the test procedure must meet high standards of quality. Our tests make this possible by stressing the frame in a way similar to that in the real world situation and even harder conditions, with computerized measurement and control.

Since the carbon fiber frame has an unlimited fatigue life, we make sure our frames meet the same criteria by testing them in multi-thousand loops.

 

 

SHIPPING
...

We ship to the US, Canada, Japan, South Korea, Australia, China, Hong Kong, and all the EU countries. We do NOT ship to South America, New Zealand, and Africa. If your country is not listed, please make sure to contact us before placing your order. For some countries, we're able to send the bike to the harbor and you can do the customs clearance by yourself using the documents we will send to you.

 

OUR FIRST CAMPAIGN STORY!
...

We managed to send our first model to 50+ countries to our wonderful & happy backers. Seeing their smile was and still is the best gift we got from that 2 years journey. Thank You Nireeka Family!

 

FAQ
...


Kindly read the FAQ before placing your order.

For further information or questions, please check our website and leave us a comment on our official forum. We will get back to you ASAP!

After-sales services: support@nireeka.com
Backers inquiry: backers@nireeka.com

Current campaign dedicated email: prime@nireeka.com

And as usual, for the fast and the most personal support, just click on the chat button at the bottom right corner of any page on our website and Chat with us immediately.

 

 

     All the best from the Nireeka Team
Nireeka.com

story:
Hi!
 
Walmart’s shareholders are gathering in Bentonville, Arkansas in early June. My name is Dominic Ware, I am a Walmart worker and a leader in OUR Walmart. My co-workers and I want to go.
 
Calls for change from Walmart workers have so far gone largely unanswered, Walmart workers and community supporters across the country are kicking off a national “Ride for Respect” to take our concerns directly to the executives and shareholders who could make change happen.
 
It’ll be a huge effort. In the spirit of the civil rights movement, the “Ride for Respect” is a week-long, nationwide caravan to Bentonville, and we want to ensure that OUR Walmart members from the Bay Area are able to hit the road and make our voices heard.

Walmart workers from The Bay will need funding to cover transportation, food, and lodging for the trip -- and it’s folks just like you who can help make it happen.

Please chip in right now.

Our goal is to raise enough money for 5 workers to fly from the Bay to Home Office (A One-Way ticket is $415 each), who cannot join us on the bus.  We don't want to leave anyone behind, as members of OUR Walmart - we stick together!

Even though Walmart makes more than $16 billion in profits each year, the retailer is creating jobs that keep its associates without enough hours, without healthcare, and struggling to get by on poverty wages.
 
As a result many of us can’t even support ourselves or our families without relying on government assistance, while the Walton family, which controls the company, has the wealth of 42 percent of American families combined, and its CEO rakes in more than 1,000 times the salary of the average Walmart worker.
 
That’s why we are calling for jobs with full-time hours and a minimum salary of $25,000 from Walmart -- and why your support is so important.
 
Please donate today to help OUR Walmart members from The Bay Area take the Ride for Respect!
 
Thanks so much,
 
Dominic from Walmart #5434 in San Leandro, CA
My Story:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pii3QUxIdOw

story: NA

We're happy to present to you the Solowheel Iota: a new personal vehicle for urban travel in 21st century.

Inventist is a world leader in bringing to market groundbreaking and affordable personal e-vehicles. We brought you the Solowheel Iota –a descender of that incredibly popular Hovertrax – the original invention launched in May 2013 that started the craze for hoverboards. When we introduced our first Solowheel, we bilded it as the smallest, greenest, most convenient e-vehicle ever invented. That title now goes to the Iota, which will have 8" wheels and weigh as little as 8lbs. We finished the final stages of testing and fine-tuning. As people already know from riding the Solowheel and Hovertrax, our self-balancing technology is the best in the industry, we only use high-quality battery packs and motors, and we use a full suite of electronic safety features. You can expect the same level of quality from the Solowheel Iota .

The Birth of a Design

Shane Chen and Inventist have been involved with and working on self-balancing personal transportation technology for a while now. For those who haven't experienced the feeling, it's hard to communicate. It's a gliding, flying, free sort of feeling that enables you to move effortlessly and gracefully through the landscape. The Solowheel Iota has the most powerful motor of these inventions, is practical for use, and easy to learn. When we introduced the Hovertrax, we realized that there is a place for smaller, elegant devices, but the concept caught on so thoroughly that we began to experiment with different ways of using two wheels that might be more versatile than the Hovertrax.

The Solowheel Iota is birthed from an extended look into the human dynamics of different standing positions and wheel arrangements. Adopting a lower, two-wheeled stance we are able to make a more versatile device.

We’re happy to say that we're planning to make the Solowheel Iota in the USA — a first for our Solowheel Iota line! We're running this Indiegogo campaign to offer fans an early chance of getting a Solowheel Iota for themselves, and to secure sufficient funding to make initial production economical for the end user. We're grateful for your support and excited to add another offering to our line of self-balancing vehicles! Its patent-pending design includes a parallelogram-based turning assist mechanism which makes the Iota maneuverable and easy to use. In addition to an intelligent rider detection system, folding pedals, lights and a convenient carrying handle, the Iota will include Bluetooth capabilities, with smartphone and watch apps, it also has a electromech suspension system.

Specifications:

• Range: up to 8 miles (12.8 km)
• Speed: capable of 10 mph (16 kph)
• Incline: 15 degrees 
• Weight: approx. 8 pounds (3.6 kg)
• Width: 7” (17.8 cm) 
• Weight limit: 250 lbs (113.4 kg)
• Inflatable 8” (20 cm) wheel 
• 1000W motor
• 100Wh lithium ion battery 
• Charge time: approx. 40 minutes 
• Front and rear lights 

The selling price will be $200, but you only need to pledge $99 to receive an Iota in the first 20 contributors and $150 for the next in line. We expect to ship them in July 2019. If you are looking for reliable outdoor transportation, if you want to support American innovation, or if you just want to have some fun on the newest gadget, please support the Solowheel Iota!

Real Life Applications

The Solowheel Iota is perfect for "last mile" commuting, hanging out around town, running quick errands or just having fun. Hoverboards and Segways are not good for transportation because of their wide footprint. You need to be constantly watching the path of the wheels on both sides of your feet. The wheel on the right may hit a bump you just don’t see, and then you may get precariously close to the edge of the curb on your left. If you hit something, you can make the vehicle spin, which could throw you off balance. The Solowheel Iota eliminates these hazards. Because the wheels are between your feet, you only need to scan the road directly in front of you, making it genuinely useful and practical.

Regarding Hoverboards

Unfortunately, most of the hoverboards you've seen are copies of the Hovertrax sold by hundreds of other manufacturers. Except for the Razor Hovertrax, all those other hoverboards are illegal and were often made without concern for quality. (Inventist’s Hovertrax was the only hoverboard we know of that was reviewed and not recalled in the mass CPSC recall of summer 2016.) But the popularity of hoverboards, and the extreme proliferation of knockoff brands, created a situation in which our ongoing progress in stopping the copies has been slow, even though they infringe on our patents.

Risks and challenges

After producing three previous products in the Solowheel line as well as the Hovertrax, we’re very experienced in developing and manufacturing products in this field. However, the Solowheel Iota includes several new features compared to our previous products, as well as the obvious mechanical differences, we can manage very well all the production line.

We're grateful for your support and excited to add another offering to our line of self-balancing vehicles! Its patent-pending design includes a parallelogram-based turning assist mechanism which makes the Iota maneuverable and easy to use. In addition to an intelligent rider detection system, folding pedals, lights and a convenient carrying handle, the Iota will include Bluetooth capabilities, with smartphone and watch apps, it also has a electromech suspension system.Specifications:• Range: up to 8 miles (12.8 km)• Speed: capable of 10 mph (16 kph)• Incline: 15 degrees • Weight: approx. 8 pounds (3.6 kg)• Width: 7” (17.8 cm) • Weight limit: 250 lbs (113.4 kg)• Inflatable 8” (20 cm) wheel • 1000W motor• 100Wh lithium ion battery • Charge time: approx. 40 minutes • Front and rear lights The selling price will be $200, but you only need to pledge $99 to receive an Iota in the first 20 contributors and $150 for the next in line. We expect to ship them in July 2019. If you are looking for reliable outdoor transportation, if you want to support American innovation, or if you just want to have some fun on the newest gadget, please support the Solowheel Iota!Real Life Applications The Solowheel Iota is perfect for "last mile" commuting, hanging out around town, running quick errands or just having fun. Hoverboards and Segways are not good for transportation because of their wide footprint. You need to be constantly watching the path of the wheels on both sides of your feet. The wheel on the right may hit a bump you just don’t see, and then you may get precariously close to the edge of the curb on your left. If you hit something, you can make the vehicle spin, which could throw you off balance. The Solowheel Iota eliminates these hazards. Because the wheels are between your feet, you only need to scan the road directly in front of you, making it genuinely useful and practical.Regarding HoverboardsUnfortunately, most of the hoverboards you've seen are copies of the Hovertrax sold by hundreds of other manufacturers. Except for the Razor Hovertrax, all those other hoverboards are illegal and were often made without concern for quality. (Inventist’s Hovertrax was the only hoverboard we know of that was reviewed and not recalled in the mass CPSC recall of summer 2016.) But the popularity of hoverboards, and the extreme proliferation of knockoff brands, created a situation in which our ongoing progress in stopping the copies has been slow, even though they infringe on our patents.Risks and challengesAfter producing three previous products in the Solowheel line as well as the Hovertrax, we’re very experienced in developing and manufacturing products in this field. However, the Solowheel Iota includes several new features compared to our previous products, as well as the obvious mechanical differences, we can manage very well all the production line.

story:
As seen on

–

Further Questions:

www.sonomotors.com/faq (ENG)
www.sonomotors.com/faq (GER)

Factsheet (ENG)
Factsheet (GER)

–

Press contact:

press@sonomotors.com
www.sonomotors.com/press


Further information:

www.sonomotors.com
Facebook
Twitter

–

Risks and challenges

General

In crowdfunding, there’s always potential for unexpected challenges, and although we hope none of these will come up, sometimes things happen. From experience, we discovered that manufacturing, in regard to our delivery timeline, could be an unexpected obstacle and may result in slight delays in delivery of the products. We’ve strengthened our established relationship with our manufacturing and distribution partners to ensure that we minimize the risk of any such occurrences. We are working hard on the Sion to comply with the specified time, but we have to note that the specified schedule is only an estimate. A big concern on our part is not to waive environmental standards and humane working conditions, only to comply with the production schedule. The quality of the SION should not suffer from tight deadlines.

Testdrive

We are not a large company and therefore hope you understand that it can occur that during the test drives, delays may happen or that there might even be a total failure of the drive. The test drive will only take place in your country if there are more than 50 pre-orders there. The test drive will only take place in the capital of each country. With more than 200 pre-orders from a country, test drives are offered in several cities. Which cities are chosen is at our discretion. We accept no liability costs for travel, board and lodge. We will only set a date for the test drive; if you’re unable to come, we can not offer alternative dates, unfortunately. In general: There is no legal claim to the Sion, the test drive and/or already paid services.
Please note: There are only test drives offered in countries in which we also plan to deliver the Sion.

Battery

Optionally, the Sion is offered with a monthly battery hire or a single battery purchase. Prices for this are yet to be announced. Please understand that we are still at an early stage and therefore can’t give you precise details. The steadily falling battery prices will however only develop to the benefit of your final price.

Preorder / Purchase / Deliver of the Sion

Please understand that we cannot enter into any legal sales contracts with you at this early stage. Therefore, there is no legal claim to the Sion, the test drive, the reservation and/or already paid services. You can always reclaim your prorated purchase amount for arising transfer fees (for example PayPal). The first time this is possible will be after the end of the crowdfunding campaign. We’ll try our best to meet your request – however, we point out that you have no legal right to a refund of the prorated purchase amount, in case of bankruptcy or other financial difficulties of SONO MOTORS GmbH.
We’re aiming for deliveries in the following regions and countries:

In the following countries deliveries are aimed:

• European Union
• Swiss
• Great Britain
• India
• USA
• Canada
• Australia

story:
UPDATES:

Propella Version 1.0: 2016 Delivery (Sold-Out)
Propella Version 2.0: 2017 Delivery (Sold-Out)
New Version 2.2:
Available at:  www.propella.bike

..............................................................​

................................................................................................................................

[07/22/2016]: We did it! Our funding, production, delivery, and timeline goals have been achieved with the support of our backers. Final packaging and quality control has been finished at our local warehouse and we are ready to ship! As promised, early backers will  receive their eBikes starting last week of July, and the remaining packages should arrive by first week of August. 

 

.......................................................................................................................................

 

 

It's Finally Here!

An ordinary bike transformed by an extraordinary boost!

 

 

 

            

 .............................................................................................................................................. 

PRESS: 

GeekWire.com/Propella

 

 

FastCompany.com/Propella

 

Treehugger.com/Propella

Gizmag.com/Propella

............................................................................................................................................

 

Elegant . Electric . Efficient 

 

 

 

 

 

Philosophy

Propella's mission is to bridge the gap between regular bikes and electric bikes (eBikes). We strive for simplicity, and our minimalist design allows us to achieve our goal by eliminating unnecessary features and focusing on essential elements.

 

Adding enormous battery capacity and power to an eBike can discourage riders from pedaling, reduce safety, and add excessive weight and cost. The right amount of power, however, can transform a bicycle into a lightweight, safe, and reliable electric vehicle.

 

 

 

Design Features

 

 

                           

 

Motor

Single-Speed freewheel attached to hub motor

 

 

Battery

 

 

 

  • SAMSUNG Li-Ion Cells

  • Removable

  • Anti-theft Lock

  • Waterproof

  • 36 Volt 6.6 Ah

  • 2.5 Hour Charge Time

  • USB Output Plug

 

Samsung 18650 Lithium Ion Cells (Used in Tesla Model S)

The battery pack is equipped with electronics that automatically prevent the cells from getting overcharged or over-discharged.

 

 

 

 

Standard USB output plug for charging cellphones or other USB-enabled devices

 

Frame Size

 

............................................................................................................................................

 

How it works

 

A boost of power whenever you need it!

 

 

You can pedal this eBike just like a normal bicycle and use the electric assist (if desired)  in two simple ways:

 

 

1) Throttle: The motor will push you forward at anytime by pressing down on the throttle. The more you push down on the throttle the more help you get from the motor. Throttle option is usually most helpful for getting back in motion after a complete stop at a red light or stop-sign. It is also useful for a quick boost of power on short but steep hills.

2) Pedal-Assist (PASS): This function only works when you are pedaling. 5 levels of assist are available that can be selected from the LCD Display. As you start pedaling the motor will kick in, and when you stop pedaling the motor turns off.

Levels 1-2 are typically used for long but relatively flat commutes. Levels 3-5 are ideal for  steep and long hills. On a flat road, level 5 assist will move you at about 20 mph with almost no effort from the rider. At assist level 0, the eBike behaves like a normal "non-electric" bicycle. This is useful for maximum exercise and calorie burn.


 

 

 

............................................................................................................................................

 

 

 

Rim Color 

 

 

............................................................................................................................................

 

Full Specs

 

             

 

...........................................................................................................................................

 

 

Social Media pages  

          www.facebook.com/propellabikes

 www.instagram.com/propellabikes

          www.twitter.com/propellabikes

 

.............................................................................................................................................

 

..............................................................................................................................................

 

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

- How can I contact Propella?

Please contact us here on Indiegogo, or visit our website www.propellabikes.com 

 

- Do you ship internationally?

Currently we offer USA and CANADA shipping only. Upon successful completion of this campaign we look forward to offer international shipping (starting with EU). If you are interested in international shipping please sign up here and we will notify you as soon as possible.

-How much is shipping?

USA Shipping: $95

Canada Shipping: $185 (Batch 3 only) (Note: The buyer is responsible for all local tax/duty fees)

You may also pickup your eBike at our warehouse at no cost. We will contact you regarding the date/time and location of pickup.

- What is the rider height and weight limit for this eBike?

We recommend a maximum rider weight of 200 lbs for this eBike.

The stem and seat are adjustable to suit rider height of 5'-2" to 6'-2".

- Can the Propella eBike be used as a normal "non-electric" bicycle?

Yes. You have three options:

1) Turning off or removing the battery pack. 

2) Turning off the LCD Display. Neither throttle or Pedal-Assit (PASS) option work when LCD is off.

3) Setting your Pedal-Assit (PASS) level to zero 0. (The throttle is still functional)

- Can I charge the battery by pedaling?

No. Charging by pedaling (regenerative charging) is only possible with direct-drive motors. Direct-drive motors are much heavier and larger than geared-motors (used in Propella)  and consume much more power. 

- Where can I demo this eBike?

Propella had successful Demo-Day t the Seattle Bike Show on March 5-6, 2016.

We announce the news for any upcoming events on Indiegogo as well as our social media pages.

.............................................................................................................................................

For questions please contact us here on Indiegogo, or visit our website www.propellabikes.com  

 
Propella Electric LLC - Copyright 2016 - All Rights Reserved

story:
Hey, JCD gang...we have some unfortunate news. Yesterday Brad and Carrie's home was robbed. The folks who came in went through drawers and closets but took just one thing...the Johnny Cash Day ticket money.

Rest assured that the majority of the funds raised that night from the bar, wheel of swag, raffles and t-shirt sales is safe and sound, but the ticket money is gone.

If you feel it in your heart or in your soul, and you want to keep the love and community spirit of Johnny Cash Day flowing, we are asking for any donations (big or small) to help replace some of the cash that was stolen. $2,650 was taken, and that's what we're trying to raise.

As always, all of the proceeds go to fund various charities at Allegheny Elks Lodge #339 on the North Side, such as the PA Elks Home Service Program, youth outreach programs and scholarships, Veterans Home visits and donations, and necessary repairs to the Lodge itself.

Stay safe. Take care of one another. Lock your doors. And know that our city is still the best. Thanks again to all of you for making JCD so special year after year.

story:
Distracted and drowsy driving (DDD) is a major problem on the roads. According to the National Highway Transportation Safety Administration (NHTSA), it is one of the leading causes of vehicle crashes involving fatalities and bodily injuries.



The Drive Guardian: Driver Drowsy Safety Alert System comes equipped with a high performance camera that will intelligently monitor the driver's eyes and pupils in real-time. Utilizing sophisticated algorithms, the Drive Guardian will alert the driver by displaying LED indicator lights and sounding audio warnings whenever they are drowsy or distracted.




Once the engine starts, the Drive Guardian will immediately monitor the driver’s eyes and pupils. Depending on the type of behavior the driver exhibits –heavy/prolonged fluttering eyes due to sleepiness, looking away from the road due to distractions, the Drive Guardian will sound a variation of alerts. Having the Drive Guardian with you is just like having a protective companion by your side while you are driving.


 
    



The Drive Guardian will be especially useful for fleet managers or independent truck operators because it will provide them with a highly effective tool that will prevent costly crashes due to DDD and help lower their CSA score.





Features:

  • Intelligent image monitoring algorithm and intuitively smart recognition system
  • Detection and warning of drowsiness, negligence in looking forward, and face departure  while driving
  • Cognitive operational scenario for early warning by both the indication LEDs and the speaker sounds
  • Infrared LEDs available at night and in tunnels
  • Removal of irregular reflection by sunlight using special filters
  • Detection/distinction of glasses and sunglasses (excluding mirror-coated glasses and goggles)
  • 3-Level sensitivity adjustment
  • Mute and 3-level warning volume control
  • Mounting cradle for easy installation and adjustments

Detection through eyeglasses!


Specifications:

  • ARM9 SoC
  • ¼-Inch lens
  • CMOS image processor
  • Flash memory (8 MB)
  • Interface with an external I/O and USB (UVC)
  • High-power invisible infrared LED
  • Operation status LED (in green/blue/red)
  • Micro speaker (min. 90dB)
  • Voice IC for various warning, effective sounds, and pre-recorded announcements
  • Protection circuitry for over-voltage/current, inverse voltage, and minimizing ripple noises
  • Power Consumption: Max. 2.5W
  • Input Voltage: DC 12/24V
  • Operating Temperature: -4˚ ~ 158˚ F
  • Physical Dimensions: 3.6 x 0.9 x 1.8 inches
  • Net Weight: 2.8 oz. (mounting cradle included)





We debuted at CES 2016 in Las Vegas, Nevada this past January. Now the Drive Guardian is ready for mass production. 

Our manufacturing partner is on standby waiting. In order to offer the Drive Guardian at an affordable price, we have high minimum order quantities. 

We need your support to place initial orders to get the Drive Guardian into vehicles across the country!


Our Contributors Will Receive:









What is Drowsy Driving?

It is the dangerous combination of driving while sleepy and/or tired.  This usually happens when a driver has not slept enough, but it can also happen due to untreated sleep disorders, medications, drinking alcohol, or shift work.

According to the the AAA Foundation for Traffic Safety:

  • More than half (55%) of those drivers who reported having fallen asleep while driving in the past year said that it occurred on a high-speed divided highway.
  • More than half (59%) of those drivers who reported having fallen asleep while driving in the past year said they had been driving for less than an hour before falling asleep; only one in five reported they had been driving for three hours or longer.
  • More than one in four drivers (26%) who reported having fallen asleep while driving in the past year reported that it had occurred between noon and 5 p.m.
  • Men (52%) were much more likely than women (30%) to report having ever fallen asleep while driving; men (14%) were also more likely than women (8%) to admit having done so in the past year.
  • Drivers age 24 and younger were most likely to report having fallen asleep in the past year, but they were least likely to report having ever fallen asleep.
  • About one-third (28%) of Americans admitted that they have fallen asleep behind the wheel within the past year, and more than half (54%) said they have driven while drowsy.


What is Distracted Driving?

Distracted driving is any activity that could divert a person's attention away from the primary task of driving. All distractions endanger driver, passenger, and bystander safety. These types of distractions include:

  • Texting
  • Using a cell phone or smartphone
  • Eating and drinking
  • Talking to passengers
  • Grooming
  • Reading, including maps
  • Using a navigation system
  • Watching a video
  • Adjusting a radio, CD player, or MP3 player

Sources:
National Highway Traffic Safety Administration, URL: http://www.nhtsa.gov/Driving+Safety/Drowsy+Driving     

AAA Foundation for Traffic Safety, URL: https://www.aaafoundation.org/drowsy-driving
